1.content:
After another successful mission is done and over with, the famous bounty hunters know as NanoCorps are taking a break by the open grassy field from completing each missions today...That is until a mysterious package appears before them with unusual signature on top of the package. It look like a face with a mask and glasses on while doing a V sign. The hunters don't know it could be a big fan or something else, but they decided to open the package. Inside it is a strange device and a letter beside it...Quentin Andross, the young Drangua leader, opens the letter while Danny, the joking woman lover hunter, messes with the device but was swipe from his hands by Zeke, co-leader and wise old gunman. Quentin reads out loud to the hunters to hear this mysterious letter...

MWHAHAHAHA!! I am Dr. Van Micro, the greatest scientist in the world! I heard you are the best hunters around here...Allow me to offer you...A mission that could be very challenging. I sent you my latest creation that allows you and your friends to travel through time and space, into different dimensions. From there, I will sent you a list of wanted names and send something to me for proof that you taken them out. It's not like I don't trust you hunters, just seeing if you able to do it...Oh yes, here are two things you must be aware of. Number one: Since you call yourself NanoCorp...I added the device to change your size, making you smaller. A bit smaller than an ant. Number two: That list of names that you'll be tracking are actually...Females. Let's just say I have a thing for big gals~ MWHAHAHAHAHA! Good luck out there hunters! I will reward you handsomely...That is, if you survive...MWHAHAHAHA!


After finish reading the letter, Quentin and the others look at each other with confusion and skeptical. Viz Archer, the tough and cold hunter with two robotic arms, shake his in disbelief and protest on taking the mission.

"...You have got to be kidding me..." Viz said in his angry tone. "I'm not gonna run around, killing women...Especially while were small."

"Oh come on, Viz." Petire, one of the Three Recon Stooges said. "It kinda sounds fun! Not the killing the ladies part, but the whole shrinking thing."

"Really? It sounds pretty bad..." Ralph, second of the Recon Stooges said in sarcastic tone

"I have to agree with Viz on this one...plus, I'm getting hungry..." Sharper, the last of the Recon Stooges said while rubbing his stomach.

"I agree as well. How about we skip this one and call it a day." Danny said, relaxing against a tree.

"Sounds like a plan..." Slick, a powerful but lazy telekinesis said as he yawns while laying on the ground, scratching his butt

"Now hold on, if this device really works...We're gonna have to take the job, like it or not." Quentin said. "If Beta confirms the device is working and able to use it, were taking it. If not, we will kindly replied back to the doc it does not work and be on our merry way."

"...I'm starting to not like this Dr.Micro and this mission...Should we be offended?" Sasha, the quiet dark assassin said to the two horned elven sisters: Alanna and Glenys which both of them nodded in agreement, the shy ghost girl Esmeralda also agrees along with the giant winged light blue skinned woman Slyphy while the wolf woman Ylva simply laughs at the doctor's writings.

"Ehh...Words doesn't harm me, though he'll gonna feel the wrath of me on behalf of all women...and I hope his blood taste good..." The vampiress Athanasia said, licking her lips for desire of blood before noticing Danny swoons over to them with his hand on Sasha's hip.

"Aww don't worry, my sweet dark cutie. I'll make sure this Dr. Micro gets a good ol' fashion can of whoop ass after we make a decision." Danny grinning ear to ear. "Now about us...How about you and me go somewhere nice and-" The womanizer felt a punch in the gut, causing him to fell backward in pain. Alanna huffs in anger while Glenys laughs at him.

"Sorry, Danny...I like you, but that is not how you treat a lady...Especially grabbing her hip like that." Sasha said, holding back a chuckle or two.

"Gihaha! Serves ya right, Danny!" Atomic, the biggest and silver skinned monster hunter laughs at Danny before turning to Quentin. "Seriously though, maybe we should skip this one. I mean I love fighting our targets but being a size of a bug? That's a big no from Atomic."

"I know...But lets make this our last one before we call it a day...If the device works."

While the hunters continue their conversation, Zeke hands the device over to the robotic brains hunter Beta and immediately begins scanning the device. The device has a knob on the right side and a button on the left, an antenna sticking out on the top and a screen at the center. It doesn't take for Beta to figure the device out and begins to press a button. A sudden burst of blue light appears in front of the hunters, creating a strange portal.

"I take it you know how it works?" Quentin said.

"Affirmative. I will handle the device."

"Well looks like we're taking the job." Quentin smirks at Viz and Danny as they mutter in annoyance.

"Ugh...I am not going to like this..." Alanna sighs while looking at Quentin. "I hope you will raise our pay check for this mess..."

"Of course, Alanna. I promise you all are gonna get a big raise after this. Who knows...This could be a challenge...Hunting down female targets-mind you, I don't find the mission quite exciting...But being tiny does sound pretty challenging and it might be-Glenys...Get off of me please?" Quentin felt the two familiar soft orbs pressing against his neck from behind.

"Don't try to resist, my darling leader~. I know you like these big soft of happiness!" Glenys smiles with a playful look on her face.

"...Sometimes..." Quentin quickly backs away from Glenys before making announcement to the team. "Alright, folks. Grab your gears, equipment and such and head over to the portal! This could be a loooong mission....And someone get Slick? He fell asleep again."

"Every damn time..." Viz sighs as he and Danny grabs Slick by the arm, dragging him to the portal with other hunters follow pursuit.

Zeke and Ryx, the flaming swordsman, simply chuckle at their responses, knowing this is gonna be a weird and possibly challenging mission they ever done....
1.title: A Special Mission for the Corps.

111.content: Before the NanoCorp lands in Naruto's dimension, who are they going to target?

112.title: Bleach

choices: A very large shadow hovers above them!
11231.content:
The hunters emerges from the bright light of the portal, landed on a rather soft, brown like surface. Quentin touches the 'ground' and it felt quite soft and squishy...and those large mountains far away from their position is quite strange as well: Orange like object covering the top of the mountains with what appears to be a bridge. Quentin scratches his head in confusion, there is no such mountains that has an orange structure on top unless it is a building, but there is no sign of buildings anywhere...As Quentin tries to figure where they are, a beeping noise from the device interrupted the leader's thinking before a hologram of Dr.Micro appears before them.

"Mwhahahaha! Welcome to Karakura Town! There's nothing special about this town...Unless you believe in spirits." The doctor said while laughing.

"Spirits? Like ghosts? Yeah, I'm not a big fan of them..." said Sharper "Are we hunting a female ghost...?"

"Sort of. She is a Shinigami: Guardians who protected good spirits from nasty evil beings like those terrifying Hollow...However, this target is very special."

"Like...?"

"She is well known throughout the place called Soul Society for her amazing speed . Given the title: Flash Goddess. She runs so fast, she disappear with a blink of an eye. Luckily I was able to track her and she is currently taken a nap, which is a perfect opportunity to kill her! Her name is Yoruichi Shihōin and be very careful! She can detect even the slightest life force, including yours! Good luck hunter!" The doctor laughs before signing out.

"Well...If what the doctor said is true, then we need to find her before she find us." said Zeke.

"Alright Beta, so your thing." Danny asked the robot.

"As you command-" Before Beta can scan the area, Quentin stops him...Because he already know where they are.

"What's the deal, Q-Man?" Petire asked him.

"I kinda figure it out before the doc shows up...See those 'mountains' over there? Never seen mountains with orange cloth on top and of course, mountains aren't suppose to be that brownish and this surface is a bit...fleshy...Which sums up that we are on Yoruichi's body or should I say...Her stomach," Quentin explains.

"...Yep, that explains it. No 'mountains' can be that beautiful and delicious...Well there is another one..." Danny eyeing on Vivian's chest. "And they are quite big I must say." Danny was about to grope her breasts until Vivian brings her gun in his face, causing the woman lover to back down.

"Gihahaha! Seriously, Danny. When are you gonna stop picking on the rookie? Anyway, what's the plan, Quentin?" The big silver brute asked the leader. "She gonna find us here if not doing some action!"

"Well first off, is Slick awake?"

The hunters look at Slick, lying down on the ground, snoring away. "That's a big old fat no." said Ralph.

"Looks like were gonna travel on her stomach, passing through her 'canyon' and make our way towards her face. We can get a blood sample and find anything to prove that we 'kill' her. Sounds good?" Quentin asked his fellow hunters which they nodded in agreement except for Slick who is sleeping. "Alright let's move!"
11231.title: Targeting the Flash Goddess

choices: Tall girls are easy to fall!

Someone's climbing down, but it's not Robin
1132.content:
Emerging from the bright portal, the now tiny sized NanoCorps enters into a new location and immediately take a look of their new surroundings. Sunlight shines through five windows, giving the room more light. Six shelves that contains numerous of books, a large table with a chair with a large size map on top of the table, another table which is rounded shape with four spinning chairs, two long lounge couch on each side and a ladder right near the rounded table.

The hunters also notice this place is in a weird rocking motion...perhaps they are on a ship that is already sailing. Just as the hunters got situated with their new location, the device starts beeping and a hologram of Micro appears before them.

"Mwahahaha! Ahoy, ya sea dogs! Welcome to the New World!" The doctor laughs.

"We kinda notice, Sherlock." Petire said while rolling his eyes.

"Well, that's what most pirates would say when they cross the Grand Line. Anywho, today's target is gonna be tough or easy cause she's a Devil Fruit user."

"Devil Fruit user? What's that?" Quentin asked.

"Devil Fruits are mystical fruits found in the world that can give the eater many different and varying kinds of strange and interesting abilities, depending on the type and variation of the fruit itself. Despite having such incredible powers after eating the fruit, there is one weakness that could be 'fatal' to all Devil Fruit users: They will likely be sunk if enter the sea and will become helpless until someone helps the user." Beta explains.

"Wow, to gain such powerful ability, you must have a weakness...Talk about a double edge sword, heh." said Ralph.

"Exactly. To be honest, I would LOVE to get my hands on one of the Devil Fruits and gain amazing powers! But I'm a sucker for swimming, so nuts to that. Now then...Her name is Nico Robin: An Archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates who is aboard on a ship called Thousand Sunny which you hunters are on as well. She has a nickname on her wanted poster that sounds pretty scary: 'Devil Child' and she has eaten a Paramecia type fruit called Hana Hana no Mi or Flower Flower Fruit which allows her to 'sprout' her body parts like arms and legs in a pretty pinkish petals...and with that info given, I'm outta here! Good luck hunters, mwhahahaha!" the doctor laughs before signing off.

"...Any recount on some criminal who can sprout body parts?" Quentin asked the group.

"Does giant mutant octopus count?" Alanna said.

"Human criminals."

"Oh...nope...Wait! Atomic can sprout body parts! He does it all the time when we ask him for his arm."

"Yeah...But why do you need his arm for...?"

"For sharpen my blade, of course. Can't battle with a dull weapon, right?"

"Uhh sure..." Quentin chuckles a little before turning to Beta. "Alright Beta. Find more information about miss Nico Robin. I'm a bit more curious about her nickname..."

"Affirmative. Scanning data."

With the robot begins his search for info, the hunters decided to kick back while waiting on their comrade to finish...
1132.title: Targeting the Devil Child Archaeologist

choices: "Sorry Slick, we gonna need your teleportation."
11332.content:
The hunters had their way out of the portal into a familiar surroundings. They appear to be in someone's bedroom with the sunlight shining through the windows, brighten the room. The furnitures seems to be quite fancy...And of course much, much larger than the hunters.

"Good gravy! Look at the size of that bed!" Petire pointed at the bed.

"Looks like that crazy ass scientist's device really did work." Danny chuckled until a voice startled him.

"I resent that comment!" The voice turn out to be Dr. Micro which is coming from the device. "I see you made it into another dimension..My device works! Mwhahahaha~!

"Get to the task already..." Viz said.

"Ooh impatient aren't we?...Your first target should be simple as she has no Devil Fruit powers."

"Devil Fruits?" Quentin said.

"Devil Fruits are mystical fruits found in this dimension that can give the eater many different and varying kinds of amusing power, depending on the type and variation of the fruit itself." Beta explains.

"Right on the button! Now here's your target: http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130... "

The hunters take a good look of their first target through the project and quite amaze how beautiful she is, especially Danny.

"Whoa there! This beautiful babe is our target!?"

"That's right! Her name is Nefertari Vivi, princess of Alabasta! The doctor laughed.

"Princess...? Oh boy..." Quentin sighed. "...We will get right on it, doc."

"Excellent! I will await your results...Good luck, hunter. It should be easy for you...Unless she crush you all, blissfully unaware," Dr.Micro crackle with laughter before he signs off.

"...I hate that bastard..."

"We know, Viz..." Ralph roll his eyes. "...But I wonder..Should we really kill the princess? I mean..Is she really important in Alabasta?"

"Of course she is, ya block head! We can't just kill her and be done with it!" Petire said. "Err...IF we can kill her."

"Actually, I got an idea that will fool the doc. But right now, we gotta find the princess. Beta? Can you locate her?" Quentin asked the robot.

"I did, Mr, Andross. I have located Miss Vivi and she is actually-" As Beta about to reveal her location, a very loud booming sound coming from the behind.As the hunters turn around to see a very large door, the booming sound has gotten louder and louder. The door suddenly open slowly, revealing a woman with long blue hair in a dress and blue wedges. The hunters was in shock at her massive size, Danny on the other hand...Can't keep his eyes off of her.

"I believe that's the princess herself." Zeke said. "..And I think it's time we move out of way..."


"Why? Cause she's royalty and all and we should bow down to her and crap?" Slick said.

"That and..." Before he continues, a familiar feeling of the ground trembling and the ear splitting booming noises interrupt him and the hunters notice a massive shadow falls before them. They all look up to see a sky of blue sole headed straight for them.

"...She's heading our way."

"Holy crap!!" The three recon yelled and begin to panic. "We're done for!"

"I totally want to die under her feet..." Danny still mesmerized by her beauty.

"Kid, what's the plan?" Zeke asked Quentin.

"I can hold off her foot! They don't call me the Ultimate Tank for nothing! Gihahaha!" Atomic laughs. "Or we can get Slick to teleport us away and landed on the target!"

"If I feel like it..." Slick said yawning.

Quentin sighs and decided to...

1143.content: Here's next list of targets.
1143.title: More targets

11433.content: This water, in love with Gray, girl?
11433.title: Juvia Lockser

choices: They made their way to the top of the boot
Juvia spot something moving on her boot...
114331.content:
The hunters have successfully made it through the portal into their new location and landed on the floor safely, it seems they are in someone's room as they scan the area, however there is one thing that catches their eyes...A doll on the bed...And it's not just one, many look a like dolls that are sitting on the bookshelf and hanging on the hooks. Even some painting and pictures that are one the wall have the same person along with towels with the person's face that said 'Gray-sama Love' with a heart at the end.

"Oh my..." Petire said with his mouth wide open in shock. "...I think were in a girl's room. Who, strangely, is in love with this Gray fella."

"Heh, be glad it's not you, Quentin." Danny grins.

"Yeah yeah, It'll be worse if there is a stalker chasing me..In this current state." Quentin sighs. "Anyway, the doc should gives the info on what target we will hit."

"Have no fear, my loyal subjects! I have the info your looking for!" The scientist voice appears from the device and a hologram of him appears in front of the hunters. "Mwhahaha! I'm soooooo glad you hunters alive! My device is a master piece!"

"Get to the point, you bastard." Viz snaps at Dr. Micro.

"Eep! V-Very well, since your in a hurry...Your first target of the day is quite...Interesting. Her name is Juvia Lockser, a water mage who is in a guild called Fairy Tail.

"Fairy Tail?" Atomic asked. "What the heck is that?"

"I have acquire some info on Fairy Tail: It is the strongest guild in the Kingdom of Fiore which where are located. And the target, miss Juvia, was once in a dark guild called Phantom Lord, however it was disbanded after the Fairy Tail defeated them. After some events, Juvia joins the guild." Beta explains.

"Hmm... But what's all the Gray stuff here and there?"

"Mwhaha! Juvia was defeated by the very same man who she fell in love with: Gray Fullbuster. Talk about unhealthy romantic way. Well then, with that out of the way, get to hunting, bounty hunters! Be warn though...She is a water mage user, she can turn herself into water which makes a bit tough for you...If I were you...I would get a Gray Fullbuster costume and make yourself known to her and she might will-"

"Not gonna happen, doc." Quentin sighs.

"Suit yourselves, good luck hunters!"The scientist laughs before signing off.

"Oh great, we're hunting a crazy woman" Ralph said sarcastically." And I do feel bad for Gray, having her following him around saying 'I love you Gray-sama~!'"

"Ha! Good one, Ralph!...Rare to see you joke on something." Petire said.

As the hunters continue with the conversation, they were interrupted by a loud booming that was getting louder and louder. Before the hunters locate the sound, a large shadow covers the hunters. They look up to see a massive object heading their way, Atomic was the first one to act as he uses the tentacles he sprouts on his back grabbing his fellow hunters and jumps out of the harms way before the object slams down on their previous spot. Atomic landed away from the object and place the hunters on the floor.

"W-Whew...Thank you, Atomic." Petire said as he breathing heavily.

"Yeah. Good move there." Viz said.

"No problem guys! But that was kinda close...Beta! Why didn't you tell us about this!?" Atomic snarls at Beta.

"Forgive me, Master Atomic. I was too busy gathering data from this world. I failed to notice we were in danger." Beta said. "But we have the target. She's above us."

The hunters have notice another object right beside them which is similar to the object that almost crush them. It appears those two objects are actually dark brown boots. The hunters looks up to see a blue dress coat and since they are nearly underneath it, they can see a pair of blue panties.

"Whoa! Where's my camera!?" Danny said drooling.

"Oh shut it.." Viz slaps him on the head.

The hunters keeps trailing the body, they can't get a good view of her face due to her...'Mountains' but they did see a lock of blue hair.

"Can we climb this mountain of beauty!?" Danny asked Quentin much to his annoyance.

"You just want to get a good view of her panties...Slick? You in a mood for teleporting?"

"Not really...I don't feel like it...Nor the climbing." Slick said while yawning.

"Ugh...Guess climbing it is..."

"Hot damn!"

The pervert hunter jumps for joy before heading towards the towering brown boot with the other hunters follow pursuit...
114331.title: Targeting the Rain Woman

choices: They reach the edge of the panties
Juvia felt an itch and investigate it
1143311.content:
What seems to be almost an hour or less to them, the tiny hunters made it to the top of the boots and now they have another problem blocking their path...and Danny was shouting with joy. Realizing they are underneath the girl's dress coat, the hunters are now face to face with Juvia's very large white panties, much to the female hunters embarrassment...

"You have got to be kidding me!? Don't tell me we have to scale this woman's panties!?" Alanna shouted.

"W-wake Slick up, please..." Glenys blushes.

"Wish I could but...He's the 'king of all sleepers'. No matter how hard you hit him, he'll never wake up." Quentin said with a sigh. "But right now, the only choice to climb up further is...ya know. Believe me, I'm not that happy about it either, but there is no going back, understand?"

The girls look at each other before agreeing with their leader, no matter how...embarrassing this is. With that settle, Quentin pats on Atomic's shoulder before jumping off the leather cliff and latch on the vast field of white cotton. The feminine scent from within the panties hits the hunters' noses, except for Beta and the girls were quite disgust of this stench...Danny, however, seems to be enjoying this lovely scent.

"Ahh...The scent of the lovely water mage...How divine." Danny takes a big whiff of Juvia's fresh pair of panties and her womanhood, rubbing against it with his face. "I never thought I got sooooo close to a woman's panites...I should thank Dr.Micro for this!"

"...Well I'm officially creep out." said Petire

"And he's officially dead after we finish with this crap!" Alanna punches Danny on the head.

"Ow! Alanna! Don't be so hard on me!"

"Ugh...Atomic, get us out of here before we have a casualty on our list."

"Roger that, boss!"

Atomic begins scaling up the panties with his fellow hunters clinging onto him while the girls grab a hold on Danny from any...nasty things he was about to do. Despite being small, this may take about a few minutes or more thanks to Atomic's great jumping ability and his massive strength to carry and climb at the same time...
1143311.title: Top of Mount Boots. Next Stop: Wall of Panties

114332.content: How about this book-smarts young lady?
114332.title: Levy McGarden

1143321.content:
The hunters emerges from the light, landed safely on purple color landscape. The hunters notice the landscape they just landed felt quite leather...like a book or something. Speaking of books, they notice they are surrounding by bookshelves, full of books.

"What the hell...? Are we in a library?" said Danny.

"No, Master Danny. We are located inside a room of Fairy Hills." Beta said. "Though I don't have enough data for whose room is it. But I must comment of this room...For someone to acquire many books appears to be a genius."

"So we're targeting a nerd...How quaint..." Viz said sighing in disappointment.

Suddenly the device starts beeping and a hologram of Dr.Micro appears before them with the info they need. "Mwhahahaha! I see my wonderful bounty hunters made it safely to your destination, hmmmmm?"

"Yep, what's our target for the day?" Quentin asked the doc.

"Well, today's your lucky day! Your target is Levy McGarden...Unfortunately...She's not here at the moment." Dr. Micro laughs sheepishly.

"And why she isn't here?"

"She's on a mission with her fellow guild mates, and by guild mates I mean Fairy Tail - The strongest guild of magic users in the Kingdom of Fiore. According to my research...Levy here uses a interesting magic called Solid Script or Letter Magic that allows her to generate words in the air and make them solid...Very unique indeed."

"Interesting...So we wait here until Levy comes back and then we...Kill her, correct?" said Petire.

"Bingo! She should come back at least...Hmm...5 to 20 minutes. Once she enters her room, strike her when you get the chance...She is not one of the strongest magic user in Fairy Tail. However...You are tiny like a little flea, she'll mistaken for an insect and squish you! Don't want any guts all over her foot now do we?" The doc laughs.

"Let her try...She haven't face the 'Invincible Tank', gihahaha!" Atomic laughs.

"Oh yes, I completely forgot about Atomic.Then you should be alright...Have fun hunting! Mwhahaha!" The doc laughs before signing off. Now the hunters must wait for their target to enter and then strike at her...But Zeke has another plan...

"Hang on kids...Maybe we shouldn't kill Levy...But we can get her blood from her and one of her accessories to fool the doc that we kill her."

"That sounds a lot better...I'm not into killing nerds..." said Viz.

"I agree as well. Beta? Do you have the needle in you?" Quentin asked the robot.

"Affirmative. I have the necessary equipment for extracting blood."

"Excellent. Then were ready for the 'attack'...All we need to do now is-" Before Quentin can say anything else, they heard the doorknob rattle and begins to turn, opening the door. The hunters turns to the door to see if its Levy...
1143321.title: Targeting the Bookworm Fairy

11433211.content:
As the door creaks open, in walks Levy McGarden, the hunters' gigantic target. To their surprise, Levy quickly sees the tiny hunters on the floor.

How does she react?
11433211.title: Enter Levy!

choices: Beta is able to drain blood from her leg!
Levy takes a closer look at the "bugs"...
114332111.content:
"Eww, bugs!" screams Levy as she sees the tiny hunters on the floor...although she doesn't know their real identities. Regardless, she brings her left foot up to stomp the "bugs", but the hunters dodge said foot easily!

With great agility, the tinies continue to avoid Levy's stomps and attack her feet and legs, when...
114332111.title: Bugs in the System

114332112.content:
Levy notice something odd about those 'bugs' on the floor, especially the large silver colored one. There are many different creatures in this land that she read in one of her books, big and small, but she don't recognize these ten insects here...Perhaps they are extremely rare breed of insects that no one discovers and they appear right in her room surprisingly. Delighted, Levy walks slowly and gently towards the rare insects.

Despite her gentle walk, the hunters bounced on and off the floor with every step she take along with a ear shattering booms. They tried to get away from the giantess, thinking she might crush them but she was upon, placing her sandaled foot right in front of them. The hunters take a step back and get nice view of the towering Fairy Tail member: They already have met her sandal cover foot which they only can see the wall of sole, but they able to past it and sees her yellow short dress with a good view of her panties. They see her cute smiling face with blue shoulder length hair that is tied up with colorful bandanna.

"Aww...ain't she adorable?" said Petire before looking at Danny. "Ya ain't gonna swoon over her?"

"Not really. She is cute, but doesn't have a good buxom figure, you know?"

"Oh brother.."

The hunters notice Levy is crouching down to get a good view of the rare bugs. Upon closer inspection, Levy gasped in shock realizing that there aren't rare breed of bugs...In fact, they are humans! Ten tiny humans in her room and not one of them is from Fairy Tail...Probably from other guilds or maybe they are spies...Levy decided to talk to them, hoping they are friendly.

"Umm...Hi there." Levy waves down at them

"..Is she waving at us?" Petire whispers to Quentin.

"Yes. I think she's friendly..Of course, just to make she is..." Responding to Levy's friendly wave, Quentin orders the group to wave back at her, which they did.

Levy sighs in relief as they are seem to be friendly. To keep this friendly introduction, Levy lowers one of her fingers near the hunters, inviting them to climb abroad. Quentin and the group accept the offer and climbs her finger until they reach the tip. Levy slowly lifts the hunters away from the floor while standing up, getting a closer look of them. The hunters view is cover with Levy's brown grayish eye.

"Oh wow! I never seen a group of people this small before...My name is Levy, nice to meet you all! Is this magic ?" Levy asked the hunters, knowing she has a lot of questions to throw at them.

"No ma'am, we came from a different dimension by...a crazy scientist who wants us to test the device to see it works and well...Look what happen." Quentin explains to Levy, though not the whole truth of it.

"You guys are from another world!? Amazing!" said Levy, "Oh I gotta tell the others about this!" Before she could go, Viz suddenly speaks out causing the young girl to halt in her tracks.

"It's a secret and it shouldn't be out..The scientist really gonna get us for spreading such secret."

"Oh really? Well...If you say so."

"Y-Yes...The doctor will kill us for spilling a secret...not before Viz kills him first..." Danny chuckles before getting slap on the head by Petire. "P-Plus, the device is..malfunction, so we won't be able to go back for awhile until it is fixed. Our machinist Beta, who is a robot by the way, is the only one in group know how to fix the shitty thing."

"But, Master Danny. The device works-" Beta was cut off by Petire while he was about tell them the device is working,

"Yes, Beta...The device does not work, can you fix it for us?" Petire winks at him.

"...Oh. Yes, of course. I'll have it fix in no time. In the mean time, why don't Miss Levy entertain you? Playing a game surely kill some time." Beta suggested.

"Entertain?...Gee, It's a bit embarrassing to entertain a bunch of tiny people...Alright then, I do have two of them." said Levy. "The first one is a simply game called Cat and Mouse. It's a fun game that the girls and I play sometimes. Since the nine of you are small, it's obvious that you are all the mouse while I'm a cat. The rules are simple: The cat will try to catch you by pinning or trap you either under my hand, foot, mouth, etc. The other mouse can rescue the trapped one without being caught."

"Sounds easy enough for me." Viz grins. "What's the second one?"

"Well uhh..." This one made Levy blush and she is wearing a short dress for this second game choice. "Th-The second one is Trekking Mountain...You'll have to climb me..."

"Hot Damn!" Danny blurt out his catchphrase and getting slap on the head by Petire again.

"A-Anyway...It's like climbing a mountain and the first team who reaches the top, which is my head, wins. I can stop you on your tracks, but I won't pick you off...And don't get any funny ideas of groping me...Especially the one who said 'Hot Damn'" Levy glares down at Danny.

"Ehehe, don't worry about the perv, we're watching him."

"R-Right...So which one are you going to choose." Levy asked the hunters, hoping they don't choose Trekking Mountain...

The hunters except Beta talk about the choices and they have made their decision...

Atomic makes a comeback and reaches Levy's head

1143322221.content:
"Mwahahaha!" a voice, apparently that of Dr. Van Micro, is heard to laugh. "Greetings, hunters. I, Dr. Van Micro, have a special mission for you. You, the Nanocorps, are to navigate the Fairy Tail anime universe and assassinate Cana Alberona, one of the eponymous Guild members. Bring me proof of her defeat, and you will be handsomely rewarded! ...probably."

Quentin is a little suspicious of the mad doctor's intentions.

"Wait a sec," says Petire, "how does the Doc even plan on getting us to --"

Then the hunters are bathed in a bright light, and all goes blank.

...

The group slowly awakens in what appears to be a bar. A massive bar. Or...are they just...shrunken?

"Oh, forgot one thing," the doctor's voice says, "you all need to be reduced to tiny size to ensure maximum stealth."

Just then, the team sees a giantess at the booth, drinking herself silly. Brown hair, bare midriff...it's Cana! Quite the beauty...at least, that's what Danny is thinking as he drools at the sight of her.

So...what is the Nanocorps' plan of action?
1143322221.title: Targeting the S-Class Drinker

11433222211.content:
"So...Any bright ideas how to kill this lovely beauty?" Petire said as the hunters made their way towards Cana.

"There's always the teleportation instead of running towards her...Which feels AND looks like miles and miles away from here!" Sharper complains.

"Unfortunately, our teleport service is not available as you can see..." Zeke points at Slick sleeping on Atomic's shoulder."So running towards her is our only option."

"...Damn slacker..."

Few minutes or an hour later, the hunters reaches their target without any problem...Except for Sharper complaining all the way . Cana is still drinking and surprises the hunters when she drinks even more from a large beer barrel...how she able to stay conscious while drinking large consumption of alcoholic beverage is quite a mystery, the hunters thought. They notice one of her feet is on the floor and it's quite massive to them: Her sandal sole alone towers the minuscule hunters and her toes, drumming against the sandal bed, is large like mountains.

"Oooh boy! Can't wait to climb those beauties!" Danny grins

"Behave, Danny...Climbing her won't be easy, but as long she is drinking, we will reach her face no problem...Although there is another way." said Quentin.

"What's on your mind?" Ryx asked.

"We can attack her foot, which is dangerous for us tiny beings, but good chance to get her attention. Once she lowers her hand, Beta will get her blood and then we can move away from her...IF Slick awakens."

"Oh don't worry about it, Quentin. I do have a good wake up call just for Slick." Dr. Coon said as he gets out a small green pill from his pocket. "With one dose of this, he'll wake up with such great energy."

"Nice! Now then, hunters...What plan shall we choose?" Quentin asked his fellow hunters.

11433222222.title: Brandish μ

choices: Brandish aid Marin to defeat the NanoCorps
114332222221.content:
The hunters emerges from the bright portal, arriving at the target's location with no changes on their bodies or whatsoever. They notice they are in someone's room, quite stylish and of course, everything's bigger due to the device's shrinking effect. Comparing to their size and everything around them-by Beta's calculation-they are at the size of an ant. Before the hunters can wait on the genius, Beta detected a life form in the same room and it's nearby...and surprisingly, Beta said the life form is exactly the same size as the hunters are right now.

Quentin and the group looks over where Beta pointed at, spotting what appears to be a tiny man, slowly dragging a rather big bottle of nail polish across the floor. He appears to be a young man, wearing dark colored trousers and a dark colored blazer, striped bandanna and a pair of glasses on his forehead and he was having a tough time doing the pulling of the object.

Feeling sorry for this poor fella, Quentin walks over to the man with other hunters follow pursuit with no objection of helping out...except for Slick as he is sleeping on Atomic's shoulder. The man notice the hunters, made jump up by surprise, seeing a group of tiny people walking to him...could it be it was the work for his partner? Wouldn't hurt to ask them...

"Oh my! I didn't except Miss Brandish shrink more on those poor people who annoyed her. She's get a pass as always~!" The man smiles cheerfully,showing he's quite a nice guy...but to some hunters, however, finds him a bit creepy and suspicious...

"Brandish...?" Quentin said, not knowing who is this Brandish person is. "Who's Brandish?"

"Wha...!? You don't know who Brandish is!? How could you not know one of the powerful Spriggan 12 of Alvarez Empire!? Well, for that little remark, you fail." The man suddenly begins to scowl at Quentin, surprising the Drangua who thought he was friendly.

"Uhh...Beta?"

"Brandish μ is one of the Spriggan 12: A group of extremely skilled and powerful mages gather by the emperor himself by the name of Zeref. I do not have much info about her, but she is very skilled of using this powerful magic called Mass Manipulation: A magic that gives the user the ability of altering the mass, matter, and/or structure of objects, increasing or decreasing the proportion at will." Beta explains.

"Oooh! That's correct! Although...he's a robot with such full of knowledge...like that crazy Wahl Icht " The man comes up to the robot, tapping against his armor. "..He gets a pass~!"

"Alright kid. Who are you? You don't seem like a type who enjoys being this small..." Zeke asked the man.

"Oh right! Where are my manners? I am Marin Hollow, a proud member of Brandish Squad and servant to Miss Brandish. Now it's my turn to ask who you guys are? I never seen you group of people before...especially that big fella..." Marin said while staring at the giant silver monster.

"Well..Let's just say we're bounty hunters from different dimension, looking for our target...." Quentin said, keeping much of their mission a secret.

"Hmm....Are you targeting Miss Brandish?"

"Not...that I know of."

Marin stares at the NanoCorps' leader in suspicion, knowing that they are here to kill his beloved master. Just as the man was about asked them another question, the massive door from the right side opens, revealing a young woman with green hair in a bob style with bangs cut above her eyes and blue cross-shaped objects attached to the sides of her head. Wearing a burgundy swimsuit showing her huge bust (much to Danny's excitement) and a coat with fur around the collar, a choker around her neck with chains attached to it and a pair of high heels that show off her toes.

The weird man jumps for joy, welcoming his master's return...and hopefully he'll be able to return his normal size.

"Miss Brandish~! Welcome back! Seeing the sight of you always gets my pass!" Marin gleefully said.

"Yes yes...It's annoying really..." Brandish rolls her eyes in annoyance before walking over to Marin's spot. But as she gets near to her little servant, a foot way of Marin being squish by her, she spotted a tiny group of people beside him and none of them she didn't recognize,,,especially the rather big silver looking one. "Marin...who are these people?"

"Oh yes...These people are actually bounty hunters from another 'dimension' and hunting down a target...which might be you, Miss Brandish! I say we get rid of them before that happens!" Marin got close to Quentin once more with fist balled up.

"Like hell you will..." Viz pushes Marin away from Quentin with one of his mechanical arm changes into a blade, very close to his face.

"Whoa whoa! How scary you are and not even intimated by the sight of Miss Brandish...you get a pass!"

"I'll give you a pass alright...right across your throat."

"How annoying..." Brandish simply sighs while watching Marin almost getting close to losing his head off by Viz. She could go help her underling, if she feels like it. But this mysterious group look enough to cause trouble for her and Marin...Or rather pluck their leader of the floor and starts interrogating him.on where did they come from...and maybe have a little fun...

1151311.content:
The bounty hunters emerges from the portal, landing on a wet surface and feeling rain drops from above which means it's raining and the buildings around this new area...are destroy by something.... Not wanted to get soaking wet from these globs of rain drops, Quentin and the group ran over to a destroyed building nearby and waits for the instructions from Dr. Micro while Zeke, Danny, and Beta check out their new surroundings by peeping out of the cracked hole.

"Well...I guess the doc's invention really did the trick." Quentin chuckles, wiping the water off his hair.

"Tch, he's lucky. That's all." Viz grumbles, shaking the water off of the mechanical arm.

"So...Did any of you notice a lot of buildings demolish?" Sasha said to the group.

"Yeah, almost like a bulldozer terrorize the town by a wacko." said Atomic.

While the group had their conversation, Zeke, Danny, and Beta came back to the group in an alarming state.

"Hey guys...is something wrong?" Quentin asked them.

"...Well, I think Beta should explain what happen to the area...or rather the world, kid." said Zeke.

"The...world?" said Slyphy.

"Correct. I made a quick scan of the area and most of the half continent, and what it reveal to be quite terrifying. The humanity in this world has been killed by half of its population...by two androids."

"Two androids...?" Petire and the recons look at each other before looking at Beta again.

"Correct. They don't have any real names, but they go by the name of Android 17 and Android 18. Both created by a man name Dr. Gero, though he too was killed by them. Some people was strong enough to confront the two...but results in death. One Saiyan name Gohan was able to push the two back with the help of another one, Trunks."

"...I fear this Gohan person didn't make out either, right?" Glenys said softly.

"Sadly, yes. Trunks is the only survivor to escape the androids' wrath and fled into a different timeline by using the Time Machine. Right now, the androids are still wreaking havoc across the world...and I bear another bad news: One of the android is here in Pepper Town."

"Shit. Which one of the androids is it?"

"Android 18. A twin sister of Android 17."

"Good...Dealing two of them in our current size will be a problem, but dealing one could be our avatage...plus she might be Dr.Micor's hit list, so there's that one..." said Alanna.

"Could be...How close is she?" Quentin asked.

"Very close."

"Be more specific, ya rust bucket! How close is-"

Before Petire could finish his words, a loud booming noise causing the hunters to be high alert. Right near the entrance of their hiding area, a very large brown like object blocking the entrance way. The recons and Danny decided to climb the brown object without thinking about it and the others tries to call them back, knowing this could be Android 18's foot, but it doesn't seem to reach them in time. While making up the top, the boys looks up, craning their necks and gets a surprise of their lives...Following the brown object which happens to be boots are dark blue tights and denim skirt, a black undershirt that has white and black striped sleeves along with blue denim vest and past through her breasts, they able to see a pretty face and blue eyes with blonde hair...and was looking straight at them four tiny hunters.

"Hot Damn!" Danny shouted with joy.

"Hell no, Danny! Don't you dare say 'let's go out on a date' shit!" Petire shouted.

"G-Guys...I think she spotted us..." Sharper meekly said, hiding behind Ralph.

"Ugh!" The giant female android huffs with her hands place on her hips. "I can't believe that 17! He must have cheating in that stupid video game and now I got annoying bugs crawling over my boots!"

The recons and Danny tries to get off of the angry android's boot but they were thrown off and onto the ground when she shakes them off before hovering her foot above the four hunters.

"Guess I'll have to vent my angry on to you, little bugs!"

"Oh shit! We're done for!" Sharper shouted.

"Ooh...I rather died under her butt..."

"Danny...I'll kick your ass when we're gone to heaven or hell!"

Seeing his comrades are in trouble, Quentin turns to Atomic and Slick, who surprisingly stills up, to see who can rescue them. Atomic's sheer strength can easily repel the giant foot or Slick's shield can hold it off until they make a move, but who's he gonna choose...?

115132222222.title: Supreme Kai of Time (Chronoa)

1151322222221.content:
Before the bounty hunters arrive at their destination...Inside the Time Nest where it holds all of history from the past and a book that holds all the records in time...

"Oooh, where's Trunks and those new group of Time Patrols he was suppose to bring!?" The Supreme Kai of Time said while pacing around waiting on Trunks to return. The young looking Kaioshin who happens to be 75 millions years old, wearing a robe that most of the Kaioshin wears and a pair of Potara earrings, and high heeled boots for her short stature.

"Kiiiiii!" The yellow and white bird named Tokitoki calls out to the Kai while siting on the perch in the middle of the pond. The bird is strangely resembles of a wise elderly man and is a best friend and pet of the Kai and a very important one for the Time Nest.

"I know, I know! But it has been 3 hours since he left and I haven't heard from him since!" The Kai huffs and being impatient.

"Tooooh! Kiiiii!" The bird caws again, this time it made the Kai stops in her tracks and gotten angry.

"Shut up! I am being patience, but I'm worry about Trunks and the patrols..." The Kai sighs before resume her pacing. Just as the Kai about to contact Trunks once more, she suddenly sense a small yet faint presence near the stairways of the Time Storage Vault. She hurries over to where the presence is, noticing a tiny light floating near the stone walkway that is barely the size of a tiny incest.

"Huh..? What is that?" The Kai got on her knees to get a better look at the tiny light. At first she thought it was a time crack from the rift, but this is way too small...As the Kai moves in for a closer look, the light begins to bright up and popping from the light are a group of tiny people, which are the NanoCorps, landed on the stones. Her eyes widen in shock, letting a gasp, watching the tiny group move around a bit before noticing the Kai and they too were quite stunned.

"Good gravy!" Petire shouted as he notice the Kai's large face looming over them.

"Whoa...I guess the doc's device really works..." Ralph mumbles to himself

The hunters and the Kai stare at each other for a few minutes before the Kai calmly speaks to the group without scarring them.

"Hello there..Do not be frighten...I'm a friendly uhh...giant." She smiles a bit, showing she means no harm to them...though she actually quite glad there are beings that are shorter than her.

"Kiiiii! Kiiiii!" Tokitoki squawks once more.

"Not now, Tokitoki...." The Kai clutches her fist in anger before returning her attention to the hunters. "Sorry about my friend Tokitoki, he's always like this...Are you people the new Time Patrol recruits that Trunks mention?"

"Time Patrols? What the hell is-" Viz was about to say something but was covered by Zeke's giant mechanical hand.

"Actually...Yes, we are the new Time Patrol recruits. Trunks told us to go ahead and meet you here without him, he...had other things to do." Zeke lied to the Kai which is very rare for Zeke to lie...and it seems working for them as she believe his words. "We decided to wrap over here but it looks like...it miscalculated."

"In a very small way, he he" The Kai giggles at her joke though the hunters didn't laugh at her joke except Sharper who gets it. Clearing her throat, the Kai stands up to full height with her hands on her hips, towering over the tiny 'Time Patrols', craning their necks to see her face.

"...Gosh she's cute...How old is she?"Danny whisperers to the group.

"Oh Danny...she look like a kid to me...Beta?" Quentin asked the robot.

"She's 75,000,000 years old."

"...Beg your pardon?"

"The Supreme Kai of Time is 75,000,000 years old and before you asked, my calculation hasn't prove wrong."

"This is true...so she must be that old...You don't think she's our target, guys?" Alanna said.

"Not sure. Micro hasn't call us yet...But right now, play along."

"What are you guys talking about?" The Kai's booming voice starle the hunters. She was quite curious of their conversation, hoping they are talking about how huge she is right now.

"N-Nothing, ma'am! Just talking about how awesome this now job gonna be and you look mighty fabulous I may add." Danny said in his flirty self.

"Aww, how sweet!" The Kai smiles before she lowers hand towards them, offering a lift. One by one, the hunters hop aboard her hand...expect for a certain hunter who sneaks away and latched on the Kai's white boot, snuggling against the material before his leader spotted him and orders Atomic to grab him with one of his tentacles from his arm, latching him away from her boot and back with the others.

"Oh come on!" Danny cried before Alanna slaps him on the head.

"Creep! The next time you do that again, I'm gonna busted open your head!"

"Aye aye, ma'am..."

Ignoring the perverted hunter, The Kai simply giggles at their actions before carrying them to the Time Storage Vault for a few warm up mission she had in mind...something that is suitable for the tiny 'Time Patrols' and perhaps try to figure a way to get them back to regular size...

The hunters made their way through the portal, with a few bickering from Viz. Here is your first target for the day, but heed my warning...She may be human, but she has a very nasty temper, merciless and sadistic killer! MWHAHAHAHA! Dr. Micro laughs once more. They also notice she has a tattoo on her right upper arm.
