121332222221.title: Targeting the Aether Foundation President

choices: Distract Lusamine so Beta can drain her blood
1213322222211.content:
The hunters eventually awaken in a very white area. That light from before isn't still blinding them, though. The ceiling, walls, and floor are white for the most part. Everything looks huge...

Or...are the Nanocorps just tiny?

"Looks like the Doc wasn't kidding," Petire admits.

The team sees several frozen displays up ahead...looking like they contain frozen...Pokemon?! What twisted menace would do this? Then, fiddling with a digital screen the group sees their target -- light blonde hair, white boots, white outfit...

"Lusamine!" Quentin realizes.

The woman looks around for a moment, believing she'd heard something. But she shrugs it off and gets back to her work.

"So what's the plan, boss?" Danny whispers.

Quentin, after thinking for a moment, orders his team to...
1213322222211.title: And then, irony happens.

12133222222112.content:
"Slick! Can you take us closer to her?" The leader asked the sloth hunter.

"Meh...I'll try..." Slick yawns before surrounding them in purple aura, disappearing along with his comrades, but where will the hunters in up?
12133222222112.title: Teleport Away!

choices: Too late, Lusamine swallows the Nanocorps
121332222221122.content:
The hunters find themselves somewhere dark as a result of Slick's teleportation power. The ground feels a bit wet, and some clear liquid drops down from the ceiling of this cavern. A white barricade can be seen in one direction, and a lightless, abyssal downward path is noticeable the opposite way. The whole place seems oddly organic for a cave...

Wait...organic?!

"Crap!!" Petire interjects. "We've landed ourselves in Lusamine's mouth!"

"Don't worry," Quentin calmly assures the team, "we can get out of this before..."
121332222221122.title: Lusamine's Mouth

121332222222.content: The Pokémon researcher of Pokemon Dream Radar and Professor Kukui's wife?
121332222222.title: Professor Burnet

122.content: Now before they arrive, who is the main target?
122.title: The Land of Hyrule

choices: Cia and the Commanders of Dark Forces appears behind them
1221.content:
Hyrule Field...A beautiful serene with delicate flowers blooming through the field, a gentle breeze blew through the trees, still reflection of the lake shinned by the sun's light, and a lovely view of the Hyrule Castle where a beautiful princess name Zelda resides. A nice way to have a little picnic for the people in Hyrule...that is until an evil army name the Dark Forces, appears and causing havoc across the Hyrule, led by a dragon knight, an evil wizard, and a dark sorceress. Soldiers on both sides clash against each other, spewing blood across the field, but it seems the Dark Forces are gaining the upper hand...it looks bleak for the Hyrulean Forces, but little did they know, a group of hunters is about to enter the battle...

On top of the rocky cliff, a bright portal appears in thin air and coming out from it are the NanoCorps...although only the female members: Sasha, Alanna, Glenys, Esmeralda, Slyphy, Athanasia, Ylva, and Vivian, came out with no sign of the guys and to make it very strange of their arrival...they appear to be normal sized. The girls check their bodies for any changes, but it seem they are okay, though it doesn't explain how they are still regular size, but more importantly...where are the boys?

"Okay...We're in a different world, but we're suppose to be small...I guess the device half worked?" Sasha said.

"Forget that crazy doc's piece of junk! The boys aren't here and we're stranded on a unknown world!" Alanna shouted before hearing a lot of shouting from below the cliff. "What's all that racked?"

The girls except Esmeralda moves to the edge, witnessing soldiers and monsters battling each other with casualties on both side.

"Okay...We definitely pick the wrong time to be here. It's like a damn war zone!" said Vivian. "I suggest we better get a move on before they spotted us."

"Sounds good. Maybe we can find the boys somewhere else. Come on, Esmeralda! We gotta move!" Sasha said to the ghost huntress but she remains still with her head down, staring at the ground. "Esmeralda?"

The girls check to see the ghost girl is alright, she responded with a nod and points it down near her boots. As the girls lower to see what she is pointed, they let out a gasp as they spotted their fellow hunters waving their arms, shrunken.

"Guys!? You're..."

"Small...We noticed, Sherlock." Viz huffs. "Glad to see you girls are alright...Not that I care..."

"Viz..Sorry, he's not happy at the moment...Anyway, glad Emmy founded us before you ladies can take off. We had to avoid the footfalls when we got out of the portal first. Alanna almost step on Danny if it wasn't for Atomic's quick action." Quentin said

"Dammit..." Alanna curses under her breath.

"And be very glad we got him close to us cause the moment he saw you ladies, he freaked out and about to climb your foot, Vivian." Petire said while smacking Danny on the head.

"What!? You little..."

"N-Now hold on my beautiful Hispanic darling, I-I wasn't trying to get a close view of your delicious thigh and big booty-" Danny made a loud yelp sound when Vivian stomps down near the tiny hunters, sending him behind Atomic.

"Enough, you two." Quentin comes up to Vivian's boot, patting against it. "Right now, we gotta find out who's the target and...try our best not to get caught in this war..."

"May I take a suggestion of seeking Princess Zelda of the Hyrulean Forces? They could use our help." Beta said.

"Zelda?"

"She's one of the commanders of Hyrulean Forces and also..a possible target that Micro asked. Of course we have rules of dealing with royalties, correct?"

"Yep, no killing a king or queen, prince or princess."

"Then we should fool him by getting the blood of the princess after helping we help her and her army out."

"Uhh...One problem, bucket head. We're small! How the hell can we combat a soldier who is way taller than us?" said Petire.

"The girls will fight for us."

"We are?" said Sasha.

"With Atomic's help, of course."

"How does Atomic gonna help us!? He's puny!" Alanna shouted.

"I can change your mind when I punch your face, gihahaha!" Atomic laughs while cracking his knuckles.

"What did you just say!?"

As the two hunters starts to argue, the voices from the field are getting louder and more intense. Quentin, making the two stop fighting, orders Beta to location the Princess while climbing aboard on Glenys's hand. Sure enough, the robot got a location on Zelda, given them directions and makes preparation to take off...Slick isn't asleep yet so they asked him to teleport them there, much to Slick's disappointment...
1221.title: Entering the Battlefield and a Small Problem

1223.content: More lucky-err unlucky targets to choose
1223.title: More targets

choices: Succes! They made it to Ruto's head
Whoops...Slick mess up and ended somewhere on Ruto's body
12231.content:
The hunters had their way out of the portal into a different surroundings. They notice the ground is a bit light blue and quite squishy, even the two large mountains beyond them is blue.

"...Weird place huh?" Danny said with grin.

"Eh, I seen better." Ralph said in his usual sarcasm tone.

"Sarcastic much?"

"...That wasn't sarcastic."

"Enough. What's our target?" Viz said, eager to get this mission done.

"Ahh, I see you hunters have arrive at your destination! Dr. Micro's voice emerges from the device. "I gotta be honest...I never thought my living subjects will live through...Ehehehe.

Viz growls in anger before Quentin calms him down and talks to the doctor. "I take it you only done experiments on corpses right?"

Muhahaha!...Well, not on all dead subjects...Ahem! Anyway, here's your first target. The doctor pulls up a picture of the target. (Ruto - http://zeldawiki.org/images/f/f4/HW_Ruto... )

"Whoa...Is she an alien or something?"

"Incorrect. Mr. Danny. This is Ruto, Princess of the Sea Zora." Beta explains. "Zora are a race of ocean-dwelling creatures reside here in Hyrule-the dimension we are on now. Another information I just acquired: Princess Ruto is the Sage of Water."

"Princess..." Quentin groans.

"Muhahaha! The robot hunter had said it all! Now then, you know the deal: Kill the target and send me any of kind of proof that you did it. I wish you luck, hunters....You'll need it, muhahahaha!" The mad doctor laughs before cutting the communication off.

"...I'm gonna kill him after this crap is done..." Viz said.

"Yes yes we know...Right now, we gotta find Princess Ruto. Beta, locate her." Quentin asked Beta.

"I already did, Mr. Andross. She is here."

"In english, Beta..." Danny said

"Oh forgive me...Before the doctor talk to us about the mission, I did a scanning in this area and the results are...Interesting...According to the results, the land we are standing right now is...Princess Ruto. Which means she is here...Or what I should say-we are ON Princess Ruto's body."

"...What!?" The hunters was shocked except for Zeke and Slick

"Whoa whoa whoa! Let me get this straight...Right now, we are on Princess Ruto's body?"

"Correct, Mister Danny."

"Huh...I guess that's explain those large blue mountains are her breasts...That crazy doc's device really did shrunk us." Petire said with a slight grin. "..Who wants to mountain hiking?"

"We do!!" Danny, Sharper, and Ralph agrees to his pervy idea.

"Don't get any ideas fellas, were here to...'Kill' Princess Ruto and get out of here before we get into big trouble, no pun intended. Beta, what's she doing now?" Quentin asked Beta.

"She is sleeping. A perfect opportunity to take her out. Might I suggest we move to her head before we discuss how to eliminate the target."

"...An excellent idea." Zeke spoke up. "...However, I have an altered plan to...Fool a certain doctor. but that'll have to wait once we reach her head..."

Quentin nodded before turning to the other hunters. "Alright, let's head over to her head. I suggest we teleport to her head instead of tracking her.

"Oh come on! I wanna track her landscape!"

"Danny...You just want to get close to her breasts..." Viz glares at him.

"N-No...I thought it'll be a good exercise hehe..."

"Riiight...Teleport it is. Slick, if you be so kindly."

"Really...? Ugh, fine...I really need a nap" Slick sighed before he surrounded himself in dark purple aura and instantly disappear along with the hunters.
12231.title: Targeting the Sage of Water

choices: Ruto felt it! She's waking up!
122311.content:
Despite Slick's laziness, the hunters have safely landed somewhere on Ruto's face. With his part done, Slick immediately starts snoring. Atomic starts laughing and place the sleeping Slick on his shoulder while the other hunters check to see what part of her face they are on. It didn't take long when Sharper spotted a blue like mountain which is actually her nose. As the hunters move closer to the nose, they can hear her breathing....and it's pretty loud to them.

"Good gravy! It sounds like a hurricane!" Petire yells.

"Don't get too close or you'll get suck in!" Quentin warns the others. "Zeke! You said you have a plan?"

"Yes. We can drain her blood." Zeke said.

"Drain her blood!? What are we Vampires!?"

"No, Master Petire. I believe what Master Zeke is saying: We can drain her blood just a bit, proving we kill Miss Ruto." Beta said.

"Hmm..Not a bad idea." Danny said. "But did the crazy doc said send another proof that we kill her?"

"I notice she wearing earrings...We may have to steal one of them."

"Whoa. Stealing her earring while she's asleep? Not my style for the ladies. Plus, were really tiny. How we gonna lift it up-Oh wait, we got Atomic." Danny chuckles while patting Atomic's back.

"Gihahaha! Well no shit Sherlock! Leave the heavy lifting to me." Atomic said.

"Alright. So how do we proceed?" Quentin ask the fellow hunters for ideas.

"I am capable to sucking her blood, Master Andross. It will take up to one minute tops, however...It might have side effect."

"Which is?"

"There is a 50/50 chance that she will wake up feeling the pain or what you humans call it a 'bug bite'."

"Hmph...Now that's sounds challenging." Viz grins. "Go for it,"

"Ehh might as well...Get to it, Beta."

Beta morphs his hand into a large needle with a small tube attach on the arm and sticks down on Ruto's skin. Beta begins draining her blood into the tube which will take up to one minute. But like Beta said: There is a good chance Ruto will wake feeling the pain...
122311.title: Adventuring on Ruto's Face

choices: Ruto goes back to sleep, with Beta in her mouth.
1223111.content:
"Oww..." utters Ruto quietly and groggily as she wakes from her slumber. "Wha...huh?"

As the giantess opens her mouth to say these words, Beta suddenly begins to lose his balance on her face.

"Danger!!" warns the robot, unable to keep his needle arm poking into Ruto's flesh. "She's waking up! We may be compromised -- "

That is all the other hunters hear before Beta ends up slipping and finally falling into the open mouth, which quickly closes as Ruto unknowingly traps a tiny being inside her.

"Oh...crap..." says Quentin.

(Writer's note: Had a bit of trouble thinking of quality material, so please excuse the shortness of this chapter.)
1223111.title: Oh dear...

choices: Follow Quentin's group under Ruto's bidding
12231112.content:
"Beta!" Sharper yelled while the hunters get on top of Ruto's nose as she gets up from that weird pain she felt.

"We gotta rescue Beta!" said Petire.

"How? Teleport our way in is out of the question cause...Slick's sleeping..." Ralph said in his sarcastic tone. "It'll take a miracle to rescue our dear robot friend..."

"...Still don't know you're being sarcastic or not..."

"I'm not, this is serious..."

"Enough you two! Beta's life is in stake! Quentin, what's your order?" Danny asked the leader, only to notice Quentin is looking at the other way. "Uhh Quentin?"

"...I think she notice us..." Quentin said calmly.

"...Y-Your kidding...?" The other hunters, expect for Zeke since he also looking at the other direction, turn around, only to see a massive view of Ruto's purple eyes looking down at the hunters...And is quite upset about her rude awakening.

"Who are you!? And how dare you awake me in my slumber!?" Ruto yells at the tiny hunters, covering their ears due to her loud god like voice...It was quite painful for them.

"Damn! She sure does have a loud voice!" Danny said. "But I still wanna date her!"

"Really Danny!?" Petire slaps him on the head.

Quentin sighs and tries to talk to the princess. "Forgive our uhh...Intrusions...We are the NanoCorps, we come from the uhh...Future...We enter your dimension by mistake and try to wake you up." Quentin lies his way through...And he was not the type to lie about, maybe for not telling that they are here to 'kill' her is somewhat a good thing...If she believes it.

"NanoCorps? Future?..." Ruto said, still confuse. "How did you get so small...Are your race tiny?"

"Uhh...Y-Yes. Our race is very tiny, tiny enough that other races doesn't see us.." Petire lies. "But more importantly...We are deeply sorry for waking you up...Is there anything you can think of to uhh...Spare our lives our intrusions...Oh wait-" Petire covers his mouth from what he just said, causing the other hunters to look at him in shock and anger. Ruto lets out a musing 'hmm', thinking of what she could do to them...

"I may have an idea for you tiny people, it'll be most pleasing to have company...Unlike my 'husband'...But you people will make up on my 'husband''s place." Ruto giggles with glee. To the hunters...It's not gonna be swell..

"...What the hell did I just done..." Petire face palms himself.
12231112.title: Under the presence of Princess of the Zoras

122311121.content:
Ruto grabs the hunters with two large blue fingers, she held the hunters in front of her face, getting a closer look of the tiny people. The hunters got a very nice view of her beautiful purple eyes and seemingly glowing under the light, of course, Danny was into it.

"My goddess! I never seen such creatures like you...Especially that silver looking monster! He's repulsive!" Ruto said in a...compliment way.

"Hey! I resent that remark! You wanna get punch!?" Atomic threatens the princess, causing Ruto to glare down at the hunters.

"Easy, Atomic...This IS the princess of Zoras, we can't kill her..." Quentin whisperers to him. "Right now...We have no choice but to uhh...Obey her orders..."

"What!? Are you shitting me!?" Viz whisperers in an anger tone. "I rather go dive in her mouth and rescue Beta than this."

"I think obeying her orders is right choice...For now." Zeke spoke up. "If we can get her to trust us...We may be able to get her blood and accessory to fool the doctor and rescue Beta."

"Still...I'm a bit worry about Beta. Sure he can survive inside her mouth?" Petire whisperers.

"Beta will be fine, he is a highly intelligent and powerful robot. He'll survive...No matter what size he is."

"Ahem! Servants!" Ruto calls for their attention. "Are ignoring me...?" The hunters quickly turns to the large princess, shaking their heads. Ruto gently place the hunters at the palm of her hand.

"Good! I have a list of chores for you tiny people and since you interrupted my lovely sleep...I have a special chore just for you." Ruto smiles. "But that'll be the last one after you done the rest of my chores."

"...I'm starting to think this won't go end well..Ahem, I mean...What is thy will, O great giant blue one?" Petire said with a silent chuckle or two.

Ruto ponder for a bit, what could she do for her tiny servants....?
122311121.title: Servants to Ruto

1223111211.content:
Without much of a choice, the hunters allow themselves to be lowered to Ruto's large (to them) feet and try their level best to give as good a massage as possible. Surprisingly, the giantess enjoys it!

"Not bad, servants," says Ruto, before...
1223111211.title: The Smell of De-Feet

122311122.content:
While the giantess debates what to do with the tiny hunters, Beta is hanging for dear...life?...onto Ruto's slimy tongue.

"I hope Master Quentin is alright," says Beta to no individual in particular, "and that robots can't be digested."

Luckily, he won't have to find out the hard way...yet. Still, his grip is starting to give way...
122311122.title: In Ruto's Mouth

1223111221.content:
Beta holds on tight to the massive tongue when Ruto talks to the hunters in order not to flail around or worse - being swallowed. Beta, then lets go the tongue as soon the tongue is motionless and turns on a light hidden in his chest...Beta survey the monstrous cave like mouth, seeing the saliva dripping from the top, even splashing on the robot. Lucky for him, Beta's not human and can simply shake off the saliva.

"Quite intriguing. The Zora princess's mouth." Beta active his rocket boost under his feet, lifting him off the wet spot. He fly ups to where he is away from the tongue, "Must return to NannoCorp. Unfortunately, the only path I can go through is closed." Beta said to himself as he sees a line of teeth close the path to freedom...

"Perhaps drilling out of here will do, but I don't think Master Quentin or Miss Ruto will like it. Or maybe..." Beta got an idea and flies towards the uvula which is humongous to him. "Hitting the uvula will cause Miss Ruto to gag, open her mouth and I should able to escape." Beta then prepares himself to strike at the uvula...
1223111221.title: Rough Day for Beta

choices: Siphon some blood while Ruto is vulnerable!
12231112211.content:
Quentin and his group are currently stranded on the open palm of the giantess Ruto, pondering a plan to accomplish their quest for her blood...or at least escape with their lives intact.

"I don't enjoy having my slumber disturbed," says Ruto, frustrated. "And now all of you will -- "

That is all the giantess can say before she falls prey to a sudden gagging fit. Quentin and crew manage to avoid a possibly-deadly fall, while their robotic companion is seen flying by rocket-boost power out of Ruto's mouth before landing by the rest of the team.

"I may be a robot," states Beta, "but even robots do not see enjoyment in being consumed."

What is the group's next course of action?
12231112211.title: Running Gag (wow that was bad...)

choices: Yes, and they deliver the blood to Dr. Van Micro
No, Ruto recovers and catches them
Yes, but they somehow lose their prize
122311122111.content:
"Our target is vulnerable!" announces Zeke to his comrades as Ruto gags and continues to suffer. "Now's our chance!"

Beta seizes the opportunity and morphs one of his arms into a convenient needle just for this kind of task. He pokes it into Ruto's blue arm flesh, fills his arm syringe with enough of Ruto's blood, and quickly removes said syringe from the giantess's skin before rocket-boosting back to his allies.

"I suggest we retreat while we still can!" advises Beta. But do Quentin and team get away?
122311122111.title: Now's Our Chance

1223111221112.content:
"We've got enough of her blood," says Quentin to his team, "so let's find Dr. Van Micro before she -- "

That is all he can say before Ruto grabs the bunch, having recovered from her coughing fit.

"So you were after my life force?!" questions Ruto in anger. "This will not go unpunished..."
1223111221112.title: So Close...

choices: The hunters wound up on Ruto...Again
The hunters wound up on Ruto's bed.
12231112211122.content:
The hunters are in for it now...Just when they succeed of getting Ruto's blood, Ruto recovers from her gagging problem and grabs the hunters before they escape. Now they are at the mercy of an angry princess of Zoras who is a thousand times bigger than them, even making Atomic, the largest hunter in the group, look like a tiny silver ant. Ruto begins squeezing the hunter, causing immense pain to Danny, The Three Recon Stooges, Viz, and Slick(who suddenly woke up during this mess...). Atomic, however, due to his metallic like skin, has no effect on him, but was waited for Quentin's orders to break free or something else.

"Gihaha! That tickles...Anyway, want me do the honors?" Atomic asked the group.

"N-No...Slick! You up and about?" Quentin asked the sloth psychic.

"Yeah...She interrupted me with my sleep..." Slick groans.

"Wh-What an irony.." Danny laugh and groan at the same time.

"Can you teleport us away from her? We don't wanna have to hurt the princess..."

"On it..." Slick's body surrounded himself in purple aura, then the rest of the hunters and disappears right in front of giant Zora. Ruto gasp in shock as her little intruders got away from her.

"H-How did they...Grrr....I'll find you, tiny people and when I do, I'm going to teach you how to respect the princess!!" Ruto roars in anger and furiously begins her search for the tiny people.
12231112211122.title: Wrath of the Water Sage

122311122111221.content: In a purple flash, the hunters find themselves on a soft surface, unbeknownst to Ruto. Quentin looks around and sees...

"What the heck..." wonders Quentin as he sees a lake of greenish liquid near him and his team. Then a thunderous rumble assaults their eardrums...

"What a place to warp to," says Petire in frustration.

Ruto, meanwhile, is looking for her tiny servants when she feels her stomach growl.

"I guess I'd better get something to eat," says Ruto to herself, with a hand to her tummy.
1223111221112211.title: What a place to warp to...

choices: "We'll assault her stomach walls and make her sick!"
"We'll have to let nature run its course..."

"Optimal plan, Master!" replies Beta, before the whole team spreads about the stomach and really lets its rubbery walls have it.

On the outside, Ruto feels a sudden, sharp pain in her belly.

"What the..." is all the giantess can say before her suffering increases in intensity. Feeling sick, Ruto is about to upchuck the Nanocorps...
122311122111221121.title: A Gut Feeling

1223111221112211213.content:
Ruto, in her sickness, is about to puke up everything in her stomach, but regains her composure in time to swallow her meal back down...

...with the exception of the Nanocorps, who remain in the giantess's mouth.

"Now what?" Petire asks his leader.

"We'll need to keep this internal assault up to escape from Ruto's body," replies Quentin. The team now proceeds to pummel the teeth and tongue of their captor, and...

choices: ...Ruto started moving her head in her sleep
...Ruto begin breathing through her nose which was strong enough to suck them in
1223112.content:
After one minute later, Beta manages to suck up most of Ruto's blood The rest of the hunters all looked straight at the giant closed eye of the giant sea creature which, fortunately for them, did not opened one bit

"Blood drain complete" said Beta showing the others the blood that he sucked

"Awesome Beta way the go there pal" said Danny

"You'll real welcome Master Danny" replied Beta as he placed the blood container inside the cabinet on his front part of his body

"Alright now that we got Ruto's blood without even waking her up now I guess time to get one of her giant purple earrings" said Ralph

"Woohoo now it's my time to shine" said Atomic proudly as he flexes his muscles

"Well we should get going now Slick, It time to...." Ralph pauses as he sees Slick now asleep on Atomic's back "God damn"

"You do realized that were about half way towards one of the earrings, don't you?" said Viz

"Yeah considering that we are about the sizes of fleas and ticks" said Ralph once again sarcastically

"Alright now it's not a good time to chitchat Right now we're still on our mission to 'kill' Ruto" said Quentin "Let's go straight to the nearist one over there" Quentin pointed to the right side of Ruto's head

"I better hope I don't get any foot cramps again since that time on training day" groaned Ralph

The hunters all begin to walk towards the other side of Ruto's head when suddenly...
1223112.title: Success

12231121.content:
As the hunters journey toward the other side of Ruto's head, the giantess suddenly rolls onto her side in her sleep, causing the tinies to fall onto her bed! The landing, thankfully, is rather soft.

"Well, crap." mutters Quentin to himself.

"Not to worry," says Zeke, "we still have a chance to secure one of Ruto's earrings."

With that, the hunters climb back onto Ruto and make their way toward her ear, when...
12231121.title: Do a Barrel Roll...wait...

choices: ...and Ruto falls asleep again, so they escape
...but Ruto sees them, thinking they're bugs!
122311211.content:
Just as Beta is about to begin removing Ruto's earring, the giantess begins to stir - her eyes slowly open, and she rolls onto her back, having felt something on her head. Luckily, the hunters are unharmed by the ensuing fall.

The tinies are about to make a run for it...
122311211.title: Wakey Wakey!

1223112113.content:
"We'd better go while the going's good..." says Quentin. The tiny hunters then begin their hasty retreat, when...

"Bugs!!" shrieks Ruto, having awoken fully and seen the miniature figures fleeing from her.

In a panic, Ruto attempts to squash the "bugs" with one fist...
1223112113.title: Bugs!!

choices: They decided to tell her their plans
Zeke throws a flash bag at Ruto and make escape.
12231121132.content:
Ruto's massive fist slams in front of the hunters as they trying to escape, nearly being crush underneath it. Ruto then lets out a gasp when she spot one of the 'bugs' carrying one of her earrings and was quite furious to see the little vermin of not only crawling all over her body but stealing her jewelry as well.

"You disgusting bugs! How dare you steal my earring!" Ruto use her other hand to crush them again, but this time the hunters were ready to counter her hand. Quentin sends Atomic to counter it with his own fist. As Ruto's hand is closing in for the kill, Atomic cracks his knuckles and delivers a powerful punch on Ruto's palm, causing the young princess to shriek out in pain, pulling her hand back away from the hunters.

"Move it, guys!" With Ruto preoccupied, the hunters jumps off the bed to make their escape. Ruto, meanwhile, blows this stinging pain away even kissing it. She couldn't believe those little bugs pack a lot of bite...almost felt like a punch. Intriguing, she decided to capture the so call bugs and determine if they are bugs or not. Ruto quickly uses her water magic to summon a large wall of water in front of the hunters, stopping them in their tracks.

"What the...? Where did that come from?" said Danny while touching the water wall before he was interrupted by a loud thump...Ruto is heading their way with one of her hand on her hip.

"Ahahaha! There's no escape, bugs! I was going to let you go before getting my earring...But you bugs injure my beautiful hand! And it still hurt!" Ruto stomps down in angry causing the hunters to jump off the ground.

"Damn, Atomic...Did you break her hand?" Petire asked him.

"To be honest, not really. Can't harm the princess badly right? I just give a little punch is all." said Atomic.

"Huh...Even being small, you still pack a punch." Petire chuckles before a familiar loud boom is getting closer to them. "Okay, back to this situation...Completely forgot about her water magic which could be a problem. Shall we try to escape again or perhaps...Rough her up a bit?"

"Well...Atomic nearly broke her hand, which isn't surprising." said Quentin.

"I told you, it was just a little punch!"

"However...It shown that the device haven't lower our powers, which makes things somewhat easier.." Quentin notice Ruto is upon them, towering over them like a goddess which Danny enjoys the lovely sight of her. Though still angry at the bugs for stealing her earring, she crotches down to get a good view of them..Ruto's eyes widen in shock due to the little bugs aren't actually bugs but tiny humans!

"Oh my...You all are-I mean, how in the...Ugh, I mean...Just who are you guys!?" Ruto demands an explanation from the hunters.
12231121132.title: Path Blocked!

122311213.content:
...suddenly a huge shadow cast over the micro hunters Upon a closer look, they soon realized what it was....it was Ruto's giant light blue hand and she was going to scratch them off of her because apparently they have created an itch to her

"Oh god she's going to crush us all with those giant slender fingers of hers" yelled Sharper

The hunters watch the giant finger slowly approaching to where they are when suddenly a familiar voice calls in

"Hey guys what's all this loud noise all the sudden" Slick have woken up from Sharper's yelling "You know guys I could really use a quick nap and..."

"There's no time for your excuses Slick Just get us out of here now" interrupted Viz

"Sorry but my powers is still recharging right now So I may not..."

"Who cares?! Just take this big risk already We don't want to die today" yelled Danny

Just as they begin to argue, the hunters...
122311213.title: The itch

1223112132.content: As the hunters continue to argue, Ruto's gigantic hands knock the entire team off of her body as she scratches the itch they've caused. Quentin and crew find themselves falling at an uncomfortably fast pace, so Slick attempts to teleport everybody away with what little power remains...
1223112132.title: Free Fallin'

122331.content:
"Mwahahaha!" a wicked, male voice laughs to the hunters. "I, Dr. Van Micro, have heard about your many adventures, Nanocorps, and I've a special mission for you. I need you to find and assassinate Anju, the caretaker of Cuccos in the Legend of Zelda universe. Bring me evidence of her demise and you'll be rewarded...maybe."

Before Quentin can question the doctor's intentions, a bright light engulfs the hunters, and all goes blank.

The huntets eventually awaken...
122331.title: Targeting the Cucco Caretaker

1223311.content:
"Wha...huh?" Quentin wakes to the sight of a giantess's feet...they look to be the feet of Anju, the Cucco caretaker and the apparent target for the Nanocorps.

"Our target looks too innocent to kill," muses Zeke out loud.

"Big whoop!" responds Petire. "Whichever reward the Doc is offering, I want it!"

"Perhaps we could fool the doctor into thinking we've killed Anju," suggests Quentin. "All we need is some of her blood. Beta?"

"Already on it, Master Quentin," says Beta before morphing an arm into a needle with which he might siphon some blood from the sleeping giantess. He pokes said needle into Anju's left arm, aaaand...
1223311.title: Sleeping on the Job

12233111.content:
Petire is afraid that Anju will wake up due to the prick in her arm...but the giantess remains asleep. With nothing else to get in the way, Beta begins the process of draining blood from Anju's arm until his syringe is just about full.

Patching up the giantess's wound with a bandage the hunters managed to pull out of nowhere, the team begins their retreat...
12233111.title: A Stealthy Siphoning Session

1223312.content:
As the hunters open their eyes, they were surprise to see a flock of giant birds heading their way. The hunters brace themselves for a battle but was relief that the flock of the birds was block by a large face in front of them. The hunters move a few distance from the Cuccos before thinking a plan to find Anju

"Oooh I hate chickens!" Petire yells at the large feathery flock as they trying to peck or gobble the hunters up.

"Actually they are called Cuccos in this world, quite similar to chicken." said Beta.

"Still I hate them clucking bastards! Pecking on my foot and some damn rooster chasing my ass for nothing! The only good thing about them is you can fry them up and chow down, ehehehe."

"Anyway, the doc said this is where Anju, the caretaker of Cucco, resides here. All we need to do is find her and...Possibly get her blood cause sounds like she not a bad one." said Quentin. "Also...We might have to stay clear from Cucco pen, unless you wanted to get eaten..."

"Can we just pound them?" Atomic suggest while cracking his knuckles.

"Or skewer them." Viz smirks.

"Hell yeah! Burn them feathery bastards so I can eat their giant legs!"

:...You really hate chickens, huh?" said Ralph

"Forgive me to interrupt, but our target is spotted and she's over there-in the Cucco pen." Beta pointed at the pen when the cuccos who were trying to catch the hunters begin running towards a woman carrying a feeding bag. The short haired woman appears to be a elf due to her long ears wearing a brown button shirt with white long sleeves, long blue skirt with wave like designs on the bottom and brown heeled shoes.She is happily feeding the cuccos, showing her cute smile, cute enough to made Danny drooling.

"Damn! She's a cutie one!"

"Yeah yeah...Problem is she's in the pen...We could teleport onto her body, of course we have to hang on very tightly or being thrown off into those cuccos." said Quentin. "Or we could wait til she finish feeding the birds and exit the pen."

"Waiting is the right choice. The gate is right near us and we will hatch onto her once she exits the pen, We really don't want to hurt the poor chickens under the care of this nice woman." said Zeke.

"Poor, my ass!" Petire outburst again. "I rather snap their beaks off and throw them into the fire!"

Quentin sighs and thinks about the choices he made...Few mintues later, he decided to choose...
1223312.title: Near the Pen of Cuccos

choices: Wait for her to fall asleep.
12233122.content:
Quentin decides that waiting is the best option now. Anju, meanwhile, finishes feeding the Cuccos and exits the pen, happy, but drowsy from the day's work. She begins to walk toward her bedroom for a nap.

"I think now is our chance to pursue our target," advises Zeke.

Taking his advice, Quentin and crew stealthily follow the giantess toward her bedroom, but what is their plan of action?
12233122.title: Good move.

122332.content: Link's childhood friend and Sage of the Forest?
122332.title: Saria

1223322.content: The kind hearted girl who takes care of Epona?
1223322.title: Malon

12233222.content: The evil sorceress from Hyrule Warriors?
12233222.title: Cia

choices: On second thought...Cia has another idea.
122332221.content:
The NanoCorp have arrived to their destination as the group emerges from the bright portal and landed safely on the tilted floor. The hunters scanned this dark surrounding room and notice many portraits of a man with blonde hair...And a statue of the same man...It appears they are in somebody's room or chamber...With a crush on this man. But before they could do anything else, the device begins beeping and a hologram of Dr. Micro appears before the hunters.

"Mwhahaha! I see you hunters made it! Excellent!" the scientist laughs with glee. "I'm amusing...You seeing this interesting discolorations, no?"

"Yeah...A bit creepy if ya ask me." Petire said while staring one of the portraits. "This target must be a really big fan of this fella..."

"Mwhahaha...You could say that, but she does have...Feelings for this uhhh...'handsome' young man." The scientist explains. "Let me tell a info or rather...A story about your target."

"Oooh! Story time!" Atomic laughs.

"Yes yes, gather round children, mwhahaha!...Ahem..We'll skip this unimportant part...Blah blah blah...Ahh here we go, ahem!...In the land that is called Hyrule, which you hunters are in, there was once a powerful sorceress that has watches over the balance of the Triforce...You don't need to know about that one." The doctor said, the hunters was slightly confuse of what's he talking about, especially the Triforce part...

"Anyway...Skip that part...Ahh yes, As she sees through ages and times, there is but one unique soul that caught her attention...A soul of the Hero of the Legend that has reborn when Hyrule needs the best to fight evil. Of course she wanted the Hero of the Legend, but sadly he's already bound to another soul...She was quite sadden by this and a single tear appears on her face..."

"Gee...That's kinda sad." said Ralph. The hunters look at him knowing his tone is always sarcasm. "...It's not sarcasm, guys."

"What happen next, doc?" Quentin asked the scientist.

"Let see...While the beautiful sorceress was preoccupied, something...change her...something evil...This evil presence has managed to enter her heart and pushed the light away, changing her once curiosity...into a evil desperate desire who only wanted the Hero of the Legend's soul herself,..The rest of the info-err story is blank."

"Whoa...So this evil bastard must have corrupted the sorceress, but for what purpose?" Danny asked.

"I'm guessing here, but probably take over Hyrule." said Sharper.

"Could be...But that's none of our concern. The target should be around here in the Temple of Souls, which you all are on now. Her name is Cia, by the way. Now be really careful, this is one sorceress you gotta end quickly...Or you'll may end up as her...Playthings...Good luck, hunters!" Dr. Micro laughs before signing off.

"Okay...We're going after a crazy but dangerous sorceress...I hope she's cute."

"Oh for pete's sake...Q-man, mind if ya talk some sense into Danny?" Petire said to the leader, but notice he was looking at other direction. "...Quentin?"

"Guys...I think we're being watch..." Quentin said calmly.

"Really? That's impossible...There's no way someone able to see us small hunters..."

"...Yeah we're definitely being watch...I can feel it" Viz said while getting his robotic arms ready. As the hunter prepares for any ambush attacks, they were startle by a feminine laughter, echoing throughout the room.

"Aww damn...It's her, isn't it?" Ralph said.

"Show yourself, ya witch! Come out and fight like a...woman." Petire threatens the mysterious voice...Sort of. While the hunters trying to locate the voice, Beta detected a high level threat...Above them.

"Danger detected! Danger Detected! She's above-" It was the last words Beta said before the hunters was cover in darkness and for some reason...Flesh. A few minutes later, the hunters regain their sights and got a nice view of a purple eye with a menacing stare...The hunters realize it was the evil sorceress Cia, the target they were looking for, who actually caught them instead! Now standing on the fleshy landscape which is her palm, they got a good view of the giant sorceress. Cia is quite a beautiful woman as she wearing a rather revealing dress that matches her personality and Danny, as always, is google eyeing her curvy body, especially her cleavage...

"Whoa! What a babe!! Hey cutie, how about you and me go on a date?" Danny tries wooing the giant Cia, but gets a slap on the head by Petire.

"Oh brother...ahem." Quentin steps forward to confront Cia. "I'm Quentin Andross and we are the NanoCorps. We are on a mission to-"

"I know..." Cia interrupts the young Drangua words with her booming voice. "You didn't think I would know...? You are here to kill me..."

"...So it's true, you have been watching us when we appear..." Zeke spoke up. "Then tell me this: Why didn't you kill us earlier?"

Cia begins to laugh to his question, shaking their poor tiny ears once more. "Let just say...I'm a bit interested of you small creatures...Especially this one." Cia pointed to Quentin. "He almost like my beloved Link...though much taller." the hunters look at Quentin as he laughs nervously at her comment.

"But...It's too bad you're here to kill me. So...I have to kill you all instead!" Cia summons her specter from other hand and brought it close to the tiny hunters.

"Annnd...She gonna kill us. Get that bitch, boys!" Petire orders the hunters.

"Get your ass on gear!" Viz yells at Petire. The hunters gets ready for the battle that could go down in their own history book...
.
122332221.title: Targeting the Evil Half of the Guardian of Time

choices: Cia fights the hunters by herself.
1223322211.content:
With weapons and magic on both sides are up, NanoCorp and Cia are about throw down on each other. With no time to waste, Viz made his first move by jumping off Cia’s hand, activating his stealth mode. Cia foresaw their moves and tilts her hand so the hunters would fall to their death, but it seems the hunters foresaw this as well. The hunters who can’t fly jumps on Atomic’s back while Beta and Slick flies above Cia’s hand, Atomic makes a big leap when Cia’s hand begins tilting, landed on her arm and begins running across her arm.

“You little pest!” Cia scowls at the tiny hunters and was about to use her magic when she felt a sharp pain on her nose, making her yell out in pain. Cia looks upon her nose and spotted that assassin who disappear earlier! ”You! How did you…?”

“Surprise, bitch…” Viz smirks before delivering another painful hit on her skin, causing the dark sorceress to yell in pain again. Fed up with his attacks…and his attitude, Cia starts casting a spell on Viz…Of course that was also stopped by Beta’s attacks. Beta summons his missile launcher, firing at his target. Cia saw his attacks and creates a dark ward around her, blocking the missiles.

“She’s distracted! Spread out, guys!” Quentin orders the team.

“Spread out!?...Does that mean-“

“Yes, Danny…”

“Hot damn!!” Without hesitation, Danny jumps off of Atomic and dives towards the only part he’ll enjoy while it last: Cia’s chest.
“…Beta. Make sure Danny is still alive.” Zeke communicates to the robot.

“Of course, Master Zeke.”

With the orders carried out, one by one the hunters spread out to confuse and defeat Cia: Atomic decided to attack her left leg, Zeke goes towards her left shoulder, the Three Recon decided to attack her stomach, Beta and Slick remains in the air for their airstrikes, Viz stays on her nose and Quentin decided to join up with Viz.

Cia saw those tiny pests spreading out and gets pretty upset about this, even Viz taunting on how ugly she is when frowned up…Cia had quite enough of this, especially on a certain hunter…”…You...Do you little bugs know who you’re dealing with!? I’ll make you all suffer…But I’ll save my ‘special’ moment with you, little man…” Cia looks down on Quentin with a menacing smile, causing the young Drangua to shiver…
1223322211.title: Showtime! NanoCorp vs. Cia!

12233222112.content: So who's the ally or allies that Cia's summon?
12233222112.title: Cia's henchmen

choices: Follow the tiny battle of Quentin/Viz and Volga/Wizzro
Cia goes after the other hunters
122332221121.content:
Annoyed at these tiny assassins all over her body, Cia decided to get 'help' from her most trusted members in her Dark Force army...Though one of them is not quite trustable just yet.

The first one comes in her mind is the Dragon Knight Volga: Powerful and fierce warrior who not actually human, but a dragon. He favors the lance which is called Dragon Lance and has fire element to burn his foes. He is quite loyalty to Cia due to the fact that he sold his soul to her to gain more power, he is perfect for killing the NanoCorps...But will he even kill that silver monster that was with them? It's possible...But she'll see if he can...

The next one is the one who is not the trusted one and can turn on her in just a second, but she'll make sure the wizard will do her bidding. This wizard names is Wizzro: A strange creature with powerful dark magic who is actually a ring. While he was a ring, he lured the victims into wearing the ring, allowing him to absorb their essence and condensing their deceased souls into a single, malevolent spirit which he is now. But due to his greed of power, he will turn against Cia like he did before.

With her mind being set, Cia's body begins to glow under her dark magic. The hunters on each of Cia's body parts notice the malevolent aura and Viz decided to interrupt the casting by hitting her nose again.

"Just what are you up to, witch?" Viz digs his razor sharp blade into her skin, causing the dark sorceress to wench in pain, but manage to resume her casting. Just as Viz about to attack her again, a weapon from out of nowhere clash against Viz's blade and quickly backs away. "What the hell!? Just who the hell are you!?" He snarls at the lance wielding warrior.

"Hmph...That's my line, you brat...I should be asking Cia why am I summon..and gotten this small..." The dragon knight looks up at Cia's massive purple eyes before looking at Viz. "...Whatever it is, I don't really care. But if it means to fight an intruder, then that's good enough for me." Volga twirls his lance before breathing fire up in the air. "Come, brat! Face me in battle!"

"Sounds good! Bring it on, old man!" Viz smiles with joy and charges after the dragon knight.

---------------------------

Quentin, meanwhile, was scaling up Cia's neck before seeing a bright light of fire on Cia's nose.

"Looks like Cia able to summon some help...Better go help him before he gets killed." Quentin said while resuming his climbing, Before the young leader can reach her face, a weird and creepy laugh appears behind him...He look over his shoulder to see a dark creature with one glowing red eye and wearing a cloak. "...And I thought Atomic was ugly...Luckily he didn't hear that, heh."

"He he he...A comedian, hmm?" The creature chuckles evilly. "Well, I don't care how did I get so small...But you are a pest to Cia and must be squash." Wizzro summons two dark creatures from both sides, charging after Quentin.

Quentin reacts by grabbing his sword and struck one against the head while kicking the other one with his leg encased in dragon scales. Both of the creatures disappears, causing the dark wizard both annoyed and delighted.

"Oh ho...You are quite strong. But nevertheless, you must be destroy, he he he!" Wizzro laughs before charging at Quentin

"Ugh...Sorry, Viz. Looks like I'm going to be here for awhile..." Quentin sighs before readying himself for a magic battle with the dark wizard.
122332221121.title: The Dragon Knight and Twisted Wizard

1223322212.content:
The bounty hunters and the sorceress Cia are about to wage war on each other, Cia scan these tiny assassin like creatures to see what powers they have, it couldn’t be possible to kill her if they don’t have any magic or special powers these little bugs have…She did notice two of the hunters that pose a big threat against her: Atomic and Beta. She glance at the big silver hunter…He possess an incredible strength…Strong enough to break one of her fingers off. She then glances at the robot…She never seen such a creature or knight like this, well besides Volga but this little black armor creature can summon selective weapons out of thin air…Biting her lower lip, Cia thinks they may got an upper hand…But then, she gets an idea….

“Hold your weapons, my tiny assassins…” Cia calls out. “Before we start…I wanna to know why you-strong tiny man-want me dead?” The hunters notice her tone is a bit…Seductive…And this ‘strong tiny man’ was meant for Quentin...

“…I think she’s flirty you, Q-man.” Petire whispers to him.

“I…Noticed…” Quentin sighs. “Ahem…We came here to…Kill you under orders of Dr. Van Micro, a brilliant genius who giving us an interesting challenge.”

“Enough talk. Let’s kill her already.” Viz said with one of his arms change into a chain gun. In order to make this into a friendly talk, Cia makes her specter disappears and tries to…Sweeten her talk.

“Now now, I cannot be killed just yet…Not until I have the Triforce and my ‘hero’ in my hands. Perhaps we should…work this out?”

“You mean making a deal…” said Zeke. “What kind of deal?”

Cia smiles sweetly (or menacing) to the tiny hunters in her hand, Quentin notice her finger comes towards him, petting his head and stroking his backside, causing the poor boy to shiver. “Since you ‘rudely’ enter my chamber without permission, I want you all to be my servants…Except this young man.” Cia pointed to Quentin which shocks him and the other hunters.

“Uhh…Why me…?” Quentin asked her.

“Mmm…Let just say…I like you.” Cia's two fingers, each bigger and wider than the hunters, descend and grabs Quentin before he react. He was lifted near her mouth, large enough to eat entire city with one gulp...Quentin thought she might try to do something sneaky and prepares to counters whatever it is…But he wasn’t expected this one: Cia brings him to her lips…and kiss him, causing the Drangua to blush and Danny to sob over the lucky kiss…

“…And if we refused?” Zeke interrupts.

“Then I’ll have to kill you all. Seeing you being crush under my power will defiantly pleases me until my hero will be mine…And the young man here, will be my plaything.”

“P-Plaything…?” Quentin groans.

“Then try to kill us, you bitch. We refuse to be your servants.” Viz snaps at Cia and was about to attack her again before Zeke intervenes once more.

“That’s…quite a deal you got there…If we do accept the deal, what are you going to do with our leader?”

Cia looks at Quentin with a seductive look In her eyes and smiles.“That’s between me and him. Now make your choice, my tiny friends!”

The hunters thought about the deal…If they could get Cia to trust them, she could help them fool the doctor by sending a blood sample. But if they refuse, then they got no choice but to ‘kill’ her. However, there’s another problem: Quentin in Cia’s grasp…What she gonna do to the poor leader? The hunters decided to…
1223322212.title: Cia's Offer

12233222121.content:
"Fine," says Quentin, "we accept your deal, Cia."

"What?!" whines Petire.

"Dude, are you insane?!" complains Viz.

"Excellent choice," says Cia. "Now, I need you tiny things to..."
12233222121.title: Accepting the offer

choices: Follow Cia and the other tinies
12233222122.content:
After some deliberation amongst themselves, Quentin shouts a "No deal!" at the giantess.

"Not afraid to die, huh?" mocks Cia. "Very well, then." She then snatches up Quentin, to the shock of his team!

"I think I know a fitting grave for you, tiny one..." taunts Cia before dropping Quentin into her open mouth. It's dark and moist in there, and the nano-assassin tries to make a quick getaway, but his captor tilts her head back and swallows him into the depths of her body.
12233222122.title: Bad move, partner...

choices: They enter her stomach and find Quentin.
They find Quentin, but Cia recovers, trapping them in her.
122332221221.content:
Cia taunts the other tiny hunters by licking her lips, showing them the fate they could share with Quentin.

"I think YOU should be next," says the giantess, pointing at Petire.

"Me?!" reacts Petire with rage. "You don't know who you're messing with!"

Before Cia can grab a hold of Petire, Beta morphs one of his arms into a taser-like weapon that jabs the villainess's arm, paralyzing her.

"This may be our chance to rescue Quentin!" announces Zeke before he and the other hunters rush one by one into Cia's open mouth.
122332221221.title: A Stunning Comeback

122332222.content: The good sorceress from Hyrule Warriors?
122332222.title: Lana

1223322222.content: The female version of Link? (in case you don't know who that is, here's a pic of her: http://zeldawiki.org/images/0/05/HWL_Lin...)
1223322222.title: Linkle

122332222221.content: The imp form that most fellas think its cute or the beautiful Twilight form?
122332222221.title: Which form?

1223322222221.content:
"So that's our next target?" Quentin face-palmed as the group saw a blue light fluttering around a blond male hero called Link as the fairy giggled and repeated words of advice into Link's pointed ears. "This is going to be a long day."

"True that," remarked Slick as he yawned, "I think it's quite simple, but Navi the fairy won't be able to notice us." Navi continues fluttering her dragonfly wings elegantly as she hovers in the air. "Do we teleport now?"
1223322222221.title: Hey, listen!

123.content: Righto then! Whose the lucky target?
123.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

12333.content: Sonic's chipmunk friend and lover?
12333.title: Sally Acorn?

123332.content: How about this feline princess?
123332.title: Blaze the Cat

1233322.content: This cute and feisty feline?
1233322.title: Honey the Cat

12333222.content: This cute girl who is Tails's love interest?
12333222.title: Cosmo the Plant like Humanoid

124.content:
Alrighty, then. Final Fantasy it is!

Choose your giantess.
124.title: Final Fantasy, huh? Cool!

choices: The hunters end up in Tifa's bedroom
They end up in the streets of Midgar
1241.content:
"Mwahahahaha!" the hunters hear from sermingly nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps. I, Dr. Van Micro have heard of your many adventures, and I've another mission for you. I need you to find and assassinate Tifa Lockhart, of the Final Fantasy universe of video games. But to ensure total stealth, you'll all have to be shrunk..."

"Shrunk?" reacts Petire. "That's the dumbest thing I've ever -- "

Then a bright flash engulfs the hunters, and all goes blank.
1241.title: Targeting the Cute Fist-Fighter

choices: Drain some blood while she's sleeping
Wait for her to wake up
12411.content:
After some time, the Nanocorps awaken in what looks to be a bedroom. A rather GIGANTIC bedroom.

Or...are they just...shrunken?

"I guess the Doc wasn't kidding..." Petire sighs.

Looking towards the towering bed, the hunters see a familiar-looking giantess fast asleep. Black hair, bare midriff, cute skirt...

It's Tifa!

So, what's the plan?
12411.title: Tifa's Bedroom

choices: Yes, and she's not too happy...
124111.content:
"Wait, how are we gonna kill this towering beauty?!" Danny asks.

"At our current size, it'd take hours, maybe days," says Zeke, "but perhaps we can fool the mad doctor with a sample of Tifa's blood."

"Interesting...Beta, I need you to drain some blood from Tifa's arm," Quentin orders.

"Understood," replies Beta.

The robotic genius then morphs one of his arms into a syringe and pokes it into the soft skin of the hunters' giantess target.

Does Tifa wake up and feel this?
124111.title: Draining the Cute Giantess's Blood

1241112.content:
Before Beta can complete his siphoning of Tifa's blood, the giantess begins to move a bit. She's waking up!!

Fortunately, the robot removes his syringe-arm before Tifa looks down at the tiny hunters, groggy from being disturbed.

But how does she react to what she sees?
1241112.title: ...or is she?

12411122.content:
"Wha...huh?" Tifa mumbles, still waking up. "Tiny...people?"

"Crap..!" Petire panics. "Our cover's blown!!" He is promptly smacked on the head by Vivian.

"Hello, Tifa..." Quentin introduces himself to the Nanocorps' target, with little else to cling onto.

"Hm? How do you know my name?" Tifa asks the tiny hunters. "Who are you? And why are you all so little?"

Ohhh boy. Now THIS is quite the situation. Should Quentin tell Tifa the truth, that they've been sent to assassinate her? Or should he come up with some lie to protect their tiny identities?
12411122.title: Curious Giantess Tifa

choices: Create a distraction of some sort
1242.content:
"Mwahahaha!" the Nanocorps team hears from apparently nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I, Dr. Van Micro, have heard about your many adventures, and I've another task for you all. I need you to find and assassinate Yuffie Kisaragi of the Final Fantasy universe. I will provide free transport to the city of Midgar from which you can start your hunt."

"Get a load of this weirdo," remarks Petire, "how are we even supposed to get to -- "

Just then, a bright flash engulfs the hunters, and all goes blank.

...

Eventually, the team awakens in a highly-technological city with towering buildings, and almost-as-towering people...

...wait a minute.

"Oops, forgot one thing..." the Nanocorps hear Dr. Van Micro's voice again. "You'll all have to be shrunk to ensure that Yuffie doesn't notice you. Maybe I should've said that before sending you to Midgar, huh?"

Quentin's palm meets his face.

Just then, the hunters see a young ninja girl walk by -- black hair, green outfit, bare midriff...it's Yuffie!

So, what's the plan?
1242.title: Targeting the Ultra-Cute Ninja

choices: "We were sent here to kill you."
12423.content:
"CHARGE!!"

The Nanocorps, against their better judgement, go all-out and sprint towards their target, weapons drawn -- and jab her in the back of her left leg.

Yuffie feels a small prick in the back of her leg, and tries to shrug it off. However, more irritating pokes frustrate her to the point of turning around, only to see nobody there. Confused, the ninja girl looks down, and her eyes widen at what she sees...

"What the..." Yuffie reacts. "Tiny people?" She then scoops the pint-sized hunters up into her hands. "What are you doing in Midgar? And why are you...tiny?"

Quentin hesitates -- he isn't certain what kind of answer to give. Does he dare reveal the Nanocorps' secret mission at the risk of their lives?
12423.title: Noticed by the Ninja Girl

124231.content:
"We're, uh...lost." Quentin fibs to the giantess ninja.

"Lost?" Yuffie wonders. "I don't blame you...Midgar is quite the city. In the meantime, I could keep you all safe with me!"

"Are you sure about this?" Petire asks, a little skeptical. "I mean, we might get -- " Quentin shuts him up with a slap upside the head.

"Now, where to keep you..?" Yuffie thinks out loud. "I think I'll put you..."
124231.title: In Yuffie's Custody

choices: Yuffie swallows the hunters by accident

12521122222222222221.content:
The hunters emerge from the portal, landing on the hard ground. It seems they landed on a stone like shrine. Before they do a little recon, the device begins beeping and a hologram of Dr.Micro appears before them.

"Mwhahaha! I see you hunters made it...Well done!" The scientist laughs. "Now let's get down to business cause somebody is giving me a death glare..."

The hunters look at Viz since he is the only who despise the scientist the most, Zeke simply puts his hand on the shoulder, telling him to calm down. Viz grumbles and looks in the other direction.

"Ahem...Your target of the day is very unique. Why unique you say? Cause she's much, MUCH older than you think, despite having a body of young woman. Her name is Tiki and she is well known for being 'Voice of the Divine Dragon'."

"Voice of the Divine Dragon..." Quentin said. "What does she do?"

"According to info I gather, Master Andross. It is said a being who is believed to be able to resonate with Naga, who is the Divine Dragon and convey her blessings unto the common citizenry. So many people here in this world come to see Tiki for the Naga's blessings." Beta explains.

"Correct! She resides in the Mila Tree, which you hunters are at now...So find the Voice of the Divine Dragon and kill her!"

"W-Wait a minute! We can't kill Tiki! She's very important in this world!" Petire said.

"Mwhahaha! Too bad...If you can't kill her then you won't able to use the device to return to your home world..." Dr. Micro grins evilly

"What!? You son of the-" Sharper snaps at the scientist before he signing off, not without laughing.

"...I really want to kill him..." Viz said.

"Save me some ass kicking as well! No good rotten bastard!"

"Enough you two...Let's go find Tiki and then we can figure what to do with her." Quentin said before turning to Beta. "Is she near us?"

"Actually...Yes, she's very near us. But I believe she already know were here."

"Heh. Beta, you must have short circuit. There's no way she could spotted us." Danny chuckles. "And besides, we're freaking small. No way she could hear us,"

"Guess again, kid...She's right behind." Zeke said as a large shadow covering the hunters location. They immediately turn around to see who it is..But they only get is a nice and scary view of a gigantic green eye.

"Holy shit!" Danny nearly peed himself. "What the hell is that!?"

"...I take it you're Tiki...Am I right?" Quentin calmly asked this mountainous being, only to get a very loud voice that was an earful to the hunters.

"Yes. I am indeed Tiki. I was wondering...Can I ask you strange tiny creatures a question?...Are you here to assassinate me?" Tiki asked the tiny hunters.

"I-I can explain this situation.." Before Quentin can speak any further, the enormous Voice of Divine Dragon begins to stand up, giving the hunters a more view of her. Her clothing was in different shades of red with the little cape she wears in pink and she has a rather big chest which cause Danny to drool a bit. As the hunters counties viewing her, they were interrupt by a large hand like shadow that is getting bigger, they realize it was Tiki's gloved hand that was about to grab the hunters. They tried to get away from her but they were not quick enough to escape her grasp as they are cover in darkness...

As the hunters regain their vision, they notice that they are on...

12523111.content:
"Mwahahahaha!" the hunters hear from seemingly nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I, Dr. Van Micro, have heard about your many adventures, and I need a favor from you. I need you to find and assassinate Corrin, from Fire Emblem Fates. Bring me proof of your triumph and you'll be handsomely rewarded! ...well, maybe."

"A video game character?!" reacts Petire. "That's nuts! How are we supposed to -- "

Then a bright light consumes the hunters, and all goes blank.

Later, Quentin slowly awakens in what looks to be a bedroom. A gigantic bedroom.

Or...is he...shrunken?

"What the...guys?" Quentin asks his team.

No response -- where are they?!

Just then, an armor-clad giantess enters the room, unaware of her tiny guest, and strips down to her greyish-white bra and panties before sitting atop her bed, letting out an exhausted sigh. Quentin notices some things about this girl -- pointed ears, draconic aura...cute appearance?

Could this be Corrin, the target assigned to the Nanocorps by Dr. Van Micro?

So, what will Quentin do next?
12523111.title: Targeting the Draconic Avatar...Alone

choices: Yes, and they come by quickly
No, Quentin may be on his own
