"Hunters, I think I've found our target," says Quentin into a walkie-talkie, "and she seems to be unaware of our presence. Where are you guys?"

Does Quentin get a response from his fellow hunters?
125231111.title: Where Did Everybody Go?

125231112.content:
Quentin couldn’t help but stare at this beautiful girl…He never seen another Drangua before after the...incident…Perhaps she’s a Drangua like him, though the crazy doc didn’t give them enough info on her, maybe asking her wouldn’t hurt much…you’re a size of a tiny bug and get crushed by mistake, plus his team is missing…With a sigh, Quentin sprouts his dragon wings from his back and takes flight.

Corrin, on the hand, was taking a break from the battle against Vallites with her royal siblings from both Nohr and Hoshido, along with their retainers. The thought of seeing her siblings together make the princess smile…Though the peaceful thought was interrupt when something flying near her face. Corrin spotted a tiny flying object in front of her and it moves quite strangely…Corrin simply shrugs and gently blows the ‘bug’ away.

Quentin felt a hurricane like wind hitting him as the giantess tries to blow him away, luckily his dragon wings can withstand the powerful gust and remain close to Corrin’s face.

“Wait, Corrin! I’m not a-“ Quentin tries to tell her, but the princess responded by raising both her hands near him.

“Annoying little bug. I’m sorry but you leave me no choice.” Corrin said before she clasped her hands together.

The tiny Drangua quickly flies forward as the two gigantic hands closing in on him fast. The wall of flesh nearly touches him before escaping his certain death. Quentin sighs in relief of his escape but not before looking at the sky filled eye of annoyed princess.

“Persisted little thing aren’t you? I really don’t have time to-huh?” Corrin felt a strange yet familiar draconic aura like her royal siblings have…and it’s coming from the tiny being in front of her. “Wait…Could I be…It can’t be…”

Quentin notice the large digits is coming towards him and was about to avoid them until Corrin said she’s not going to harm him….Quentin remains still as the fingers gently closed down on the tiny hunter, moving him even closer to her red eye…Gotta admit it, she sure does has a beautiful set of eyes.
Corrin carefully examine the tiny being and realize it was not really an insect, but a human being! Corrin lets out a gasp and quickly gets up from the bed, surprise and shocked.

“Oh my god! I’m…I’m so sorry! I almost kill you!” Corrin apologize repeatedly.

“Don’t worry, I’m quite hard to kill actually…” Quentin chuckles a bit.

Corrin sighs in relief, seeing the tiny person is okay…and surprisingly speaks in human tone. Perhaps talking to him will get to know him…especially he’s carrying the dragon’s blood. The princess sets the hunter in the palm of her hand while sitting in the bed again.

“My name is Corrin, I’m a princess of Hoshido as well as Nohr. Mind telling me what is your name?”

“Quentin Andross. I’m the leader of NanoCorps: the greatest bounty hunters in the world. I did come with the others, but…it seems they haven’t made their appearances yet….Anyway, I notice you are a dragon, right? I can sense it within you.”

“I do...with the help of Dragonstones, I can take form of a dragon.” Corrin was actually kinda surprise that Quentin was able to tell she carries dragon’s blood. “How did you know?”

“I’m a Drangua: A race of human/dragon. Though they are…extinct…I was the only survivor. It’s kinda hard for me to explain it.” Quentin looks down with a sigh.

“Oh…I’m sorry. I didn’t know…” Corrin lowers her finger, gently rubbing the little Drangua’s head. “…Maybe I should keep you here with me until you’re friends come back. Sounds good?”

“I’m fine with that…uhh…first things first: Where’s….uhh…where’s your clothes…?” Quentin said while looking away. Corrin doesn’t know what he talking about until it has hit her. She realize she has no clothes on except her bra and panties. The princess shrieks in embarrassment, trying to cover her garments with one hand.

“He he…Be glad one of my teammate isn’t here, he’ll jump on you like a happy little pet who won’t leave you alone…and stalking you.” Quentin laughs.

“…That is good…I must apologize once more….With your unexpected appearance, I didn’t notice I was in my bra and panties…I should get in more comfortable clothes…Mind if I go change?”

“Of course, Princess Corrin. I will wait for your return.”

Both smiles each other before Corrin sets Quentin down on her bed and head towards the other room, not before Quentin get a nice view of her shapely rear, almost as if she’s…flirting with him. Quentin quickly shakes his head of dirty thoughts, worrying he may become like Danny and it is a pretty bad sign…The young Drangua decided to contact his team before Corrin comes back and make a decision of telling the princess the reason he came here or not…
125231112.title: Get the Dragon Girl’s Attention

1252311121.content:
As Quentin waits atop the royal bed, Corrin returns to the room, now wearing more comfortable clothes.

"So..." smiles Corrin, "how do I look?"

"You look...great!" replies Quentin.

"Thanks! It really lets me feel important to both Hoshido and Nohr. Now I truly feel at home!"

"Home is where the heart is..."

"While we're on the subject of home...where did you come from? What brought you here?"

Oh crap. The one question that might prove dangerous to answer.

"Well," sighs Quentin...
1252311121.title: Talking with Corrin

12523111211.content:
“Well…Promise me you won’t be mad at me cause what I’m about to say may shock you..” Quentin said to the princess. In order to gain a trust from Corrin, he must come clean and telling her why he was brought into this world. His thoughts were interrupted when Corrin sits on her bed near him, the bed bounces a little but to Quentin…it was a bouncing earthquake. Luckily for the tiny hunter, he was able to stand his ground and looks up at the princess smiling down at him.

“Don’t worry. I promise I won’t get mad at you.” Corrin said with a warmful smile.

Quentin couldn’t help but stare at her once more. His eyes trails down her body, seeing each details of her body…She does have a nice slim, well-toned body, perky breasts from within her rather tight tank top, her smooth thin stomach and her posture which he already seen. He did get a glimpse of her legs and her bare feet which are quite lovely for someone who goes bare all the time. Quentin quickly comes back to reality, discarding the pervy thoughts again, he really doesn’t wanna end up like Danny…

“Umm...I did tell you I’m the leader of the bounty hunters, right? Well we usually get hired to take down dangerous targets-dead or alive-and we get rewarded. Today…We did get hired by a doctor name Van Micro who sent a bounty for us. The target happens to be a princess who lives here….and that target name is…Corrin.” Quentin braces himself for Corrin’s outburst of anger and tries to kill him…Instead, Corrin simply looks at the tiny hunter with a concern look.

“…I see…But you don’t look like a cold hearted assassin and you are very friendly.” Corrin scoop the tiny hunter up gently, holding him in front of her face. “Sorry if this sound inappropriate, but why haven’t you kill me yet?”

“There’s a simple but very strict rule of killing people, if we force to: We do not kill royalties. Princes, princesses, kings, queens, anyone who is in the royalty line will not be kill by us, hell, even I can’t kill a princess since I’m a gentleman towards them, he he… I do have to remind some uhh…bloodthirsty hunters. But of course, the crazy doc didn’t read the fine print.”

“So why did you take the job?”

“It’s our last one for the day and some hunters want to try out the device that let us travel through dimension and shrink us down which works as you can see…I’m sorry I should say it earlier, I don’t know how you reacted if I said it…I hope you can forgive-“ Quentin then felt Corrin’s finger pressing gently against his face.

“I’ll forgive you, on one condition.”

“Name it.” Quentin said with her finger pulling away.

“Do not take any more request from Micro.”

“Oh don’t worry…we won’t. In fact, we are gonna pay him a visit after we get this situation under control.” Quentin chuckles.

“Great!” Corrin smiles before looking at the window, the sun is about to set and Quentin’s friends haven’t arrive yet…Perhaps letting him sleep with her couldn’t hurt unless someone comes up to visit during the night checking up on her…especially Camilla, her older sister from Nohr. “Say Quentin? Why don’t you relax here for a bit until your friends arrive?”

“Sounds good. I’ll just hang around on the nightstand til then.”

“Actually…” Corrin starts to blush again, biting her lower lip. “I-I think it would be best if you stay close to me…Y-You know, being attacked by a bug or getting step on.” The princess laughs in a awkward moment, looks away for a bit still blushing.

“C-Close to you…?” Quentin gulps and starts sweating a bit, tugging his collar. “I…I don’t think that’s a good idea…I can protect myself very well and resting on the nightstand seems like a good-“

“Quentin…” Corrin stares down at the tiny hunter, giving a more imitating look. “I said it would be best if you stay close to me and that’s final. Besides, you aren’t exactly in a position to argue…Do I make myself clear?” Corrin gently push Quentin’s chest with her finger, pushing the Drangua back a bit.

“O-Of course…How silly of me to forget that you are a princess and I’m small…Though, you sure look cute when you are serious.”

“Ooh? Are you flirting with me? Are you becoming like your pervert friend?”

“Hell no. Not in a million years. ” Quentin laughs. “…Alright then, I’ll stay with you, my princess.” The hunter bows down to Corrin.

Corrin giggles while petting Quentin on the head, she hope Quentin will stay with her for a while and getting to know more about him and his NanoCorp teammates. She develop a strange feeling towards the tiny hunter…something that she is well known to her. It seems Corrin has a crush on Quentin, not only he’s a dragon like herself, but he is very kind and quite a gentleman despite he and his friends were hired to kill her. Corrin could tell him about her feelings but she decided to wait for a bit…it would be awkward if he doesn’t like her back.

Unaware to Corrin, Quentin also develops feelings towards the princess. She’s really a sweet young woman who wouldn’t hurt a fly…well, he almost got squish by her…but still, she’s a sweetheart. Plus, she’s a dragon. Not a Drangua, but a dragon’s a dragon and he’s fine with that! But telling her his feelings is a different story…what’s her response when he tell her? Probably a nice flick in the face or being trapped between her toes or worst…But by far the worst one is when his teammates appear and Danny would try to swoon in on Corrin, ruining his moment to express his love.

The two dragons stare at each other for minutes, figuring how to show their love to each other…
12523111211.title: Dragon Bonding

choices: Just before Corrin can answer, the others arrive!
125231112111.content:
Quentin and Corrin are unable to look away from each other for several minutes, as they mentally fight the urge to confess how they truly feel.

After a while, however...

"Princess Corrin?" Quentin asks.

"Yes?"

"I must admit something...I think I'm in love with you!"

How does Corrin react?
125231112111.title: Quentin x Corrin

choices: Speak of the devil: Camilla arrives!
1252311121111.content:
Corrin’s eyes widen and her heart skips a beat or two, staring at Quentin in awe…He actually said it, he really did said it! Quentin just confess his love to her! Corrin tries to tell him her feelings for him but she is just quite stunned by his words.

Quentin looks at Corrin’s reaction…seems like she doesn’t take it well, who could love a bounty hunter who hunts down people for money, especially his current size. Or maybe…she might have a fiancé…Embarrassed, Quentin quickly changes the subject to lighten this awkward moment.

“S-Sorry! I was uhh…just messing with you.” Quentin laughs a bit. “I didn’t mean to say it, I know it was wrong and-“ Before they tiny hunter said anything else, Corrin grabs him by two fingers, holding him close to her face. Quentin apologies to Corrin about numerous of times, but it seems clear that she doesn’t like that ‘joke’ very much. With a sigh of what’s coming next, the tiny Drangua closes his eyes and braces himself for a punishment….But instead of feeling his body being crushed or flicked, Quentin felt a soft and smooth surface…He slowly open his eyes to take a peek and his whole face literally turns red like tomatoes. In front of him that pressing on his body are Corrin’s lips, kissing him gently and the Drangua himself….really enjoying it, though there are some downside. His body is almost covered in Corrin’s saliva, drenching him in slimy substance...but he simply ignores it. To boost up this moment, Quentin kisses back on her lower lip though he doubts she can feel it.

After a few seconds of their first kiss, Corrin pulls Quentin away from her lips and places him back in her palm, leaving both the hunter and the princess blushing.

“Whoa….” Quentin lets out a sigh while wiping off the saliva off.

“Sorry about that.” Corrin giggles a bit. “I…I hope I wasn’t rushing. I mean we just met and…”

“Oh don’t worry about, Princess Corrin. I understand.” Quentin smiles.

The two half dragons smile at each other before Corrin gives Quentin another kiss, this time a less saliva which is perfect for the tiny hunter. Quentin really hopes his fellow teammates will not suddenly appear out of nowhere, interrupting their romantic moment. Just thinking about their appearance-especially the pervert Danny- makes him groan…or worst: A visit from one of Corrin’s siblings and spotted him as a bug.

“Is something the matter?” Corrin was concern about the hunter, gently rub him on his back.

“Oh it’s nothing, just thinking of any…unexpected visitors come into your room, discovering us.”

“Don’t worry. Beside your friends, I doubt anyone will come up and see me this late….Well except for Camilla.”

“Camilla?”

“My older sister of Nohr. She is very nice and kind to me and my friends, though she can be very ruthless to her enemies….and she always shower me with love….which is a bit annoying.” Corrin sighs.

“Really? How so?”

“She said ‘I love you’ to me about 50 times a day. Inviting me to the spa to have a sisterly bond which is embarrassing. Treating me like I’m still a child and calling me those...pet names.” The princess groans

“Kinda reminds me of a certain fellow hunter…though I’m not gonna badmouth her …Still, it’s nice to have a big sister who loves you…to death.” Quentin smirks before being pushed by Corrin’s finger, laughing. Quentin doesn’t mind meeting her older sister with a huge amount of affection towards Corrin, she may like the tiny hunter as well due to his race and tiny form…he could end up as Camilla’s pet which is not good for him or his fellow hunters. In the meantime, he’ll just relax with his new lover until his teammates arrives…
1252311121111.title: Meet the Dragon Couple

choices: Corrin hides him in her mouth
Camilla arrives before he can be hidden
12523111211111.content:
Before the two lovers can do more relaxing, Corrin's lavender-haired elder sister Camilla walks toward the room, apparently to check on her sibling (again).

"Oh no!" Corrin panics. "I can't let Camilla see you!"

But before Quentin can ask what she has in mind...
12523111211111.title: Camilla Enters

125231112111111.content:
With no time to plan things out, Corrin thrusts tiny Quentin inside her mouth and closes her teeth and lips tight, sealing the small hunter in warm, slimy darkness as Camilla enters the room.

"How's my favorite sibling today?" Camilla says endearingly.

"Oh hi, Camilla!" Corrin smiles, struggling to talk normally and keep the tiny hunter from swallowing "I'm fine, thank you..."
125231112111111.title: Inside Corrin's Mouth

1252311121111112.content:
Quentin finds himself on the slimy tongue of Princess Corrin after having been tossed into her mouth. At first he struggles to keep his balance on the slippery appendage, but after a moment Quentin is finally able to stand, at which point he leaps into the inside of Corrin's right cheek. Best to avoid Camilla's notice while Corrin speaks.

While the two royals talk about Corrin's day, Camilla notices a slight bulge in Corrin's cheek.

"Corrin, are you sure you're OK?" Camilla asks, concerned.

Then...
1252311121111112.title: Sticking Around in Corrin's Mouth

choices: "...but may I have a moment with him?"
12523111211111121.content:
No longer able to hide her tiny friend, Corrin spits little Quentin out into her palm, revealing him to Camilla.

"What...a tiny person?" Camilla reacts, surprise clear in her face and her voice.

"Yes..." Corrin replies with a sigh. "It's hard to explain."

"I can understand that, after the whole adventure in Valla..."
12523111211111121.title: Out of Corrin's Mouth

choices: Corrin tries to puke Quentin up
12523111211111122.content:
Unable to maintain his footing, Quentin slips and falls into the dark throat, and Corrin reflexively swallows him, her eyes widening as she realizes her mistake.

"Oh no..." is all Corrin can manage to spit out, much to Camilla's confusion.
12523111211111122.title: Uh oh...not good!

choices: Quentin asks Corrin if Beta can drain some of her blood
12523111211112.content:
"Charge!!"

Quentin's fellow hunters suddenly barge into the room, but he quickly stops them.

"Stand down, team," orders Quentin.

"What's going on here?" Camilla asks, she and Corrin being confused by this sudden intrusion.

"Uhh...excuse us, Princess Corrin..."

Quentin and his team then leave the room for...a private discussion.

"I have things under control," says Quentin, "and Corrin's royalty, so we can't kill her."

"But what are we gonna tell the Doc?" Petire asks.

"If I could make a suggestion," begins Beta, "we could deceive Dr. Micro with a small sample of Corrin's blood!"

"But will she cooperate?" Zeke wonders.

"We'll have to find out," says Quentin.

The hunters reenter the room where Corrin and Camilla are waiting, and...
12523111211112.title: VERY bad timing

1252311121112.content:
"Wow..." reacts Corrin. "That's really -- "

Just then, a mysterious portal appears on the ceiling, and through it falls Quentin's team, onto the floor, before said portal vanishes.

"Charge!!" yells Atomic.

The other hunters begin to rush toward their giantess target before being halted by Quentin.

"Guys, I have it under control," says Quentin.

"Is this your...team?" Corrin asks.

"Yeah..."

"Hey, boss..." Petire starts, "if we have to show up to Dr. Micro, maybe we can fool him with a souvenir of sorts!"

"Souvenir?" Corrin responds. "Like what?"

Quentin thinks on this for a moment before deciding...
1252311121112.title: Bad timing, guys...

125231113.content:
Quentin is in awe at the appearance of the giantess Corrin. He can sense her dragon essence somehow, and she's...downright beautiful! From those pointed ears, to her well-defined torso, all the way down to her toes...she's quite a catch.

Almost unconsciously, Quentin finds himself walking toward the giantess, whose eyes widen as she lays them on the tiny hunter.

But how does she respond?
125231113.title: Noticed by Corrin

1252311132.content:
"BUG!!" Corrin panics before raising her foot to stomp the bug, unaware that this "bug" is actually Quentin, leader of the Nanocorps.

Miraculously, Quentin dodges every impact the foot makes with the ground. After about a minute, however, he starts to get exhausted from evading Corrin's massive bare foot.

Corrin is getting exhausted herself, from all those failed attempts to squash what she thought was a mere insect. She then...
1252311132.title: Bugging Corrin

12523111321.content:
Tired of trying to stomp the "bug" into the ground, Corrin leans down to take a better look at this unfamiliar creature and is surprised at what she sees.

"A tiny...person?" Corrin realizes at last, before scooping Quentin into her hand.

"H-hi..." Quentin says nervously.

"Um...hello...who are you? And why are you here?"

"M-my name's Quentin."

"I'm Corrin...nice to meet you...so, what brought you here?"

Oh dear. The one question that might be Quentin's doom...well, if he answers honestly, anyway...
12523111321.title: Meeting the Draconic Avatar

choices: Such a beauty! Go get her, boys!
12523112.content: Everyone's favorite hot buxon sister?
12523112.title: Camilla.

125231121.content:
The hunters emerges from the portal, along with three newly addition to the team: A hedgehog with strange crystals on his shoulders and back, a blind swordsman with a very special sword, and a very tall female demon with the power of ice. As the hunters landed on a solid ground that is a bit wet, they are surround in some kind of fog and it's a bit warm...

"Oooh...Is it me or I'm getting a bit steamy?" Petire pulls his suit collar away while trying to cool down.

"You ain't the only here..." Ralph wipes the sweat off his forehead. "I believe we are in some kind of sauna..."

Danny notice an edge not too far from their spot and decides to check it out. The womanizer peek above the edge, noticing water that was releasing steam, realizing this must be a hot spring or spa...Before he could inform his fellow hunters, he heard a soft feminine humming right across the water. Danny narrow his eyes to get a good view who is it...and immediately drops his jaws while his nose spraying out blood in a comical way.

Quentin, meanwhile, sighs as he watches Petire and Ralph complains how cold it is when Crystal hugs them, attempting to cool them down. Quentin turns to find Danny still near the edge and comes up to him to see what he found.

"Danny? What you find?" Quentin asked him, only to hear a gurgle noise. "...Danny?"

Quentin waves his hand in front of his face, but no reaction...He looks over to where Danny is looking at...and he starts to blush madly. "Oh geez!!"

The other hunters heard their leader shouting and quickly comes to them, Zeke asked what's wrong and the young leader responded by pointing in front of them..In front of them was a really beautiful woman with long purple hair, covering one of eyes and appears to be a buxon type due to her large breasts...And she's naked.

"Good gravy..." said Petire

"What a woman...Ugh I feel like Danny..." said Ralph.

"Hmm...Could she be our target?" said Zeke.

"Hmph, she better be...Can't wait to claw her out." Crystal hisses in anger.

"Ooooh? A hint of jealously I'm sensing?"

"Can it, Petire."

"Ahem...Well, the device did take us here of all places...So she must be our main target. Question is: Should we wait for Dr. Micro to appear?" said Quentin.

"Forgive me for being blunt...But who cares about that doctor. Let's just take down that woman before she spotted us." Z said.

"I agree. Let's get this over with." Viz smirks.

"Alright then...Slick?" Quentin looks over at Slick who is sleeping on Atomic's shoulder. "...Z?"

"Sure thing."

The hedgehog's crystals starts glowing, surrounding himself and his allies in orange/red sphere before disappears into thin air, where would the hunters wound up?
125231121.title: Targeting the Overprotected Beauty

choices: Camilla felt something and looks down, spotting the hunters
1252311211.content:
Thanks to Z's Chaos Control, the hunters emerges from the bright light, landing on a very soft and squishy surface. It seems there are on their target's body, but where? Beta begins scanning the area while the hunters tries to find out where they are. The robot informs the hunters of their new location...He tells his fellow hunters they are on Camilla's left breast, much to Danny's excitement and Crystal's disgust.

"Geez, Z. Why here?" Quentin asked the hedgehog

"Uhh..Closer to her heart?"

"Make sense, but we are not ready to kill her just yet...Beta, got any info on our target?."

"I do. The target's name is Camilla: The eldest daughter of King Garon of Nohr, which makes her a princess." Beta said.

"Oh hell..." Quentin groans. "Why does it had to be a princess...?"

"What's wrong with killing a princess?" Crystal asked.

"It'll make us criminals and cops plus military will be hunting us down, other bounty hunters will come and get us, etc, etc...." said Petire. "Q-man made a strict rule of killing any royalty, no ifs and buts. However, we can abduct them, but no killing."

"Well that's no fun. But rules are rules."

"Yep. Anywho, any more info about her?"

"Camilla has four step siblings, treating with such caring like a mother would do. However, one of the siblings name Corrin has the greater attention in Camilla's eyes. She still treats her as a little kid, even attempting to let Corrin rest her head on her lap. I believe Corrin is Camilla's precious treasure and make sure no one takes her beloved sibling away from her."

"Aww that's kind of sweet." said Sharper.

"But she does have a...ruthless side of her. Camilla will kill anyone who tried to take Corrin or her love ones life, she even takes enjoyment in striking them down. So she can be a dangerous opponent."

"Heh...She might be worthy enough to kill by my hands, but of course, there's the rules." Viz smirks slighty.

"And we're sticking by it. Now then...The letter the doc sent said bring him proof that we kill the target...Perhaps we can take her blood and send it to him. He may fall for it and gives us rewards." said Quentin.

"That sounds like a good plan. Beta will suck up her blood while we keep an eye on Camilla..." Zeke looks up to see what Camilla is doing...Her visible eye is closed but can hear her humming. "Good. She didn't notice us...Better start sucking before she find us."

"Affirmative." Beta shifts his entire left arm into a large syringe with a tube for filling the blood. The robot pierce into Camilla's skin and begins sucking up blood while the others keep a close eye on the target's reaction...and keep a very close eye on Danny for any dirty plans.
1252311211.title: Camllia's Chest

choices: "What were you doing on my chest?!"
12523112111.content:
"Ouch!!"

Camilla yelps as she feels something poke into her skin. Looking down, she notices several tiny things on her chest. Irritated, the giantess snatches up the tiny people and raises them to eye level.

"What...how..?" reacts Camilla, not sure what to make of this situation.

"Oh crap..." mutters Danny, fearing that the Nanocorps' cover may have been blown.

But what does Camilla say next?
12523112111.title: Spotted by Camilla

125231121111.content:
"Who are you, tiny people...?" Camilla asked the NanoCorps, having mixed feelings of crushing them of intruding and interrupting her spa and curiousness of these people smaller than a grain of rice...But before she could do anything, Atomic slams his fist against her finger causing the princess to yell out in pain, releasing them from her grip. While free falling, Quentin orders Z to open a rift which Z complies and opens a colorful like distortion portal below them.

One by one, the hunters enter the rift safety, but Camilla wasn't about to let them go just yet. Ignoring the stinging pain, the princess reaches out to grab a certain hunter who way out of the group and that certain person is the sloth hunter, Slick.

Sighing, Quentin orders the hunters to go ahead without him while he tries to rescue Slick, much to his team disagreement. Ryx decided to go with Quentin in order to keep his teammate and leader safe from Camilla's wrath. With no way to back Ryx down, Quentin agrees and orders Atomic to throw them towards Slick. The huge monster sprouts two long tentacles from his back, grabbing them from their waist before throwing them back in the air.

The other hunters watches Quentin and Ryx able to grab Slick but not before Camilla closed her fist around them. Glenys scream her beloved leader's name out before entering the rift, closing it from behind.

Camilla smiles at her success of capturing not one but three tiny people in her grasp.

"Well well...I got three little people in my hand. Shame the other ones escape, especially that large silver one...But you three will do nicely for now, let's have a little 'chat' in Corrin's private quarters. I'm sure she'll enjoy seeing a group of tiny people..."

Quentin and Ryx sighs while Slick snores away as Camilla gets out from the hot spa and gets ready to take her new prisoners to her little sister's quarters...
125231121111.title: Retreat...and Capture

choices: "...we can trick Camilla with some charming words..."
"...we can squirm our way out of Camilla's grip!"
1252311211111.content:
As Camilla continues on her way towards Corrin's private quarters, the captured hunters are annoyed with the giantess...minus Slick, who's still sleeping like a baby.

"Don't worry, Ryx," assures Quentin, "I have a plan to get us out of this."

"Really? You do?" asks Ryx.
1252311211111.title: How to Escape a Princess's Grasp

choices: Meanwhile, back with the other hunters...
12523112111111.content:
"Really...? Charming words?" The blind man frowned beneath the bandages, knowing Quentin is not...an average flirting type, unlike a certain fellow hunter who swoons every sight of females he come upon on and ended being slapped on the face or kicked right in the balls-which is pretty hilarious for the other hunters, especially the girls in the group.

"If I can soothe Camilla and this Corrin we are gonna meet, it'll give us the chance to ask one of them for their blood and fool the doc that we kill them." Quentin said with a grin.

"...But you're not a flirting type of guy..That goes to Danny."

"And thank god he's not with us. It'll cause a good disaster that'll end us up under their feet."

"Good point and I guess you're good looks and kind nature will help...I hope."

"Well what's your idea of charming the princesses?" Quentin asks.

"Simple: I'm a blind man who carries his 'walking stick' asking the ladies to help this poor man...It works like a charm." Ryx smiles with a thumbs up

"Typical..."

As the two hunters talking about their plans, they heard a loud muffle voice coming from the outside of Camilla's hand. Seems she is talking to someone...possibly Corrin she mentions.

"Seems we arrive...Hope your charming skills are good."

"I was kinda hoping your blind man routine will work on them." Quentin chuckles a little.

"Won't work if a lady is very tall..."

"Heh, guess it's up to me as always...Better get Slick up before-" As Quentin order Ryx to get Slick, Camilla's large fingers slowly opens up, shining Quentin's eyes by bright light while Ryx carrying the sleeping hunter is unaffected by it. Once the leader regains his sight, he got a little shock when he sees a large red eye that filled his entire view, causing the young Drangua to back up a little and ends up bumping against Ryx.

"Something wrong?" Ryx asked Quentin.

"Err...I think I just met Corrin..." Quentin chuckle sheepishly

"Well do your charming words, handsome..."

Quentin sighs while watching the red eye pulls away from his view and got a good look of Corrin...She appears to be wearing a silver armor with cape and thigh armor showing a bit of leg there. Red eyes he just seen, long blonde colored hair with black hair clip and a nice figure...But something else caught his attention: Pointed ears and has a dragon aura within her.

"What the...Ryx, Your not gonna believe this but Corrin's a dragon, like me...sort of" Quentin whisperers to the blind man.

"Really? Same as you? You certain about this?"

"I'm not sure...But I did sense a dragon's aura inside of her..."

"Huh...? Dragon...?" Slick finally wakes up yawning, notice Ryx carries him on his shoulder. "...How long was I asleep?"

"Long enough to be capture by a princess..." Ryx set Slick down while yawning once more.

Corrin and Camilla, meanwhile, watches the tiny people move around in her palm and talking to each other. Corrin was amaze of very small people actually existed and was going to ask a few question about their appearances until particular tiny being catches her eyes...The long yellow haired one has a dragon's aura inside of him. Is he a descendant of Anankos, the tyrant dragon in Valla? Perhaps he must be from another world....

"Is something wrong, sweetie?" Camilla asked her beloved sister.

"N-No...Where did you find them?"

"In the hot spring while I was taking a nice relaxing day until the tiny appear appear on my chest. I was quite...upset when they poke me, so I grab them but the large silver one hit me and it really hurt! Most of them escape through that weird hole but I manage to grab those three."

"Hole? From the Deeprealms?"

"I'm not sure, but we can asked them. Of course, if they refuse to talk...We will just force them. Sounds fun to you, my adorable little sister?" Camilla presses her face against Corrin's face

"Umm...N-No. I'm sure they will talk, I mean we are a lot bigger them...Plus I'm more concern about one of the tiny people..." Corrin said while setting her eyes on Quentin. She must know who is this person and how he carries the dragon's blood...
12523112111111.title: Meet and Greet the Princesses

125231121111111.content:
"I...assume you have traits of a dragon?" Corrin asks Quentin.

"Me?" Quentin responds. "Yes, I do. Why?"

"I do as well...with the powers of Dragonstones, I can assume the form of a dragon."

"Interesting..."

"So...where did you tiny things come from? Why are you here?"

Oh snap...

If Quentin tells Corrin the truth, that the Nanocorps came to drain Camilla's blood, he might regret it! And if he lies...he STILL might regret it!!

But, as leader of the Nanocorps, he needs to make a choice.
125231121111111.title: Stop Dragon My Heart Around

choices: Get back to the other hunters?
1252311211111111.content:
It is not in his nature to tell a lie, but in some secret mission he has to and this is kinda a secret mission...But the sight of Corrin makes him want to spill out the mission...Maybe she'll understand if Quentin tells them the truth. With a sigh and two, the leader turns to Ryx and Slick who awaits on his decision.

"...I'm gonna tell them the truth." Quentin informs the two hunters.

"I kinda knew you are gonna say that....It's Corrin, isn't it?" Ryx grins a little. "Ahh young love...It's truly a blessing."

"Very funny, blind man. But you approve it?"

"Like I said: I ain't gonna stop you. Go ahead."

"Slick?"

"No objection here...Go on, lover boy" The lazy hunter said while laughing.

Quentin roll his eyes before turning to Corrin and Camilla, waiting on his respond. The young leader takes a deep breathe and starts answering the questions.

"We are the NanoCorps: the great and famous bounty hunters from a different world or rather dimension to come here to...assassinate a target or well...Camilla."

"Wh-What...?" Corrin gasp in surprise while Camilla was not actually surprise since they did prick her on the chest, but she still want more info out of him.

"Well now, I never thought a group of tiny hunters will try to kill me. But I believe that mission failed when I spotted you, correct?" Camilla smiles down at them.

"Not really...Atomic, our strongest hunter, would surely kill you with one punch...ya know, the one who punch your finger..." Slick said with a smirk on his face.

"Oh...The silver one, right? He'll pay for this once I get my hands on him...But I guess I'll direct my anger towards you three then." Camilla glares at the hunters but Corrin make sure she doesn't hurt them.

"However, Princess Camilla...We do have one very strict rule of killing folks." Ryx intervenes before Camilla could anything . "We cannot kill anyone who is royalty. Prince, princesses, kings, queens, etc...No ifs and buts. The rule was created by none other than Quentin Andross, the leader of NanoCorps a.k.a the dragon boy with a long beautiful golden hair..."

"Thanks Ryx...We decided to take your blood instead rather than just killing you and fooling the doc who sent us here."

"Who's the doctor?" Corrin asked.

"Dr. Van Micro. A great scientist who has a hatred on women...We don't know why, but we don't care. He's just a wacko with no life and friends..."

"That's a little harsh, Ryx...Anyway, that's how we got here and on your uhh chest...Also to make things up..." Quentin, Slick and Ryx got on one knee, bowing their heads which surprises the two princesses. "We are deeply sorry for attacking you, Princess Camilla and we also apologize to Princess Corrin for attacking your sister. I hope you can forgive us...and that goes to other hunters as well."

"Oh my! Such manners..." Camilla couldn't help but smile, she never seen such well manners from a group of bounty hunters...The princess lowers her large digit at Quentin, gently rubbing his head causing the young Drangua to blush in surprise. "You three are forgiven, but this Atomic guy must be punishment for hurting me."

"Really, Camilla? They said they are sorry..."

"I know, but still...My finger still hurting a bit, it feels its broken. You know this will not go unpunished..."

"Good luck with that...He's invincible...Nothing can't hurt that big brute..." Slick said with a yawn.

"But don't worry, I'll think of something to punish Atomic. You have my word." said Quentin with a grin. With the truth being out and all was good, the three hunters and the princesses finally got along pretty well...However, Slick and Ryx, along with Camilla notice Quentin and Corrin keeps looking at each...Almost as if they really like each other, perhaps a little help from them would surely improve their relationship...
1252311211111111.title: Telling the Truth and New Bond

12523112111111111.content:
"Corrin?" Camilla asks her sister. "You like the tiny guy, don't you?"

Corrin's gaze at Quentin is broken by Camilla's interruption.

"Wha...huh?" Corrin returns to her senses. "Oh...um...well..."

Quentin, meanwhile, is still in his romantic daze, when Corrin says...
12523112111111111.title: Ah, Young Love...

12523112111111112.content:
Meanwhile, back with the other hunters...

"Is she still chasing us?" Petire said while breathing heavily. The hunters appears to be hiding behind the table's leg from someone who is not too happy of their appearance, Danny slowly peek his out to see the one chasing them is coming...and quickly hid himself when he spotted that person.

"Yep, she's coming this way...and still look sexy as ever." Danny grins with delight, only to be slap on the head by Petire.

The hunters heard her footsteps getting louder and louder until a black object slams near the table where the hunters are and is quite familiar to them. The object happens to be a sandal with a foot resting on the surface, drumming its toes against it. Follow by her long legs cover in black clothing, her bare stomach and large breasts in white shirt with different accessories, long purple hair that bunch into a strange bun and an annoying look on her cute face...The woman they encounter and being chased by is none other than the fortune teller of Hoshido, Orochi.

Apparently, Orochi was doing the mess hall today since there aren't anyone available today and so she volunteer to take the shift, she then spotted the tiny NanoCorps popping out of the hole near the wall. The diviner immediately knew she has bugs infested the mess hall and won't let the creepy insects interrupt her work, so she begin chasing them and cornered the hunters, attempting to crush them underfoot. But a fellow hunter, namely Atomic, stops the oncoming foot with his immense strength and let the other hunters run to safety. He then pushes the foot away, causing the giantess to tumble backward and landed on her butt with a shocking expression on her face. With that done, Atomic follows the hunters to a safe place until the heat dies down...

Now Orochi is quite upset about this and vows to find the tiny bugs and crush them, one way or another. She looks around the mess hall to locate the bugs, but it seems they aren't showing up...

"Come out,come out, wherever you are, little ones~" Orochi muses while tapping her foot. To the hunters, it was a loud booming earthquake with each tapping she does and Alanna was about to snap and attack her, but Atomic grabs her before she does. "If you don't come out now, I'll just start looking for you and I may let you live...Depending on my mood~" The diviner chuckles.

"I'm coming out, my darling~!" Danny was about to swoon over to Orochi's foot, but Petire and Ralph knock the womanizer down before he can reach her.

"Idiot...Zeke? Any plans?"

"I'm thinking, kid..."

Zeke knows she's not gonna let them live, thanks to Atomic's action...and since Z is recharging his power and Slick is not with them, they may have no choice but to knock the giantess out before they are discover...But how?
12523112111111112.title: Another Big Problem for the NanoCorps...

125231121111111122.content:
Before Zeke can think of a plan, Orochi snatches the hunters up into her hand! Danny is lost in a gaze at the giantess, while the other hunters manage to stand their ground and not be intimidated.

But what kind of mood is Orochi in at the moment?
125231121111111122.title: Discovered by Orochi

1252311211111111221.content:
"Looks like you tiny creatures are finally mine," teases Orochi with the Nanocorps in her hand.

"W-what're you gonna do to us?" Danny asks, fear gripping him as the giantess looks at him and the team with keen interest in her eyes.

"Hmm...I think I'll..."

Thanks to Slick's teleportation powers, the Nanocorps find themselves in darkness. Hot, wet darkness. The floor looks pink and feels moist. Behind the hunters is a wall of white structures, and ahead is pitch blackness...

"Crap..." Petire realizes, "we're in Camilla's mouth!"

"At least we're closer to her, right?" Danny asks innocently.

"Come on, team!" Quentin orders. "We're getting out of here one way or another!"
1252311212221.title: Inside Camilla's mouth

12523112122212.content:
Unfortunately, the Nanocorps are flicked by Camilla's slimy tongue into the dark depths of her gullet with a sudden gulp. On the outside, the naked Malig Knight rubs her neck, wondering what she could've swallowed that made her throat sore. However, Camilla shrugs the thought off and returns to her hot bath.

The hunters fall for seconds that feel like hours, before finally landing on the squishy floor of Camilla's hot, moist stomach. The walls are pulsating a little, and a nearby greenish lake bubbles with a liquid that's better left avoided.

"Great. Just great," Petire complains, "now instead of Camilla's mouth, we're in her STOMACH! How are we gonna get out?"

"Not to worry," Quentin assures his team, "all we have to do is..."
12523112122212.title: Camilla's Stomach

125231122.content: The elder princess of Hoshido?
125231122.title: Hinoka?

1252311221.content:
"Mwahahahaha!" The hunters hear a familiar voice from nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I, Dr. Van Micro, have a mission for you. I've heard of your many adventures, and I would like you to find and assassinate Hinoka, a tomboyish princess of the Hoshido kingdom in the video game Fire Emblem Fates. Oh, and you'll need to be shrunken to complete the job."

"Get a load of this guy," Petire remarks, "I mean, seriously. Shrinking?! Video game? Kingdom?! Come on. As if that's even possible for -- "

Then a bright light surrounds the hunters, and everything goes blank.
1252311221.title: Targeting the Passionate Sky Knight

choices: Get Hinoka's attention and try to gain her trust
Launch a sneak attack on Hinoka
12523112211.content:
After an unspecified amount of time, the Nanocorps slowly and groggily awaken in what appears to be a bedroom. All the furniture looks huge...

Or...are the hunters just...shrunken?

"Well, I guess the Doc wasn't bluffing," Petire admits.

Suddenly, gigantic footsteps startle the hunters, who promptly hide under the towering bed in the room (which is why it's called a bedroom...so that makes sense). The source of the footsteps, a red-haired giantess wearing red-and-white clothing and dark red boots walks into the room and sits atop her bed, sighing with exhaustion. Apparently she's back from a difficult battle.

"I'm so glad Corrin was able to bring peace to Hoshido and Nohr," the giantess says to herself, "but I'll admit, it'll all take some getting used to. Maybe my younger sister can help me with that..."

The young lady's words clarify things greatly -- this is Hinoka, the elder of the Hoshido kingdom's two princesses! The Nanocorps' target.

"So now what, Q-man?" Atomic asks in a whisper.

Quentin, with the weight of leadership upon his shoulders, quickly comes up with a plan of action.
12523112211.title: Hinoka's Bedroom

choices: Hinoka looks down and notices them!
125231122112.content:
"We need to stay out of her sight," Quentin decides. "A sneak attack is our safest option -- Hinoka can be suspicious about outsiders."

"Affirmative, Master Quentin," says Beta, morphing an arm into a syringe. "Preparing to drain Hinoka's blood on your command."

The Nanocorps make their way toward the giantess's legs, when...
125231122112.title: Sneak Attack on Hinoka

choices: "We were sent here to kill you."

"What...huh?!" Hinoka reacts upon looking down and seeing the tiny hunters. She then scoops them up into her hands.

"H-hello, Hinoka..." Danny says nervously.

"How do you know my name? Who are you tiny people?" Hinoka asks, suspicion in her eyes.

With an uneasy gulp, Quentin replies...

"Mwahahaha!" The hunters hear laughter from nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps. I, Dr. Van Micro, have learned of your many adventures and need a favor of you. I need you to locate and assassinate Sakura, a timid shrine maiden from the game Fire Emblem Fates. Oh, and you'll need to be shrunk to remain unnoticed."

"Get a load of this freak," Petire remarks, "seriously. Video game characters? Shrinking? How is that even -- "

Then a bright light engulfs the hunters, and everything goes blank.
12523112221.title: Targeting the Shy Healer

125231122211.content:
After what feels like a really long time, the hunters slowly and groggily awaken in an expansive field. There are towering rice grains all around...or...are the Nanocorps just tiny?

Suddenly, a pink-haired giantess in white-and-red garments walks into the rice field, taking a careful look to ensure the health of the crops.

Surely this is Sakura, the younger Hoshido princess and the Nanocorps' target.

"I hope Corrin's alright," Sakura says to herself with a sigh. "So many armies raiding the castle in a day...it's really frustrating her..."

So...what's the plan?
125231122211.title: Rice is nice! Being tiny...not so much.

choices: Corrin arrives, and Sakura hides the Nanocorps
1252311222112.content:
"Charge!!" Quentin commands, leading his team in a reckless run towards the pink-haired giantess they'd been hired to assassinate.

Sakura is tending to the rice fields, when suddenly she feels something poke her right foot. Trying to ignore the sensation, she is ultimately creeped out when the poking continues, and looks down to a shocking discovery...

"What...b-bugs?!" Sakura reacts, disbelief clear in her voice.

"Dang it..." Petire mutters.

"We're not bugs!" Quentin yells up to the towering shrine maiden. "We're...tiny people."

"Tiny...people?"

Sakura leans down and scoops up the tiny hunters into her hands.

"What are you doing here? And why are you so small?" Sakura is unable to hide her curiosity.

"Well..." Quentin begins to explain...
1252311222112.title: Discovered by Sakura..?

12523112222.content: OK, how about the younger princess of Nohr?
12523112222.title: Elise?

125231122221.content:
"Mwahahaha!" The hunters hear a voice from apparently nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I am Dr. Van Micro. I've heard of your many adventures, and I would like you all to find and assassinate Elise, an energetic princess of the Nohr kingdom in the video game Fire Emblem Fates. Oh, and so that she doesn't notice you, you'll need to be shrunk."

"Shrunk?!" Petire wasn't convinced a bit. "Video game?! FIRE EMBLEM?! This has got to be the stupidest -- "

Then a bright flash gets the best of the team, and all goes blank.
125231122221.title: Targeting the Cheerful Troubadour

1252311222211.content:
The hunters groggily awaken in what appears to be a regal bedroom. All the furniture looks gigantic...or...are the Nanocorps just shrunken?

Hearing footsteps of someone approaching, the tiny hunters take refuge under the towering bed as a light-haired giantess with dark clothing and a magical staff enters the room and sits atop the aforementioned bed.

"I'm glad Corrin forged peace between Nohr and Hoshido," the giantess smiles, "now the two kingdoms can be friends forever!"

That cheerful voice...it's none other than Elise! The Nanocorps' target.

So, what's the plan?
1252311222211.title: And then...Elise.

12523112222111.content:
"CHARGE!!" Quentin yells to his team.

The Nanocorps rush over to Elise's right boot and repeatedly punch and jab at it, causing the giantess to flinch in pain. She then looks down to find the source of her annoyance.

"What...huh?" Elise reacts. "Tiny people?" She then snatches the tiny hunters up into her hands, raising them up to eye level. "Aww, you little things are SO CUTE!! But...why were you attacking my boot?"

Quentin gulps nervously -- lying could jeopardize him and his team...but then again, so could the truth. Will he end up exposing his mission to Elise, at the risk of the Nanocorps facing certain doom?

12523112222221.content:
The bounty hunters emerges form the bright light portal, with no weird changes on their bodies, into a new yet familiar place. Flames crackles and brighten the area, dripping water from the ceiling and a soft low hum of the wind blowing across the cave. The hunters knew they are in a cave as they have come across caves quite often and it's no trouble for the NanoCorps, but now being a scale of a tiny ant is a challenge for them to some hunters.

While the group looks around of the new surroundings and waiting for Dr. Micro to contact them for their target to kill, they heard a muffle sound behind a humongous boulder behind them, catching few hunters off guard and on attack stance.

"Wh-What the hell was that!? Is it a ghost!?" Sharper said with his guns out, well known for disliking ghosts...except for Esmeralda.

"Calm yourself, ya chicken. I recognize that sound..." said Petire. "Tis is a sound of someone being tied up and gagged."

"Yeah right, like that's someone-"

"Master Petire is right. There is someone behind the rock." Beta informs.

Sharper grumbles while looking at Petire with a smug smile on his face. Quentin rolls his eyes before ordering the hunters to go around the boulder and find out who is the person being tied up. As the group made around the rock, reaching their destination, they spotted a giant young looking woman lying on the ground, tied up in ropes and wrapped cloth around her mouth and to Danny's eyes...she's quite a stunning one. Detailing from top to bottom, she appears to be a ninja which they haven't seen in quite awhile. Long brown hair with large bang covering her right brown eye, curvy body with noticeable large breasts that Danny had been eyeing on. Wearing a revealing tannish pink short kimono style outfit with yellow scarf, shin and hip guards, large brown buckle with palish orange ropes tied, arm guards with blades at the end and sandals.

To the hunters' surprise, the woman was able to spot the tiny hunters with no showing of shock or flabbergast, gently moving her head up while making muffle words to them, telling them to help her.

"Impressive. The kid spotted us and asking for our help. Ninjas must have very good keen sight." said Zeke.

"She must be an elite ninja...which is sooooo cool! I always wanted to meet an actual ninja!" Ylva yelp with joy, wagging her tail.

"Uhh you forgot about me." said Sasha.

"Oh...Well, technically, you are an assassin. You can't, like, vanish in thin air."

"I can blend into shadows, Ylva! It is the same thing!"

"But ninjas vanish! Like poof! Gone! Like the magicians do."

"Pfft...In your dreams..." Slick yawns while scratching his butt.

"Girls...and Slick, that's enough talking about ninjas. We'll discuss this later after we help her out." Quentin said with a sigh. "Atomic, Danny and the recons: Cut the ropes in the upper body."

"On it, boss and I think Danny got a head start." The silver monster pointed at the womanizer already climbing the ninja's body, very close to his destination: Her ample bosom.

"Oh hell...get him before he gets killed."

The recons and Atomic nodded before headed to the ropes while Quentin orders Alanna, Sasha and Ryx to cut the ropes on her lower body, Slyphy and Glenys to heal her wounds since he notice bruised marks on her body, Beta, Ylva, Athanasia, Viz and Esmeralda to watch out from behind for anyone, likely the one who held her hostage, to come back here. As for the sloth...Quentin simply told to relax for a moment...which he gave the leader a thumbs up and lays down, beginning to snore.

After few minutes has been passed of thinning the ropes and healing her , the NanoCorps successfully cuts the ropes, freeing the female ninja and able to remove the cloth herself. The hunters that were on her regroup with the others, dragging Danny from being on her and watching the now freed ninja stands up to full height, towering the tiny hunters and wasn't able to get to see her face due to her mountainous breasts blocking the way until she looks down past them, still able to see the tiny hunters. She then lowers her hand down near them, offering them a lift which they hop on without second thoughts(and carrying Slick) before being lifted up to level with her large bosom which Danny kept staring at all the time...

"Thank you for your assistance, little ones. My name is Kagero; One of Lord Ryoma's retainers." The ninja said, bowing down to them with gratitude.

"Anytime, you beautiful hot ninja! How about a kiss for a reward?" Danny said with a sly look on his face before he was punched by Alanna,

"...Sorry, ignore him...It was no problem at all, just doing our job of saving lives from disasters" said Quentin.

"Why are you all here in Mokushu? Did Lord Ryoma send you all here and how did you get to be so small...?" Kagero asked the hunters with curiosity.

"Uhh..." Quentin worries about telling her about them would losses her trust and will attempt to kill them...and she might be one of Micro's targets.."...I love to answer your questions, but I don't think its a good place to talk, right?"

"Hmm...? Oh yes. I need to return to Lord Ryoma before Kotaro returns...Would you like to come with me?"

"Well, we don;t know where to go...sure, we'll tag along."

Kagero nodded in agreement, now she must place they tiny hunters somewhere...she didn't bring pouch and her outfit doesn't have any pockets. She thought of various places for them to hide: Putting them on top of her head is one of them, but she may lose them in her hair and accidentally hurt them when searching for the hunters,,,or could place them safely on her scarf. the next one is rather...embarrassing, but she could place them in between her large breasts, giving them a cushion and secure hold, though she doesn't wear her bra today , making her breasts bouncing freely, giving the hunters very rough ride (pleasurable for Danny). The last safe place is...her mouth. She can hold them steady in her mouth without swallowing them, but they may not like that one...

With her mind set, Kagero decided to place her tiny saviors in her...

The tiny hunters watches the giant ninja thinks about a place to hide them until she moves her hand above her large breasts, sending them a message that she is going to place in between her breasts. The male hunters' (except for Ryx and Zeke) faces turn bright red and the girls shouted in protest with their faces also turn red. Danny, on the other hand, was so excited that his nose starts to bleed uncontrollably and quickly tries to jump off and dive in head first, but Alanna angrily grabs him by the leg, roughly place back on the skinned ground.

"..Is something wrong?" Kagero asks the hunters, stopping her from placing them in her cleavage.

"You damn right something is wrong! What the hell are you doing!?" Alanna shouted in rage.

"You always vote for escaping!"

Quentin and Zeke sighs while the the hunters arguing on the debate of escaping or fighting and Kagero simply watches them until she spotted some human shape shadows from the distance and coming closer. The ninja lets out a sigh before looking down at the hunters again.

"...Forgive me, but we are out of time. So please bear with it until we are safe."

Before any of the hunters about to ask her, Kagero close her hand around them before stuffing them inside her cleavage, deep enough so they won't bounce their way out. With the NanoCorps secure, the ninja runs towards the opposite direction of the entrance before the enemy ninjas notice she escape...

Later...

12523112222222222221.content:
"Mwahahahaha!" The hunters hear a voice from seemingly nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I am Dr. Van Micro, and I've heard about your many adventures. I have a mission for you, if you choose to accept it -- or even if you don't. I need you to enter the world of Fire Emblem Fates, then find and assassinate Rinkah, a Fire Tribe brawler associated with the kingdom of Hoshido. Despite her stubbornness, Rinkah is a proud and tough warrior. Oh, and one more thing...to keep you all unnoticed by your target, you'll have to be shrunk."

"Shrunk?!" Petire objects. "What do you mean by -- "

Then a bright flash consumes the hunters, and everything goes blank.

...

After an unknown amount of time, the hunters awaken in what looks to be a towering rice field...or, are they just tiny now? Before they can seek answers, a pale-haired giantess walks into the rice paddy to ensure the health of the crops. The Nanocorps take note of this person's features -- a muscular body, a spiky kanabo (that's Hoshidan talk for club!), tanned skin, and her toned midriff exposed.

This has to be Rinkah, the hot-blooded warrior of the Fire Tribe. The Nanocorps' target.

"So...hot!!" Danny exclaims.

"What?! It's not even that warm out!" Petire replies.

"I was referring to Rinkah. Man, I would KILL to get closer to that giantess..."

"So, how should we do this, Q-man?" Atomic asks his boss.

"Good question..." Quentin thinks out loud. "We might need to..."

She was kidnapped from Nohr and raised in Hoshido, and her songs are soothing to the soul. Oh, and you'll all need to be shrunk."

Or...are they just...shrunken?

Soon, the hunters hear a female voice humming beautifully -- a certain woman is then seen caring for the rice paddy...she's got blue hair, a white dress, a mystical pendant...

It's Azura!

So, what will the Nanocorps do?
125231122222222222222211.title: Yet the waters ever change...

1252311222222222222222112.content:
Before the hunters can do anything, Azura spots unfamiliar beings on the ground. Curious, she scoops them up into her hand, raising them to eye level.

"Tiny people..?" Azura reacts. Danny is lost in a gaze as he drools at the giantess, earning him a smack upside the head from Petire.

"We come in peace," Quentin lies. "Who might you be?"

"My name is Azura. I was born in the kingdom of Nohr but raised in Hoshido. However, we are currently in an Astral Realm -- Corrin and the two kingdoms built a castle for us to live in. May I ask...what brought you here?"

Ohhhh boy. The one question the Nanocorps do NOT want to hear. Now what?
1252311222222222222222112.title: Meeting Azura

12523112222222222222221122.content:
"To be honest, Azura, we don't remember much," Quentin fibs.

"Odd..." Azura says, "but I suppose you can stay in the castle until your memories return."

Azura then brings the tiny hunters into the palace, entering her bedroom and placing them on her bed.

"I really hope you weren't lying to me in order to cause trouble," Azura sighs before exiting the room, leaving the hunters alone to recuperate.

"Something's strange about that woman..." Zeke wonders out loud. "Could she be...a princess?"

"If that's the case," says Quentin, "then we can't kill her. Assassinating royalty would violate our code of conduct -- no ifs, ands, or buts."

Next...

125231122222222222222211223.content:
Before the Nanocorps can discuss their situation any further, Azura returns to the room, but this time she's not alone -- having followed her are Nohr princesses Camilla and Elise, and Hoshido princesses Hinoka and Sakura!

"These are the mysterious people I was telling you about," says Azura to the other royals, who then take a look at the tiny hunters.

"W-whoa!" Sakura reacts to the sight.

"How did this..?" Camilla wonders.

"They're so CUTE!" Elise coos.

"I hope these people aren't hostile..." Hinoka muses.

"So, tiny people," Azura asks, "do you remember anything now? Is there anything you'd like to tell us?"

The hunters are nervous about this question -- even Zeke is a bit uneasy! However, as leader, Quentin must make a choice and fast.
125231122222222222222211223.title: Meeting More Princesses

1252311222222222222222112233.content:
Before Quentin can answer, a new figure enters the room -- the grey-haired princess Corrin, who forged peace between Hoshido and Nohr.

"Hey, what's going on here?" Corrin asks, before seeing the tiny people on the floor. "Wait...are those...tiny people?"

"It would appear so," confirms Azura, "but we're trying to find out where they're from, and why they're here."

Curious about one particular tiny hunter, Corrin scoops up Quentin into her hand and brings him to eye level, making him blush.

"This little one is kind of cute..." Corrin thinks out loud before blushing, realizing the other princesses heard what she said!

Will Quentin finally speak up?
1252311222222222222222112233.title: Aaaaand here comes Corrin.

The group gets some food at the mess hall

"To be truthful with you, Corrin," Quentin sighs, "we were sent to kill Azura...however, our code of conduct does not allow us to assassinate royalty. The menace who sent us -- Dr. Van Micro -- isn't really on the stable side."

The princesses are struck silent by the Nanocorps' revelation, yet unable to deny that they're being honest.

"I...don't know what to say to that..." Corrin says.

"So, you're NOT going to kill anyone now, correct?" Azura asks.

"Correct," affirms Quentin.

"Very well. You may stay in the palace if you'd like..."

The hunters can't help but smile...

...minus Slick, who just so happens to be asleep. Again.

In the deep woods, a bit far from the main camping site, a red hooded figure was on the ground, seemingly sniffing for ‘treasures’ along with another figure who is…hoping around from bushes to bushes like a carefree person. The two girls are named Velouria, a parent loving, junk(treasures) obsessing Wolfskin and Selkie, a playful and innocent Kitsune. The two decided to collect any variable or rare treasure they can find, but so far, that’s only a leather pouch and rabbit’s furball…

Velouria happily keeps the treasures without thinking twice and decided to check on Selkie’s progress…only to find the playful vixen chasing after a bird, losing her focus on collect stuff. The wolf girl sighs of disappointment and resume her treasure hunt elsewhere. A few minutes has passed with no luck of finding the rare treasure, Velouria picks up something that smells quite…divine. She smiles with joy and follows the scent’s direction, she really can’t wait to find it and show it to her beloved father. But as she got closer to the scent’s location, she heard voices behind the bushes…and it sounds human. The wolf girl growls in annoyance cause she may have to ask them to give the treasure to her…So she gets near the bush without being notice and eavesdrop of their conversation.

“…Mwhahaha! So, you hunters got all the information?” The mad scientist Dr. Micro said to his hire workers.

“We do, though some of us are…not agreeing with this.” Quentin looks at Viz who is grumbling about the mission, along with Alanna who sharpen her blade in boredom.
