She wears a black and navy blue, high-collared halter top, a black corset with two pairs of white laces and black shorts, white bell-sleeves with small, segmented piece of armor on each of her upper arms and tan, fingerless gloves, black stockings reaching about halfway up her thighs, two strips of blue cloth draped over each of her hips and armored silver boots with sharp hook in the outer side.

"Hot Damn! What a woman~!" Danny drools at the sight of his savoir.

"Ooh the poor fool...Anyway, she did save our butts. Question is...Did she see us?" said Petire.

"Only one way to find out..." Quentin said while watching the giant woman getting closer and closer with each booming steps she takes...
1253221.title: Ambush in the Dark World

choices: NanoCorps and Aqua get to know each other
12532211.content:
The gigantic boot of the woman stops right in front of the tiny hunters, slowly crouching down to get a better view of them, the same goes to the hunters...especially Danny. Her blue eyes filled the hunters' entire view, her breathing is loud and feeling a little gust coming from her nose. The woman's lips begins parting as she begins speaking to the hunters, bathing them in her hot breath.

"Sorry if I frighten you." The woman softy speak, knowing her voice could hurt their ears. "I saw a little light at the distance and those strange monsters appear. Are you alright?"

"Yeah, we're alright. Thanks for your help, miss...?" said Quentin.

"Aqua and you are welcome...But can I ask you something?"

"Sure."

"Are you...tiny people, faeries?

"Faeries!? Heh! I don't know about that but I'm sure as hell Viz and Alanna is not. They are little imps from Hell to cause wreak and havoc across the world, he he-Ow!" Petire felt a kick from behind before facing an angry face of Viz with his mechanized hand bawled up.

"Are you really looking for death...?"

"See? Told you." Petire laughs once more before getting punched in the gut.

"Ugh...I'm Quentin Andross, leader of the NanoCorps and we was sent here by a crazy doc who want us to...hurt someone, but it looks like we made a slight detour and ended up in this Realm of Darkness...filled with strange monsters."

"NanoCorps? I never heard of that name before...Are you from a different world?" Aqua asked

"Sort of...By the way, what are you doing here? It must be dangerous for you to be out here..."

"It's...rather a long story..." Aqua sighs before standing at full height. "I can't stand around here...I have to find a way out. I suggest you tiny ones to do the same."

"Wish we could, kid, but the device not responding nor the doctor trying to contact us...So we're kinda stuck here." Zeke said rubbing his chin.

"I see...Why don't you come with me? I can protect you from those black creatures."

"Sounds like a good idea, right hunters?" Quentin asked his comrades which they agree except for Danny as he jumps on Aqua's boot, hugging it with delight.

"Baby, you can protect me anytime!" Danny said with his face rubbing against the armored part of her shoe. Aqua looks at the other hunters, confused about this tiny man's weird behavior.

"Don't ask....He's a bit delusional around girls." Viz shrugs. "Let's leave him there and get a move one."

"Sounds good to me! I'll get acquainted with Aqua's foot~!"

Quentin shook his head before seeing Aqua lower hand near the hunter for a lift, each hunters jumps-with the womanizer Danny on tow thanks to Atomic's tentacle-on her landscape glove covered palm and able to see details of the gloves. With the tiny hunters in hand, Aqua resume her journey across the ominous Realm of Darkness...at least she's not alone for awhile...
12532211.title: Meeting the Giantess Keyblade Master

1253222.content: This quiet yet stoic young woman who was originated from Final Fantasy VIII?
1253222.title: Fuu

12533.content: How about this RPG series?
12533.title: Xenosaga

1253312.content: The dangerous yet beautiful weapn?
1253312.title: KOS-MOS

12533121.content:
The Nano-Corps emerges from the portal, landing on the hard floor. They scan their new location to see what's new...They did notice one thing besides they are shrunken and such; the furniture, wall design, even the floor they are standing on appears to be futuristic...

"Good gravy...I think we're in the future." Petire said. "What year we landed on?

"We are in T.C. 4768, Master Petire." Beta said.

"..Beg your pardon?"

"We are in T.C. 4768, Master Petire."

"I know that, ya rust bucket! No need to repeat it."

"Interesting. It seems were in a Transcend Christ...Which means 'After Christ'" Zeke said. "So basically, we're in a future...A future we may not live to see-well Atomic and Beta may live to see another day,"

"Thanks for the info, old man." Viz sighs under his breathe. "Let's get down to business already..."

"Oh come on, Viz. Don't ya wanna explore this futuristic world?" Danny said,

"Not in this size..."

"Heh, I do agree with Viz on that one. Being tiny is not my choice...Vixen might like it, but not me..." Quentin chuckles as he having a thought about him being at the palm of his girlfriend. "Anyway, the scientist should give us a info right about now."

"Mwhahaha! How right your are, dear boy!" A hologram of Dr. Micro appears before the hunters from the device they use. "Looks like you made it! Welcome to the future! Do you know what year you are in now?"

"T.C. 4768. Beta already told us...A year that we may not live to see."

"Mhahahaha....Huh...You know, it's quite sad now you think about. Poor old me...Never gonna see the day when-"

"Not to be a jackass, but we already done that." Ralph said while rolling his eyes.

"Err...Right. Your target of the day is...Not what I'm expecting....I hope you got enough power to kill this one."

"Who is it?"

"Her name is KOS-MOS. A VERY powerful android that was developed by Vector Industries, who is created by Kevin Winnicot and administrated by Shion Uzuki. The name 'KOS-MOS' is actually a short for-"

"Kosmos Obey Strategical Multiple Operation System." Beta said.

"...As the robot said. And according to my research...Your dealing a Version 4 KOS-MOS. Oooh, talk about an unlucky day to kill the target...Mwhaha." The scientist laughs.

"What do you mean?"

"KOS-MOS has been through hell and back with her companions and undergo some upgrades. The Version 4 is her latest, so be prepare for one long battle...To the death. Mwhahaha!...However, you should be fine because you have a...Monster with you." Dr. Micro points out to Atomic since he is the ultimate life form who is invincible.

"Gihaha! Well thanks for the kind complement, however I'm still not happy of being small while we kill our target." Atomic growls.

"Uhh...If you were in regular size, you would downright slaughter KOS-MOS." Danny said with a grin on his face.

"Point taken."

"And it would be a good challenge for once, right? Being tiny while the target is gigantic?"

"Hmm...Alright ya convince me...But I still don't like it."

Just when Atomic finish his ranting, Beta detects someone nearby and warns the hunters. The hunters, along with Dr.Micro's hologram, ran under the table nearby and hid behind the large table leg.

"Who is it Beta?"

"It's the target." The hunters then heard a door making a swishing noise which is quite loud to them, follow by a two booming noise and a gold and white object appears in front of them. They trail up the object that appears to be a footwear attach to a leg and torso...Until they seen the face of the target.

"Whoa! Who is that lovely beauty!?" Danny starts to drool.

"Gentleman! I present to you...KOS-MOS!" The scientist said. "Look at her beautiful form...Her long beautiful blue hair...Her red emotionless eyes...Lovely body..And-"

"Them legs!"

"Shut up Danny!" Petire slaps him at the back of the head.

"But them legs though..."

While Quentin ignoring the two, he notice KOS-MOS is looking down at the floor, appears to be scanning...Then she looks at the table that the hunters are location and looks down at the floor...Looking straight at them.

"...Before you go, doc, does KOS-MOS has an AI on her." He asked the scientist.

"Hmm...According to the research...She, in fact, does have one. Why did you asked...?"

"Shit...We're gonna have to cut you off, doc. I think KOS-MOS knows we're here!"

"Oh! Well then, good luck hunters! Pray for your safety!" Dr. Micro laughs before signing off.

"...Is he really gonna pray for us?" Sharper said

"Now's not the time for that, dumb ass!" Petire said while the hunters runs in front of the towering KOS-MOS, while they are ready to battle they notice Slick is not with them...Meaning he is asleep during their conversation. Atomic sprouts a tenacle from his back and grabs the sleeping Slick, putting him on his shoulder.

"Guess we can't teleport our way out..." Quentin sighs.

The Nano-Corps ready themselves for a huge battle that could be their toughest one yet...Before they begin, the giant Gynoid begins to talk..
12533121.title: Targeting the Robot Combat Weapon

125331211.content:
Those words from KOS-MOS's mouth pretty much means they about to have a showdown. Quentin orders the hunters to spread out so it will be easier to attack her in different direction instead of attacking together. Before they ready to move, the hunters notice a large shadow engulfing them. Looking up to see KOS-MOS's massive foot hovering above them and brought her foot down in seconds. Luckily, the hunters able to spread out just in time before being splat under her foot, creating a gust that sends the hunters scrambling in the air except for Atomic due to his heavy weight.

"Damn it! Why did we accept this shitty job!?" Viz curses as he and the hunters landed safely on their feet.

"Argh...Atomic, mind if you and Beta distract her for a bit? We'll need a plan to take her out." Quentin asked the hunters.

"Gihaha! Not a problem, Q-Man! I actually wanted to test this female weapon out!" Atomic grins while cracking his knuckles.

:As you wish, Master Andross." Beta said.

"Thanks you two! Since you and Beta are my top strongest hunters, I'm sure you two can handle her while we come up with a plan...That involves our sleepy head here."

"I got him." Viz grabs a hold of Slick who is still sleeping.

"Alright, let's move!" Quentin and his team heads back to their previous hiding spot to figure out how to take down the gigantic android. While they are running, KOS-MOS spotted the group and prepares to attack again.

"You will not get away." As KOS-MOS begins her assault, she felt a small yet powerful pain that hits her right thigh. She immediately turns to the location of where it was coming from. By at her left foot, she spotted two tiny figures with one of them carrying a large rocket launcher.

"It seems the target has notice us." Beta said while changing the weapon into a chain gun.

"Gihaha! Hey, KOS-MOS! Let see you can handle Atomic Vile, the ultimate 'tank'!" Atomic yells, ready to battle. "Come on, beautiful! Let me show you my punches!"
125331211.title: The Battle of their lives: Nano-Corps vs. KOS-MOS

1253312111.content:
"So....Got any ideas how to take her out?" Atomic asked Beta.

"I thought Master Quentin told us to distract KOS-MOS." Beta said.

"Yeah...But I feel like I wanna punch her, just to see if she is powerful." While the two talking, they were unaware that KOS-MOS is about to make her move. She lowers her hand attempting to grab the two intruders.

"Danger threat detected. Escaping her attack is impossible. I suggest counter it." Before Atomic got the chance to attack, KOS-MOS successfully grab the two, enclosing them. She lifted them up to her face and quietly stares at her hand.

The two hunters are in darkness, unable to see where they are. Beta turns a light on that was in his chest area, viewing what it seems to be massive cavern of black cloth, Suddenly they heard a loud god like voice that was belong to their target.

"Intruders. Surrender or I will force to kill you. I will also locate the other intruders and capture them as well."
1253312111.title: Life Form and Machine vs.Gigantic Female Weapon

12533122.content: Similar to KOS-MOS, but more evil...
12533122.title: T-elos

125331222.content: The young and cute Realian?
125331222.title: MOMO Mizrahi

125332.content:
How about the world-famous Super Mario games?

There's bound to be gorgeous giantesses to target, like...Princess Peach...Daisy...Rosalina...

So how about it?
125332.title: Super Mario?

1253321.content:
Now that we've picked the franchise, we need to pick the giantess.

How about none other than Princess Peach, beautiful ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom?
1253321.title: Peach?

choices: Go for her leg while she's distracted!
12533211.content:
Our miniscule heroes, through methods too complex to explain here, arrive in the Mushroom Kingdom, near Princess Peach's castle. Apparently she is their target. The troupe considers taking her down, but at their size they will have to settle for a small sample of blood.

At Zeke's suggestion, the group utilizes stealth and sneaks into Peach's kitchen, where the Princess is currently enjoying some bread as a midday snack.

Now, how will the NanoCorps strike their target?
12533211.title: Targeting the Mushroom Princess

choices: She puts them in her mouth
She traps them in her bra
125332112.content:
Climbing onto the table, the Nanocorps prepare a syringe for the blood-draining mission, but suddenly, Peach spots them! The tiny hunters have no time to run and are snatched up by her gloved hand, brought to eye level.

"What...why?!" asks Peach. "Why would you tiny things want to kill me?!"

"Well, actually -- " begins Petire, before being interrupted by a slap from Quentin.

"This will not go unpunished!"

What punishment does Peach have in mind?
125332112.title: Caught by the Mushroom Princess

choices: Peach spits them out and talks to the hunters
1253321121.content:
Princess Peach thinks many ways to punish the tiny intruders...until she got one. It may scare them but this will sure teach them a lesson not to hurt the princess. The hunters watches as she opens her mouth and moves them towards her gaping mouth. Some hunters tried to reach their equipment but her fingers wrap them quite tightly and Slick...well, he's asleep so no teleporting out of here..As they getting close to her, Peach toss them inside her mouth before closing her mouth behind them.

The tiny hunters landed on her massive tongue...It looks like a massive wet cave with large teeth ready for chomping and uvula that hangs at the back of the abyss like some sort of guardian...,Quentin orders the group to find a way out of here without harming the princess, though he thought Atomic would lift the row of teeth up, forcing herself to open her mouth but could damage her pearly whites...

Peach, meanwhile, gently sways her tongue around, causing the hunters inside to slip and fall in different spots. She really don't want to harm the strange tiny people, but could try talking to them once she done punishing them... .
1253321121.title: Mouth of the Princess

choices: Peach tries to get them out
They pound the stomach walls for Peach's attention
12533211211.content:
As she continues to swish the tiny hunters around inside her mouth, Peach seems to be enjoying their flavor. Her tongue's swaying increases in intensity, thrusting the hunters all about their moist prison, but after a few minutes, the princess accidentally flicks the tinies into the dark chasm of her throat, swallowing by reflex. Her eyes widen as Peach realizes her mistake.

"Uh oh..." worries Peach, putting a hand to her belly.

Meanwhile, the hunters fall for seconds that seem like hours, until they crash-land with a wet plop in a larger, hotter, wetter chamber -- Peach's stomach.

"No need to panic, team," assures Quentin as he gets up. "We can get out of anything."

"Says you!!" argues Petire. "We've never been EATEN before...let alone eaten by a PRINCESS!"

"Calm down," says Zeke, "Quentin's right. We can get out of here with our lives intact..."

As the group brainstorms ways to escape Peach's digestive system...
12533211211.title: Accidents Happen

choices: Peach saw the hunters right near her...safe and unharmed?
125332112111.content:
Peach, walking back and forth in a panic, trying to figure out how to get the little people out of her stomach before they are digested. She could try throwing up and they should make it out of there safely, but it's rather a not so royalty way and it's disgusting...The princess sighs in annoyance, thinking this is the only to let them out, hurries over her private bathroom.

As she hover over the sink, Peach takes a long deep breath before slowly trying to throw up...
125332112111.title: Getting the NanoCorps out

125332112112.content:
As she worries about the tiny hunters she'd swallowed by mistake, Peach suddenly feels a sharp pain in her stomach. Realizing that the Nanocorps are attacking her stomach walls, Peach slaps her belly in an attempt to stop them from causing any further aches.

"Quit squirming down there!" Peach orders, with a hand to her tummy. "Just for that, I think I'll keep you in there to digest!"

The hunters are knocked back by the rumbles of their gastric prison, and thus try to think up a better way out.
125332112112.title: Kept in Peach's Stomach

choices: The hunters exit through the..."back door".
1253321121121.content:
With no other option, the Nanocorps jump one by one through a small sphincter on the floor of Peach's stomach before finding themselves in a long, thin, non-linear tunnel -- the intestines.

After several minutes of traveling through this disgusting pathway...
1253321121121.title: The long and gross journey...

12533212.content:
You're turning down Peach? OK, then...

How about Sarasaland's tomboyish ruler, Princess Daisy?
12533212.title: Daisy?

choices: Create a diversion and use it to drain Daisy's blood.
125332121.content:
Dear Quentin and crew,

I've heard a lot about the work you've done lately, but your next challenge will be a new experience for you. I need you to travel to the kingdom of Sarasaland and siphon a sample of blood from its ruler, Princess Daisy. The device attached to this letter will transport you there, but to maintain stealth, it will also shrink you all to about an inch in size.

Best of luck,

Dr. Van Micro

"Dr. Van Micro?" wonders Quentin. Before the team can ask further questions, the enigmatic device attached to the letter emits a blinding light, and all goes blank.

...

After some time, the team awakens in a rather gigantic hallway, where an orange-dressed giantess -- Princess Daisy -- is sipping some tea.

"So this must be Sarasaland Castle..." states Quentin. "Well, we'd better think up a plan to leech some of Daisy's blood."

What will that plan be?
125332121.title: Targeting the Tomboy Princess

1253321212.content:
Before the hunters can think up an elaborate plan to drain Daisy's blood, the giantess's hand reaches down and scoops them all up, bringing them closer to eye level.

"Tiny people?!" realizes Daisy. "What are you all doing here?"

Do they dare tell the Princess what they've come for?
1253321212.title: Caught by the Tomboy Princess

choices: Daisy wakes up before they can get away!
12533212121.content:
"We're aliens," fibs Quentin, "and we'd like to consider diplomatic relations with your kingdom."

Surprisingly, Princess Daisy believes this lie!

"Interesting," replies Daisy, unaware that Beta is morphing one of his arms into a needle of some sort. "Well, tell me more about your world and maybe -- "

Then the Princess feels a tiny prick in her thumb, before collapsing into the floor. Luckily, none of the hunters are hurt by the seemingly long fall. On Quentin's orders, Beta now morphs his other arm into a syringe and pokes into the unconscious princess's arm, filling it with some of her blood.

"Mission accomplished!" announces Beta.

"Now we should find Dr. Van Micro while we have the chance," advises Zeke.
12533212121.title: Just One Little Lie

125332121211.content:
"This looks like the place," says Zeke as the hunters arrive at an eerie laboratory in the middle of the woods. After an hour or so of navigating the labyrinth of hallways, Quentin and crew finally make it into a room, where a strange fellow in a white lab coat is sipping some tea.

"I take it you completed your mission?" asks the mysterious man.

"Dr. Van Micro," reveals Quentin. "We meet at last."

"Now, where's that royal blood I requested?"

"We have obtained plenty of the fluid," says Beta, emptying their red prize into a glass before Quentin hands the glass to the doctor.

"Excellent," congratulates Van Micro. "You've done well, Nanocorps. Thanks to your hard work, I can now experience a new flavor of tea!" The mad doctor pours a bit of blood into his next helping of tea before gulping it down. "Delicious!!"

"THAT'S why you hired us?!" rages Petire. The other hunters aren't pleased, either.

"What, you expect me to improve my drinks myself?!" responds the doctor.

...

The next thing he feels is Quentin's fist on his head.
125332121211.title: There's a REASON he's deemed "weird".

12533212123.content:
As she waits for a response from the tiny hunters in her hand, Daisy hears a loud rumble. Blushing, the princess puts a free hand to her belly.

"Sorry about that..." Daisy says nervously. "I guess I'm getting kinda hungry..."
12533212123.title: Daisy's hungry...

125332121231.content:
"Wh-what?!" Petire reacts in response to what Daisy just said. "We're bounty hunters, not food!"

But the giantess princess doesn't seem to care -- she pops the Nanocorps into her mouth and closes her teeth and lips tight.

The hunters land on the slimy tongue of Princess Daisy, failing to see its pink coloration in the dark, wet cavern. They then proceed to assault every inch of their prison, hoping their captor will spit them out...
125332121231.title: Daisy's Dessert

1253321212312.content:
Unfortunately for them, Daisy tilts her head back and swallows the Nanocorps team down in one swift gulp. Feeling the little morsels land in her stomach, she pats her belly a few times, satisfied with her...appetizer.

The hunters, meanwhile, have been squeezed down the Princess's esophagus before landing in the hot, moist chamber of her stomach.

"Oh, for crying out loud!!" Petire complains. "The Doc sends us to kill this lady, and she ends up EATING us!"

"Calm down," Quentin orders, "we can't assassinate royalty anyway. No ifs, ands, or buts."

"What about my sore butt? Does that count?"

"So, how do we get outta this one, boss?" Atomic asks.

What is Quentin's answer?
1253321212312.title: Unwilling Snacks

12533212123122.content:
"...you don't have a plan, do you?" Petire asks.

"Nope." Quentin admits. "Any ideas?"

The other hunters raise their hands, apparently having backup plans to escape Daisy's hot, slimy, unbearable stomach.

"Any ideas that DON'T involve taking the back exit?"

The hunters lower their hands slowly.

On the outside, Daisy feels her stomach rumble and puts a hand on her belly to try to quiet the gurgling of her hungry gut.

"Those tiny people didn't even fill me up..." Daisy says to herself. "Guess I'll give them some company!"

The princess then walks to her kitchen and looks in the cabinet for a snack to satisfy her hunger. She then spots a box of cheese-flavored crackers (kinda like Cheez-its, but not really), and next to that a bottle of digestive aid pills...but that would be kinda cruel.

What does Daisy decide?
12533212123122.title: Daisy's Decision

choices: Atomic punched the stomach, giving Daisy a bad stomach pain
125332121231221.content:
Meanwhile...

"Well...Since no one has any ideas, I just though of one: Punish the princess." Quentin said that cause the hunters gasp in shock. "Let me finish...Punish the princess by attacking her stomach and who's the right guy for this one? Why it's Atomic Vile, of course."

"Gihaha! I l'm liken the idea!" Atomic laughs while flexing his muscles.

"Whoa, Q-man. Atomic punching Daisy's stomach? You know that's gonna end terrible." said Petire.

"It's either us getting digested or getting us out of here by attacking her..." said Zeke.

"I'm sure she'll toughen out! Right then! Let's get started!" Atomic roars with joy and gets close to the stomach wall, but as he was about to punch the wall, a large mutiple of orange objects coming down from Daisy's throat, splashes down in the stomach acid causing her stomach to gurgle some more and the acid rising...

"Shit! She's eating crackers! I guess eating us wasn;t enough..." Alanna growls.

"Make matters worst, the acid is rising....Atomic, hurry!"

"Right!" Atomic gets in position and ready to start punching the stomach wall...
125332121231221.title: Crackers Ahoy!

choices: Yes, and the hunters get digested
Thankfully no. The Nanocorps have a chance to escape!
1253321212312211.content:
As she swallows another cracker, Princess Daisy winces, suddenly feeling a sharp pain in her abdomen. What the heck was in those crackers?

No...it can't be the crackers...

"Ugh!!" Daisy groans. "Those little people must be putting up a fight in there! Well, not if I can help it!"

Daisy gets up and hurries back to the kitchen cabinet to fetch her digestive-aid pills, but is she fast enough to swallow one?
1253321212312211.title: Must be something she ate...

12533212123122112.content:
Before she can even grab the pill bottle, Daisy flinches again, feeling the familiar struggling of her shrunken snacks in her tummy.

Meanwhile...

"Don't worry, guys," assures Atomic between punches to the stomach wall, "we'll be out of this death trap in no time!"

Back on the outside, Daisy suddenly feels queasy. As she rushes to her personal bathroom, the princess feels like she's about to puke...
12533212123122112.title: Not much of a chance...but still a chance.

125332121231221122.content:
Upon reaching the bathroom, Daisy feels something quickly rising up her throat, implying that she's going to throw up...but she manages to swallow it back down. With a sigh, the princess rubs her belly and walks back to the kitchen to relax at the table.

Meanwhile, inside Daisy's stomach...

"Darn it!!" Quentin curses. "I thought for sure that would work!"

"We may have to go the natural way..." Zeke says, not liking the idea any more than the others are.

Next...
125332121231221122.title: Stuck in Daisy's Tummy

choices: The hunters escape through the "back door" on their own
1253321212312211221.content:
Unfortunately, the throat is way too far up for the hunters to reach. So, they go with Zeke's plan -- enter Daisy's intestines. The team looks around the stomach for the way down, and soon enough...

"Found something!" Danny announces, pointing out a small hole.

"Nice work," says Quentin before leading the group down the aforementioned hole. They quickly find themselves in a thin, non-linear tunnel -- Daisy's small intestine -- and proceed to trek through the fleshy pathway.

Approximately two hours later...

"Ugh..." Daisy groans, clutching her tummy. "I gotta go!"

The princess rushes toward her personal bathroom, unwarily shaking up the tiny hunters inside her body. She then removes her dress, lowers her panties, and sits atop the toilet before...making pressure.
1253321212312211221.title: When Nature Calls

choices: Yes, time to warp out of here!
Nope, only one way out now...
12533212123122112212.content:
Feeling the intestines gurgle all around, Quentin decides that extreme measures must be taken.

"Slick? Slick!!" Quentin says, shaking the sleeping sloth lightly to wake him up. "We gotta teleport out of here, fast!"

Does Slick even wake up?
12533212123122112212.title: Plan B

125332121231221122121.content:
"Urgh..." Slick groans as he slowly wakes up. "...huh?"

"We gotta get out of here," Danny panics amid the gurgling of Daisy's intestines, "NOW!!"

"Alright..."

Concentrating his willpower, the groggy sloth and his teammates are soon consumed in a bright light before being teleported...
125332121231221122121.title: Warp!

1253321212312211221212.content: Inside Daisy? Like, in one of her lungs?
1253321212312211221212.title: Her lung?

125332121231221122121221.content:
The hunters are bathed in a bright light before finding themselves somewhere...fleshy. However, this place doesn't smell like Daisy's stomach at all! Everything looks pinkish in here, and countless nerves crackle with sparks, processing the Princess's thoughts.

"Well, crap..." Petire says. "We're in Daisy's brain!"

"Hang on," Quentin says, "perhaps we could complete our mission by messing with Daisy's brain!"

"Optimal suggestion, Master Quentin," says Beta, morphing one arm into what looks like a plug. The metallic hunter then plugs this arm into the great pink organ, and sparks fly rapidly through it.

What happens next?
125332121231221122121221.title: Daisy's Brain

choices: Daisy, feeling sick, pukes the hunters up
1253321212312211221212222.content:
Daisy, seated upon her personal toilet, does her...business...and gets up from the porcelain seat before putting her panties and dress back on. Looking into the toilet bowl, she sees no trace of those tiny little people she'd eaten earlier.

"That's more like it," Daisy says to herself before flushing the toilet, convinced that her tiny snacks are a part of her now.

However, this is not the case. The Nanocorps, thanks to Slick's teleportation powers, have been transported out of the princess's intestines and...

...back into the slimy chamber that is her stomach.

"What the..?!" Danny reacts, clearly shocked.

"Slick, you idiot!!" Petire snaps, only to notice that the sloth has dozed off once again.

Next...
1253321212312211221212222.title: Epic Fail

125332122.content:
You're turning down Daisy, too?!

Hmm...

How about Rosalina, the cosmic enchantress from the Super Mario Galaxy games?
125332122.title: Rosalina?

1253321221.content:
"Mwahahaha!" the hunters hear. "Greetings, hunters! I, Dr. Van Micro, have heard of your adventures and found a new challenge for you. I need you to find and assassinate Rosalina, a space princess of the Super Mario universe. Oh, and to remain undetected, you'll all have to be shrunk."

"Shrunk?!" wonders Petire. "What kind of idiot -- "

Just then, the Nanocorps are blinded by a bright light, and all goes blank.
1253321221.title: Targeting the Cosmic Princess

12533212211.content:
The hunters eventually awaken on a metallic floor...surrounded by starry space...this must be the Comet Observatory! And gazing at the bright objects beyond is Rosalina herself -- the Nanocorps' target.

"Our quarry is in sight, Master Quentin," says Beta.

"So, what's the plan, boss?" asks Viz.

So...what IS the plan?
12533212211.title: So, What's the Plan?

choices: Quentin gets her attention by yelling
Rosalina greets them, already know their presence
125332122111.content:
"How about talking to the princess?" said Quentin.

"Really? Just talk to her?...Sounds boring." Alanna huffs a bit. "But you're the boss, so lead on."

"You gonna get your ass whooped anyway." Atomic laughs out loud and felt a punch on the gut by the now angry horned elf.

"Knock it off..."

The hunters move in closer to the giant princess who is still stargazing with one of the stars twirling around her and has eyes...Could be her pet? Friendly or Hostile? The thoughts around the leader as they got closer to the princess and notice that she is actually floating off the ground just a bit...Perhaps she could be a goddess...? Well there is one thing he need to keep in mind: This target is not to be mess with. Princess or Goddess.

Once the hunters got close enough, they are in awe of her gigantic figure. Her long blue dress flowing as she levitated along with her light blonde hair and a silver crown on her head. Danny's mouth was wide open enough to place a fist in it.

"Shut it, Danny." Petire slaps the womanizer on the head.

"Oww! I-I didn't say anything!"

"You were about to said it...Alright Q-man, let's get her attention."

"Right right." Quentin steps forward a bit and looks up at their giant target, hopefully she isn't hostile towards them and mistaken them as bugs...
125332122111.title: Approaching the Princess

choices: Yes, and she picks them up
1253321221111.content:
As she gazes at the stars, Rosalina is interrupted by tiny noises. It almost sounds like...yelling?

Looking around, the princess doesn't see anyone of her scale nearby...what could be going on here?

Does Rosalina notice the hunters?
1253321221111.title: Getting Rosalina's Attention

12533212211111.content:
Looking down at the ground behind her, Rosalina is surprised to see several tiny people! Curious, she scoops them up into her hand and raises them to eye level.

"Wow..." Rosalina marvels. "You're all so small! Who are you? Where did you come from?"

How will Quentin respond?
12533212211111.title: Talking to Rosalina

1253321221112.content:
"Tiny people?"

Oh crud. It looks like Rosalina already knows the hunters are there! But hopefully she has no idea that their employer wants her dead.

"Hello, tiny people," greets Rosalina as she looks down at the Nanocorps. "What brings you here?"

What will Quentin answer?
1253321221112.title: Talking to the Cosmic Princess

choices: ...raises her foot to stomp the hunters.
12533212211122.content:
"We were sent here to kill you," says Quentin bluntly.

Rosalina is shocked to hear what Quentin just said -- they came to kill her?

"What...why?" is all Rosalina can respond with.

"Some madman named Dr. Van Micro requested it," says Petire.

"However, our number-one rule is to never assassinate royalty," Zeke states. "If you'd just let us siphon a small sample of blood, we could fool the mad doctor easily!"

At first, the giantess is silent. After a few quiet seconds, she...
12533212211122.title: A Questionable Decision

choices: Rosalina wants the hunters to stay...for lunch...
They find Dr. Van Micro's lab
125332122111221.content:
To the hunters' surprise, Rosalina lowers an arm down to them.

"You tiny things are very strange," says Rosalina, "but I'm willing to help you out anyway."

Beta promptly morphs an arm into a syringe and gently pokes it into the delicate skin of Rosalina's arm. The giantess manages to endure the slight pain for a few seconds before the now-full syringe is removed.

"That...wasn't so bad!" Rosalina states.

"Eh, well, you know..." Petire says.

"We'd better get this blood to Dr. Micro ASAP," Quentin cuts in, before the hunters begin to head on their way to the mad doctor's domain.

Next...
125332122111221.title: A Willing Giantess

1253321221112211.content:
As the Nanocorps begin to leave, Rosalina's heeled foot suddenly comes down in a stomp, blocking the hunters' path.

"Don't go just yet!" Rosalina says. "It gets lonely up here when my Lumas wander off. Why don't you all stay...for lunch?"

The cosmic princess then licks her lips, almost seductively. Quentin doesn't like the look of this...

"And...what's for lunch?" Quentin asks, uneasy.

Rosalina clarifies by saying...
1253321221112211.title: Lunch for...who?.

choices: They successfully put her to sleep
125332122112.content:
"We need to take her down stealthily," decides Quentin, "because at our current puny size, an open assault...isn't the best idea."

The hunters carefully and quietly approach the stargazing giantess, as Beta converts an arm into a syringe with which to knock Rosalina out cold.
125332122112.title: Sneak Attack

choices: They drain blood and make their escape
They get the blood, but somehow lose it
1253321221121.content:
Beta pokes his needle into the unwary Rosalina's leg, and in short seconds, the giantess falls back and dozes off.

"W-wait!" says Danny suddenly. "Why do we have to kill this beauty?!"

"Hmm...he has a point," ponders Zeke, "the Doctor might not be able to tell whether we've actually killed our target."

"I suppose you're right," admits Quentin. "A sample of blood should be enough to fool Van Micro. Beta, would you do the honors?"

"Certainly, Master Quentin," Beta complies. He then morphs his other arm into a syringe for the blood-siphoning process.
1253321221121.title: Nighty night, Rosie!

choices: She stuffs them in her mouth
She tries to crush them with her foot
12533212211212.content:
As the giantess Rosalina slowly and groggily awakens from her forced slumber, she feels something poking her leg, causing her to yelp in pain.

"Crap..." mutters Quentin.

The hunters attempt to make a run for it, but Rosalina stands up and snatches the tinies, holding them tightly in her grip.

"I see I have tiny intruders set on killing me..." says Rosalina, obviously not happy. "I'm afraid I'll have to punish you all."

What kind of punishment does Rosalina have in mind?
12533212211212.title: An Unpleasant Awakening

choices: No, but the hunters are not swallowed

Deciding that the tiny hunters need to learn a lesson, Rosalina quickly stuffs them in her mouth, closing her teeth and lips tight to seal them in hot, sticky darkness. Does this plan work?

choices: Decides to season up the hunters

"You tiny things don't taste very good," says Rosalina, who then..,
1253321221121211.title: Out of Rosalina's Mouth

choices: The hunters try to make Rosalina throw up
1253321221121212.content:
Despite their best efforts, the hunters are flicked by Rosalina's slimy tongue into the darkness of her throat, easily gulped down into the space princess's stomach. The walls are pulsating, and a nearby greenish lake bubbles with acid.

On the outside, Rosalina pats her belly and returns to gazing at the stars, happy that her little problems are taken care of.

What now?
1253321221121212.title: Swallowed by Rosalina

choices: "I'm going to swallow all of you."
"I think I'll crush you tiny things!"
1253321221122.content:
Before they can send their target to sleep, the Nanocorps are snatched up by Rosalina's massive hand! The giantess must have known that they were nearby.

"I assume you were sent here to kill me?" predicts Rosalina.

"Dang..." mutters Petire. "Our cover's blown!"

"Well, there's only one thing for this..."
1253321221122.title: Caught by Rosalina

choices: Yes, they escape by paralyzing Rosalina
12533212211221.content:
"I'm going to swallow all of you." states Rosalina.

"W-wait, what?!" protests Petire.

"It's the most beneficial way to deal with attackers...I digest your bodies and gain your nutrients! Two birds with one stone, really. Anyway...in you go!"

The giantess begins to bring the hunters closer to her open mouth. Are they equipped to avoid this?
12533212211221.title: Rosalina's Little Snacks

choices: Try to upset the stomach by pounding the walls
125332122112212.content:
Lacking the tools to evade Rosalina's open mouth, the Nanocorps are helplessly popped inside and fall into the chasm of her throat, swallowed whole with one easy gulp. Rubbing her belly, Rosalina returns to gazing at the stars, satisfied with her little snacks.

With a splash, the hunters land in a slimy, warm chamber better known as Rosalina's stomach. How will they get out of this one?

125332222221.title: Ahri?

choices: "Viz, Atomic, Beta and Slick. Go get her,"
1253322222211.content:
The hunters arrive at their destination as they emerge from the bright portal and landed on a nearby stump which to them is a massive landscape of wood. The hunters scanned their new location to see what's new...It seems to be a very peaceful place. They notice buildings on mountains with waterfall gushing out beautifully, ancient like trees blooming with pink flowers and most noticeably of them all is several large glowing crystals that stand-or rather float on top of buildings.

"Wow! Talk about paradise!" Danny pulls out his sunglasses. "I can get used to this!"

"We're not here on vacation. Though it does look nice, I'll admit." said Petire. "What era are we in?

"I am still collecting data on our newly location, Master Petire." said Beta. "But we are on an island called Ionia. It is off the east coast of Valoran and northeast of Noxus. Our target is likely lives here."

A beeping noise startled the hunters before taken notice of the device they use. The device begins projecting a hologram of their 'boss', Dr.Van Micro.

"Mwhahaha! You made it, excellent!" The scientist laughs with glee. "I take it you enjoy this lovely sight of Ionia, yes?"

"It's actually pretty nice...But of course, we can't relax. Who's the target?" Quentin asked the doctor.

"Well, I'll be blunt: Your target is gonna be tough for you...Ever heard of a Fox Spirit or rather The Nine-Tailed Fox?"

"Oh yeah, those mystical creatures in those Chinese folklore and stuff..Wait a minute...Are trying to say we're going up against a Nine-Tailed Fox...Woman?" Petire asked him.

"Correct! Her name is Ahri, the nine tailed fox woman who lives here in Ionia. She lure unsuspecting men by her charm and uhh...Beautiful body and I mean-" The scientist does a wolf whistle while using his hands to form a curvy body of a woman.

"Hot damn!" Danny yells with excitement before being slap on the head by Petire.

"Ahh but I wouldn't be too excited when you get near her if I were you. She consume their life essences when they were under the spell of her seductive charms. killing those poor slobs...Luckily, you bounty hunters may withstand her charms since you're way too small for her to detect you and you got the robot and the monster. Also watch for her orb and those flames, that also can pack a nasty punch...Well, good luck hunters! You'll be needing it..." Micro laughs before signing off.

"Alright, Danny. You heard the doc, she'll kill you with her charm, so no eye candying on her."

"Aww..Can I at least take a picture of her?"

"No, Danny..." Quentin sighs before the robot tells the hunters their target is near...

"Target detected. She is straight ahead." said Beta.

The hunters turns to the location where Beta said, spotting a feminine figure not too far from the stump they are on and what the doctor said is true: She IS beautiful! This beautiful, curvy fox woman appears to be wearing a quite revealing kimono with traditional accessories and black and white shoes and of course, the nine fox tails behind her...Danny couldn't help but eyeing on her yellow eyes and her body...Almost like he was under a spell...

"Wake up, Danny!" Petire slaps him on the head.

"Ow!...What the hell, Petire!? I can't help it if she's beautiful..."

"Hmm, this is not good...Danny really gonna get himself killed. Of course, some of you are also gonna fall prey to her charm...Any suggestions?" Quentin asked the group.

"I do have two: I'll snipe her with a special bullet that knock anyone unconscious without killing her and then we'll decided what to next. Or we could send Viz, Atomic, Beta and Slick to knock her out since they doesn't seem to be affecting her charm..." Zeke said.

"Those two plans sounds good. Whatcha gonna choose, Q-man?" Petire asked the leader.

Quentin thought for a minute until he figure what to choose...
1253322222211.title: Targeting the Nine Tailed Woman

choices: The bullet hits Ahri's neck, knocking her out
12533222222111.content:
"Zeke, we'll leave your sharp eyes to you." Quentin said to Zeke.

"You got it, kid" Zeke gets out his favorite sniper rifle, Ol' Bestie, and get into position. Zeke calculate the distance between himself and Ahri who is still standing and hasn't move yet, checking any wind blowing from each directions: it is a faint breeze but shouldn't interfere him. With that settle, Zeke place a special bullet that knocks out any target unconscious without killing them inside the rifle and takes aim at Ahri's neck.

"...Ten bucks said Zeke will miss..." said Slick

"Your're on!" said Danny

"Really, ya bozos? Zeke is one of most sharp-eye shooters in the group, so no way he'll miss...But I'll take twenty on that bet." Petire said while laughing.

Quentin rolls his eyes and looks at Zeke. "Ready?"

"Hmm...I believe it's ready, let's hope my aiming haven't effect by our shrunken state..." Zeke said while his hand is about to pull the trigger...But he was unsure about Ahri...It almost like she knew they were here...He shrugs off the thought and pulls the trigger, firing the bullet.

1253322222222221222.title: Commander Shepard

125332222222222122221.content:
Emerging from the bright light of the portal, the hunters landed safely on a leather like surface with no problems during their travel. Before they could do anything, the device starts beeping and projects a hologram of Dr. Micro, laughing at his successful work.

"Mwhahahaha! You made it, excellent!" The doctor laughs with joy. "Before we begin...Do you what year you are on now?"

"...Beta?" Quentin asked the robot as he was collect data from their new location.

"2185 CE" Beta answers.

"Correct. This is when those weird nasty creatures attack on those poor humans, collecting them in fact. Those aliens are named, ironically, the Collectors...Although you don't need to worry about them, they shouldn't attack this frigate you are on."

"Frigate...? Are we on a spaceship?" Petire asked.

"Yes, Master Petire. We are on a frigate called SSV Normand, piloted by Jeff Moreau or rather known as 'Joker'."

"...I better hope our target is in the Normand cause if not.." Sharper said while glaring at Micro.

"Mwhahaha! Fear not, she is on board the ship and you are in her room. Her name's Kasumi Goto, the master thief of the galaxy. Able to steal the expensive stuff without getting caught. But I wonder if she'll escape from the NanoCorps, the best bounty hunters in the world?"

"...Boasting us won't get us to like you, doc." said Viz

"Haha...Well, I tried. Good luck hunter! Oh yes, be careful. She can cloak herself when in danger...Mwhahahaha!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"So...We're getting a thief. And not just any thief: A master thief...Hope she's cute." said Danny.

"It would be a good chance to ask her now because our target is coming this way." Beta said while showing the hunters where their target is.

The massive door begins to pull apart revealing their target who appears to be wearing a black and white tight jump suit with a hood that can't her entire face too well but they did got a good view of her lips with a purple like tattoo and her brown eyes. Danny, on the other hand, was eyeing on her slender yet curvy body, especially her behind when walking into her room...Although his fantasy was interrupted by Petire slapping him on the head.

"Ow! What the hell, Petire!?" Danny shouted at him.

"Your drooling on that woman, dumbass..."

"I can't help it...I mean, dat-"

"Danny, if you say 'Dat ass' again, I'll asked Atomic to kick your ass across this room!"

"Enough you two..." Quentin sighs before noticing Kasumi is walking towards their way with a slightly sad look on her face as she made her way to the couch with the heores are located on the shoulder of the couch, she sat down with her knees pulled up to her chest. She then activated the holographic goggles that allowed her to view a strange box and sat contently viewing. The hunters now may have a good chance to climb her body, to Danny's delight that is...But of course, they can use Slick's teleport to be on the master thief's body...
125332222222222122221.title: Targeting the Master Thief

choices: Kasumi felt something on her butt and investigate it
1253322222222221222211.content:
"Get your climbing gear, guys. We're going hiking." Quentin announce the hunters...Much to Danny's excitement.

"Does that mean...!?"

"Yep, we are climbing Kasumi."

"Hot Damn!"

"Oh hell...Why can't we just teleport our way there?" Petire asked. Quentin sighs and pointed at Slick...sleeping on Atomic's shoulder. "Oh...Rotten slacker."

"Quit your bellyaching. We got a job to do." Viz said while jumping off the couch's arm while the other hunters follow pursuit.

The hunters made their way over on the soft and quite bouncy surface of the couch toward the imposing form of Kasumi's huddled body. Their first stop is her feet which get anice view of her elegant legs rising into the air. Without any thought, Danny jumps on top of her slick cover foot and runs towards her leg, climbing it with his thoughts being filled with dirty images...But it was interrupted when Danny can't get a good grip of the fabric, causing him to slid down her leg and landed on her foot with a thud.

"Dumbass..." Petire said under his breathe.

"Hmm...Climbing her leg is a good choice, I wonder what's our other option?" Quentin scans Kasumi's body.

"...Follow me, kids." Zeke spoke up while walking beside Kasumi's leg.

"Where are you going?"

"You'll see...It might uhh...Please Danny."

The hunters decided to follow Zeke with Danny jumping off her foot and following them. After a=their little short walk, Danny's favorite assest, her curvy rear came into view and once again, Danny runs towards her rear and instantly grabs a hold of fabric, smothering his face on it.

"Zeke! You are the best man! Ooohh...This is sooo soft and squishy...I'm in heaven!!" Danny yells, continuing his prevy ways.

"...Zeke, are you a pervert?" Ralph asked him.

"Heh...No, I think it'll be best if we climb her backside instead...In a faster rate." Zeke said while staring at Danny.

"Ehh...Not my favorite choice of climbing, but it'll have to do. Grab a hold of her butt-good grief- I mean...Grab her suit and climb. Quickly." With the orders from the leader, the hunters starts climbing. It seems the fabric of her suit is quite easy to scale. With few minutes has passed, they are able to reach a makeshift like canyon formed by her raised leg and vertical body. They could see her waist just up ahead...
1253322222222221222211.title: Climbing Mt.Kasumi

12533222222222212222112.content:
"What the..." utters Kasumi as she suddenly feels an itch on her rear end and moves a hand to scratch it. But before she can actually do the job fully, the giantess feels something ELSE unusual on her behind...something...moving? She grabs a hold of whatever those moving things are, disrupting their climb and ceasing the irritation on her bottom, before raising the hunters to eye level and opening her fist to take a closer look.

"At least I can BREATHE," sighs Petire.

"Don't celebrate just yet," whispers Quentin, "we have a mission, remember?"

How does Kasumi react to the sight of the tiny hunters?
12533222222222212222112.title: Noticed by Kasumi

choices: Decided to have 'fun' with the hunters
125332222222222122221121.content:
Kasumi couldn't believe her own eyes...On the palm of her hand are ten human like figures, moving on their own and of course, very small. Normally, the Collectors abducting human colonies is interesting enough and also a frightening thought, but seeing these tiny like beings has peek her interest...She could show this to Shepard or maybe Mordin for more information on them, but for now she decided to...talk to them.

"Hello there." Kasumi said in a hush tone, but it was still quite loud to the hunters. Not to mention her breath creates such a gust that nearly blew Sharper away. Luckily Atomic grabs him by the leg by his tentacle. "Whoops! Sorry..." Kasumi said in a very soft voice.

"Sorry my ass..." Sharper grumbles while getting back down safely on the surface.

"Easy, Sharp...It's quite alright, Miss Kasumi. We are small after all." Petire speaks to her.

"How did you know my name?"

"Uhh...Your well informed? I mean...You are the best thief in the whole damn galaxy, right?"

"Heh, that's true...Still, why are you all on my body? Especially my butt." Kasumi asked them with a curious look."I even felt a pinch there, you guys aren't a bunch of sleazy perverts, hmm?"

The hunters look at Danny for his little pervy actions...Danny simply shock his head and tries to explains it. "W-Well, Kasumi..I'll be honest, you do have such of lovely body, I mean the way you walk in...I almost swoon for you." Danny flirts with the thief, interesting enough, she cracks a smile on his comment while the Three Recon Stooges make gagging noises.

"Boy, does that make me wanna hurl..." said Ralph.

"Shut up! You three ruining the tender moment!"

"Knock it off, you guys..." Quentin steps forward while clearing his throat. "Forgive my fellow friend...He has a problem being around with beautiful women."

"It's no problem, though I'm not interested on dating. Sorry, little guy." The words from Kasumi cause Danny to lower his in shame.

"Ehehehe...That's 199! One more and you'll get a record of being rejected by women!" Petire and the other two laughs while Danny curses the three.

"Ugh...Anyway, We are the NanoCorp from a different world....We uhh, seem to landed in your room by mistake and we try to contact you for help, but of course, we're too small to be heard. So we had to climb your body to get your attention." Quentin said even though he didn't say they were bounty hunters...

"Interesting...I never heard of NanoCorp before." Kasumi hasn't heard of this NanoCorp group...Are they tiny races or something? Perhaps asking more about them doesn't hurt. Kasumi decided to walk over by her desk to get friendly with tiny beings, during her little and possibly unknown to her, she lower her hand to her chest level, giving the hunters a good view of imitating breasts which Danny tries to jump for those bounciness of heaven, but Viz grabs him and pins him on the surface. before arriving at her desk. Kasumi gently placing the hunters on the desk before sitting down, staring at them with a curious look...

125332222222222212221.content:
"Mwahahaha!" the hunters hear a voice from nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I am Dr. Van Micro. Your many adventures have caught my attention, and I need you to find and assassinate Tattletell, a Yo-kai from the video game Yo-Kai Watch. Tattletell looks like a diminutive granny and will Inspirit humans into disclosing their secrets. Oh, and you'll need to be shrunk to ensure a successful mission."

"Wait," Petire objects, "we never agreed to -- "

Then a bright flash engulfs the hunters, and all goes blank.
125332222222222212221.title: Targeting the Secret-Spreading Yo-kai

choices: Tattletell Inspirits one of the hunters...
1253322222222222122211.content:
The hunters awaken in what appears to be a peaceful residential area, with plenty of playing kids -- Uptown Springdale. Except, everything looks unusually big...

Or...are the Nanocorps just...small?

Just then, a shady figure -- possibly a businessman -- walks past the tinies, who thankfully avoid being stomped as he evades a fifth-grade boy and his ghostly-looking butler.

"Stop right there!" the boy yells. "What's the deal with Springdale's seals weakening?!"

"You'll never get me to talk," the shady man refuses.

"I guess we need help from a Yo-kai!" the ghost butler declares. "You know what to do, Nate!"

"Alright then, Whisper!" Nate responds. "Come on out, my friend! Yo-kai medal, do your thing!"

Nate inserts a medal into a funky white watch on his wrist, and from out of the blue, an epicly weird chant is heard:

"Summoning mysterious..."

From a strange sigil appears a small (well, by Yo-kai standards), granny-like entity with short white hair. The Nanocorps' target.

"Tattletell!"

"OK, Tattletell," Nate instructs, "let's see what this guy has to say!"

"Tell! TELL!" Tattletell replies, with the only word she seems able to use. Then she latches onto the weird man's face, Inspiriting him.

"Once the seals are fully broken," the man says involuntarily, "this world will be OURS!"

As soon as Tattletell releases her grip, the shady man vanishes in purple smoke, revealing his true, blue, tengu-like form -- Tengloom!

"Gah!" Tengloom reacts. "When will you humans learn?!"

At that moment, Tengloom prepares himself for a battle with six of Nate's Yo-kai friends, while Tattletell gets distracted by tiny creatures on the street nearby...

"Tell?"

Crud! She's onto the hunters! Now what?
1253322222222222122211.title: You can't kill a Yo-kai! ...can you?

choices: Beta drains some spirit power from Tattletell
12533222222222221222112.content:
Before the Nanocorps can even draw their weapons against Tattletell, the elderly Yo-kai latches onto Danny, rendering the poor guy Inspirited.

"Oh no..!" Danny yelps before Tattletell's power takes over. "Boss, I...I used your toothbrush to unclog my toilet!!"

Quentin, disgusted, runs to the nearest manhole and...uhh...loses his lunch. The hunters' quarry then releases her grip on Danny and clamps onto the leader himself!

"Crap..! I forgot to pay the electric bill for our headquarters!"

Tattletell's next victim turns out to be Slick.

"Uh oh..! I like to sleep a lot!!"

"That's a no-brainer, you dolt!" Petire remarks, leaving Tattletell in shock. She promptly tries to squeeze some juicier secrets out of the sloth for the next few minutes...with no success.

Exhausted, the Yo-kai collapses onto the ground.

"Whew...sorry about that, boss..." Danny confesses.

"Eh, don't worry about it," Quentin replies, "but now's our chance!"

Next...

1253322222222222211.content:
Just before the NanoCorps arrive at a new location, a mysterious woman what appears to be flying or fluttering across the dead rotten tress with snow covering the ground, along with corpses that fallen in battlefield with their rusty weapons near by. The woman landed on the snowy field to rest for a bit after defeating her opponent in a fierce battle and was quite satisfy along with her insects flying around her while some of them healing her wounds. As the incest like woman was about to finish up her resting, a small but bright light appears out of nowhere in the middle of the snow field. Thinking it might be another one of the rebellions, the incest woman hid behind the rotten tree and peaks a bit to see who it is...

Upon her surprise, a very small group of people emerges from the light, landing on the snow...The woman blinks a few times, thinking it's an illusions, but they do move and talk, so it has to be real...She don't recognize all ten of the tiny people, especially the large silver one, in fact...they really don't belong from the Outworld or Earthrealm. She then notice they are talking to a hologram of a man who appears to be a scientist and decided to listen to their conversation

"Mwhahaha! Nice to see you hunters in one piece...Because you're gonna have a good time today!" the doctor laughs.

"What do you mean by 'good time'?" Quentin asked, knowing this doesn't sound good to them.

"Your target is really weird...I mean, yucky weird. Her name is D'Vorah, a female Kytinn who resides here in Outworld."

"Kytinn? What is that and also, what do you mean she's weird?" Danny asked the doctor.

"They are a colonel of insect humanoids from the island realm of Arnyek which is conquer by the Outworld. Only genders of Kytinn is female, they may be some males but it is unknown. The Kytinn, if planted inside a human host, can emerging with wings in a humanoid form from them as if they were a cocoon. Also, if the human host is stronger, the planted Kytinn will also grow stronger. Just think if the Kytinn plants a larvae in Atomic's body..." Beta explains.

"...Then we will be dealing a very dangerous Kytinn...For once, I'm actually glad we are too small to be a host." Danny chuckles.

"Gihahaha! They'll have to try get into my body...which they can't." Atomic laughs while pounding his board wide chest.

"Tch...I hate bugs." Viz grumbles.

"Don't worry Viz, we brought a can of bug spray to kill her with ease" Petire laughs along with Sharper and Ralph. "Or rather we use a fly swatter and smack her death!"

"Nah, how about them bug zapper? Love seeing those stinging bastard fried up." Alanna grins.

Unaware to the hunters, D'Vorah had been listening to their conversation and was quite angry at one of the hunter's rude comment. "This one will enjoy killing the small creatures.." She hisses while waiting for them to finish up with their conversation.

"Mwhahahaha! Good one...But joke aside, beware of her swarm of insects, able to fly, and has highly toxin blood. Avoid that and you should be able to finish her off in no time. Good luck hunters!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

As the hunters begins the search of their target, D'Vorah slowly comes out of her hiding spot with four poisonous pincers emerging from her back and calls out the tiny hunters. "This one been waiting for you to end those foolish human conversation."

The hunter immediately turns to face D'Vorah and get a good look of the female Kytinn...and the doctor was right, she is one weird bug woman. Her skin takes the appearance of a yellow chitinous hide and the heels of her feet are what looks like high heel wedges. Her eyes are compound like a fly's eyes, her teeth are sharp and pointed which could make her a carnivore. She wears a black top and hood, spiked gauntlets on her arms armored ringlets on her forearms, and armored shin guards, and a jewelry that rests around her neck.

"Holy shit...I think I need a bigger bug spray for this bugger." Petire continues to joke around D'Vorah.

"Uhh...I don't think she taken the bug jokes very lightly.." said Ralph.

"Damn...She's ugly!"

"Sis!" Glenys playfully smacks Alanna on the head.

The hunter noticed the insect woman is walking towards them with an angry look on her face, the hunters kept their distance while she walks. Soon she was upon them and attempts to crush them under foot, but the hunters moves away before her foot slam against the snow. The hunters regroup behind the anger Kytinn while she turns to spot the tiny hunters.

"This one was hoping for using the silver creature as a host for fellow Kytinn, but it seems impossible due to your small appearance...But this one has other plans." D'Vorah hisses before licking her black lips with hungry.

"...She's gonna eat us, isn't she?" said Petire.

"It appears so." said Beta.

"This one won't eat all tiny morsels at once, oh no...This one will eat tiny morsels one by one, just to see you suffer. Starting with the cute one with yellow hair." D'Vorah said while eyeing on Quentin.

"Ehehe..She call you cute, Q-man" Petire laughs.

"Ugh...Anyway, get ready NanoCorps! Don't let her eat anyone of us and watch out for her insects!" With the orders are giving, the hunters gets their weapons out, ready to battle the hungry Kytinn...
1253322222222222211.title: Targeting the Female Kytinn a.k.a Insect Woman

12533222222222222111.content:
Slick uses his telekinesis to grant the hunters to fly...as long he doesn't fall asleep. Quentin orders his fellow hunters to follow him as he flies upward towards D'Vorah's body as the rest of the hunters follow suit. D'Vorah, seeing the hunters flying, use one of her pincers to stab the tiny hunters, but they was able to dodge the large pincer and counterattacks as Atomic moves closer to her left leg and delivers a powerful punch on the thigh, causing her to flinch in pain.

"Argh...How can you posses this power? This one cannot understand..." D'Vorah hisses. "Powerful or not...You will be part of this one's body."

"Still hungry for us huh, bug girl?" Petire taunts the giant insect woman. "Have a taste of bug spray instead! It'll give you a nice lemony scent for your breath...As well as insecticide which gives a painful death, yes?"

D'Vorah got really tired of hearing the tiny hunter's rude words and tries to grab them with her hands, but once again, the hunters dodge her attack. Quentin decided to do something daring and flies straight towards D'Vorah's face with Viz following pursuit. The woman spotted the two hunters and decides to deal with them instead.

"You two will make a nice appetizer for this one. My insects will take care of your friends for the time being" D'Vorah releases a swarm of wasps from her hands into the air, charging after the other hunters. These wasps are about the same size as the miniature hunters except for Atomic who is bigger then the others. Normally Petire uses the bug spray to kill the annoying bugs but this time he has to use his fist and guns. Quentin and Viz looks on as the other hunters battle against the swarm of wasps while they deal with the giant Kytinn who eyeing on them with her black compound eyes,

" I really hate bugs...Guess I'll start by killing you, bug freak." said Viz.

This one will enjoy your tastiness." Licking her lips, she opens her mouth wide enough to see a great view of her row of teeth, dripping saliva from the top and a dangling uvula in the back.

"Oh hell, being eaten by this freak is annoying enough, but it still won't top on the doctor's shitty mission." Viz said while trying to escape her clutches.

"I wouldn't give up just yet...I got an idea." Quentin said with a smirk on his face.

D'Vorah smiles slightly at the miniature hunters with her extended her arms out. "Before enjoying the taste of you little creatures, this one will watch my insects playing with you...until it's dinner time." D'Vorah releases a swarm of wasps from her hands and goes straight towards the hunters.

"Oh shit! Wasps!" Sharper yells.

"Aww hell! I hate wasps!" Alanna shouted

"Ooh I really need that big bug spray can..." Petire said while fighting off the wasps. The hunters fight off most of the wasps but more swarm of raging insects appears from D'Vorah, continuously tries to sting or bite the hunters. Zeke summons his favorite gun, Ol' Bestie, to snipe off the flying insects one by one. As the hunters continues to fight off the wasps, D'Vorah notices one of the hunters is away from the group and makes her move. Atomic punches the wasps from left to right with a few of them clinging on him, stinging the silver monster but unfortunately, his skin is way to tough for their stingers and gets punish by Atomic's fist. Atomic boasted on his superior strength and skin when a large shadow cast upon him. The monster notice it and tries to move away, but D'Vorah was too quick for him and grabs him, licking her lips.

"There's no escape, my tasty victim. This one will enjoy eating you" D'Vorah lifts him to her face.with her mouth wide, tossing Atomic inside her mouth, closing her mouth from behind.

"Holy shit...She got Atomic!...Should we be worry about him? I mean he's...ya know?" Danny asked.

"Heh, I think he should be fine...Out of all the 'tasty morsels' she choose, she pick the very worst one." Quentin said with a smile on his face.

While D'Vorah begins tasting and chewing her first meal, she notices this one doesn't taste good at all and when she tries to chomps him, instead of fleshy organs, she gets a very tough metal...Just what is he made of?

"This one's confuse...Why does this tiny creature taste like metal, not flesh? This one's-Urk!" D'Vorah felt a powerful sting inside her mouth, causing the Kytinn to scream in pain.

"And there it is...Rule #1: Never eat Atomic Vile." Danny and the Three Recon Stooges laughs out loud. "Hey look, those wasps are gone!"

"Time for a counterattack! Let's move boys!" Quentin and the hunters run towards D'Vorah's heeled foot while she is preoccupied with Atomic's painful resistance.

12533222222222222211.content:
The NanoCorps emerges from the portal, landed on a hard smooth floor that has a strange 'U' symbol. They notice the room is pitch black with a few hologram that brighten the room a bit and the walls has small light linings as well as the floor. Upon them is a table, which huge to them, with a hologram of what it appears to be a city...It must be some kind of office or lair run by a possibly an evil person, some of the hunters thought. As they continue to marvel their new location, the device starts beeping, projecting a hologram of Dr. Micro,laughing at his successful work.

"Mwhahaha! Glad to see you boys alive and your bodies are straight."

"Yeah yeah...Anyway, what's up with this place?...It's almost futuristic." said Petire. "Are we targeting an evil woman?"

"Err...A bit of yes and no. Yes, you are getting an evil lady, sort of on the humanity and no...she's not a human, but rather...an AI."

"AI? Like Beta?" Sharper asked.

"Yes, just like your robot friend. She runs a mega-corporation called Ultratech and they run an interesting event called Killer Instinct: A sensational, no-holds-barred, fighting tournament that some people join the fight, along with Ultratech's creations...just to see their strength being tested....Huh..and here I thought I was an evil one." The doctor laughs sheepishly.

"Heh...You pick us a good target.." Viz smirk.

"Gihahaha! Yeah, this AI better be worth my time." Atomic grins, showing his sharp teeth.

"Oh ho, I wouldn't be so cocky if I were you. Sure you got the big guy and the robot with you, but let me tell ya hunters...This AI is no push over and won't be so ever gentle. In fact, she wants the humans in this world to-"

"Evolve or Die." A sudden loud feminine robotic voice appears out of nowhere, echoing the room. The hunters, including Micro, looks around with their weapons ready.

"Wh-Who's there!?" Petire questions to the voice "Show yourself, ya coward!"

The ground beneath their feet begins to shake and increasing with every booming sound...Beta warns his fellow hunters that their target is right behind them and quickly turns to face a very, very large feminine figure walking towards the hunters. It has golden body with light grey shades of metal, with small gaps of cyan light venting out, clawed hands and heeled feet, thin waist and wide hips and shoulders, dreadlock-like strips of metal from the head acting like a hair, and three drones flying around near the target.

"Th-That's...Err, gotta go! Good luck killing her, mwhahaha!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"Ugh...That damn doctor." Viz grumbles.

"Now's not the time for Dr.Micro's cowardliness...So, I believe you heard everything the doc said?" Zeke asked the towering AI.

"All of it. Although, your doctor friend haven't told you all my name..." The AI place her hand on her hips, moving her heeled foot right in front of the hunter. They quickly took a step back from the massive foot of the AI, just to imitating them. "I am ARIA, current leader of Ultratech."

"Advanced Robotics Intelligence Architecture..." Beta spoke up.

"Ahh, an AI...A silver bio life-form...Six advanced humans...Two unknown beings...Interesting...You have posses incredible amount of powers and yet, you are all small...How is that possible?" ARIA said while scanning the tiny hunters for more info. "...I must admit, your presence has interest me. It would please me to have you all in Ultratech to give humanity a chance to see the future. However, some refuse to evolve which I cannot allow that...That is why I push them, testing them...Of course, like your friend just said: I am not gentle.."

"...Sounds harsh if you ask me." Quentin said stepping forward, showing that he's not that imitating. "Forcing the humans to evolve...Yeah, that does sound evil to the humans."

"And if your asking us to join Ultratech,forget it. We're here to kill you." Viz bluntly said while getting ready to attack.

ARIA stares at the hunters for a minute, it seems they are not interested of joining Ultrtech...They rather kill ARIA herself. It shouldn't be too hard for her to wipe the assassins by simply crushing them underfoot like little insects they are, but they are no ordinary beings, especially a fellow AI and the life-form.

"It seems we reach our conclusion...If your still interest of killing me..." ARIA orders one of the droids to form her, creating a large sword underside of her arm and points it towards the hunters. "Then I have no choice but to eliminate you NanoCorps."

"Get you're asses ready! This is gonna get nasty!" said Danny.

"Wow Danny...This is the first time you are not interested of a woman, I mean, did ya see the way she walk towards us? Swaying them hips." Petire said with a chuckle.

"True. But she don't have big boobs, plus she's an AI. I can't do AIs...How can have sex with a robotic body?"

"Fair enough."

"Actually, Master Danny. There is a way to have sex with AIs. When a male human and a female AI falls in love, they start the sexual contact by-"

"Knock it off!" Quentin yells at the hunters before they facing ARIA which could be a big battle for them...
12533222222222222211.title: Targeting the Ultratech's AI

125332222222222222111.content:
The hunters ready themselves for a battle that will not be easy, they are going up against the leader of Ultratech and by the look of it, she is quite powerful and not to mention she huge compare to them...If they are in regular size, they could kick her metal ass in minutes, but since they are shrunken, it may take a while to defeat ARIA. ARIA, to their surprise, made her first move by thrusting her blade straight towards them. The hunters quickly moves out of harm's way before the blade hits the ground creating a large shockwave that sends few hunters flying in the air, but they made a quick recovery and landed safely.

ARIA looks over at Viz as he attack her leg with his guns, she responded by lowering her other hand attempting to crush the pesky hunter. "I don't think so, little one,"

Viz watches ARIA's hand getting closer to him. "She took the bait...Now Atomic!"

Atomic sprouts a tentacle from his shoulder and grabs Viz, moving him away before her hand landed, missing the hunter. He then throws Viz on top of her hand and continues his assault. ARIA notice him and lifts her hand up to her face.

"I see you evolve well, Viz Archer...Why do you and your evolved friends refuse to join me? It is not too late to reconsider my offer." The AI tries to recruit Viz.

"Heh...Still recruiting us? I thought I said we refuse, robot and that's final." Viz said with a smirk on his face.

"I see. Then watch as I destroy your friends." ARIA calls over a different drone, merging into her chest.and removing her blade.

"Not if I stop you!" Viz tries to jump towards her face to attack but the AI saw this coming and swiftly grabs him with her other hand, encasing him in darkness.

"Stay put, Viz Archer, while I deal with your friends."

"Looks like Viz got caught!" said Petire

"We better get him out of there...Right after we deal with miss ARIA who planning on killing us before him.Got any plans Zeke?" Quentin asked the wise hunter.

"Just one kid: Move"

The hunters notice a large shadow covering their position, looking up they saw ARIA's heeled foot is above them, ready to crush them under foot. The hunters moves away before a deafening stomp as her foot stomp the ground..

"Everyone alight!?" Quentin gets up, coughing.

"...I think were good...Wait, where's Danny!?" Petire notice Danny was not with them until he heard his voice..right under the arch of her foot,

"Whew...Never thought I ended up here..." Danny sighs in relief before moving away her foot. Regrouping, the hunters resuming their battle against the giant AI.
