choices: Try to talk to her once more!
125332222222222222121.content:
Emerging from the bright portal, the hunters landed on a soft, muddy ground and looks around on their new area. For some strange reason...the hunters felt a eerie chill down in their spines except for Beta, Zeke and Atomic. Their new location appears to be a small Japanese village filled with gravestones surrounded by trees, one particular gravestone appears to be a shrine, surrounded with candles and a doll...Something about this strange and eerie place gives some hunters, mostly the Three Recon Stooges, the creeps.

"Uhh...Where are we...?" Sharper said, shaken in fear.

"It appears we have arrive in a small, deserted Japanese village here in Japan." Beta informs them.

"It's more like a graveyard to me...You sure this where the target is?" Danny asked.

"Well, the device did send us here...in one piece." said Quentin.

The device suddenly starts beeping, nearly scarrying the Three Recon Stooges to death, and projects a hologram of Dr. Micro who appears to be laughing, as usual.

"Mwhahahaha! Welcome to the Village of Whispers..." Dr. Micro laughs.

"V-Village of Whispers...?"

"Yes. Here is where your target lives for such a long time...about 450 years ago. But before you asked, let me tell you hunters a short story of her. Over 450 years ago, a rebel of soilders invade this, killing her father. She got sooooo angry that she wiled her father's blade and struck down many soldiers in her path. But sadly, she too was killed. The shrine over there is her resting place where she was honor for her courageous action and bravery."

"Interesting story but what's this suppose to do with our target?" Danny asked.

"Here's the fun part: In our present time, a certain organization name Ultratech had disturb her grave, awaken her spirit and seeks revenge on those who disturbs her resting place...And that's where you hunters come in."

"Whoa whoa whoa! Are you saying...We're targeting a ghost!?" Petire yells in anger

"That's right! Her name is Hisako, the wandering spirit who hunts down the living for disturbing her...and of course, devouring souls....I bid you hunters a good day...That is if you survive....Mwhahahaha!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"Oh hell no! I did not sign up for chasing a soul eating ghost!"

"Well...Who you gonna call then?" Slick said with a smirk on his face.

"Slick, I am not in a mood for that crappy joke..."

While Petire ranting on, Quentin was looking at Hisako's shrine...Seeing that she was hail as a hero for her sacrifice, he felt pretty bad for her grave to be disturb and now her spirit roams free to get revenge on the living..Suddenly, he spot something moving in the left and notice a long haired feminine figure walking very slowly, dragging her foot and appears to be carrying a nagitana. the figure seems to wear a tattered rose pink kimono with white flower decals and a red obi sash around her waist and the bottom of it is rip off. He see a faint aura of darkness around her what appears to be ashes and ember....

"Guys...Look." Quentin calmly said to the hunters. The others look to where he is looking...The Three Recon Stooges nearly scream their heads off before covering their mouths.

"Oh shit...Is that Hisako?" Danny whispers to Quentin.

"No doubt about it..."

The hunters continue watching Hisako as she walks slowly across the wet and muddy ground until she stops at her track, standing very still. They notice she appears to be...jitters like static, distorting the space around her with a eerie green glow...

"...I think its a good time to attack her." said Viz.

"Physical attacks may not work her unless Slick give us a boost of his powers, we might have a good chance to hit her." said Zeke. "That is...If he's still awake."

"Don't worry, I'm wide awake..." said Slick.

"Well with that settle, we can defeat the ghost and get the hell out of here and..." Petire notices the ghost girl slowly turns her head to their location...Seeing her pale white skin and dark and sunken eyes. "Holy shit..."

"Is she....Looking at us...?" Ralph asks.

The hunters watches the ghost girl for a minute until she starts walking towards them...She starts to jitters again, making her disappear and reappear in a different place. The hunters gets their weapons out while watching her, they nearly started when Hisako starts crawling very fast towards them and then disappear again...

"Th-This is nuts! Were in like a freaky horror movie!" Petire shouted in fear.

"Calm down, Petire. That just what she wanted! Stay calm and don't let her get you-" Before Danny can finish, his eyes widen in fear and take a step back.

"D-Danny,,,?"

"Petire...Guys...Do not freak out..."

The Three Recons slowly turns around and gets a huge sky full of Hisako's eyes and this time...they did scream their heads off and run behind Atomic, shaken in fear. The others back away from the sudden appearance of Hisako and watches her slowly rises to her height, silently staring down at the tiny hunters before speaking to them in Japanese language.

"Wh-What did she just said?"

"Translating...Who are you, tiny creatures? Are you the ones who disturb my slumber? " said Beta.

"No no no no! We did not disturb you, miss Hisako! We...We just arrive here! We did not disrespect the dead!" Petire said, still shaken.

The ghost girl slowly moves her head to the left shoulder, looking at the hunters while talking to them.

"Translating....Lies, you are the soldiers who come to steal us,robbed from our graves..."

"Wait! we are telling you the truth! We didn't disturb you!" Quentin tries to reason Hisako but she simply ignores his words and talks to them in an angry tone, nearly shouting at them.

"Translating....Liars! You will pay...All of you will pay with your lives!" After Beta finish, the angry ghost girl screams in anger, her mouth grows quite large, showing several rows of razor-sharp teeth inside, giving more fright to Petire and the other two.

"I don't think she not listening, Q! We gotta fight her!" Danny said, not willingly to die by the undead girl.

"Argh..." Quentin curses under his breath...
125332222222222222121.title: Targeting the Vengeful Ghost

choices: Hisako saw them and opens her mouth...
1253322222222222221211.content:
The NanoCorps never thought they'll be battling an undead target...or rather a giant angry ghost girl who is bent of vengeance on the living and her first target of the day is the tiny hunters themselves. With another loud high pitch scream, Hisako thrusts her nagitana towards them attempt to skewer the accused trespassers, the hunters quickly moves away before her weapon pierce through the muddy ground, scattering chunks of mud that hits Atomic in the back. Slick sighs with annoyance before giving his fellow hunters a telekinesis weapon inbound.

"There...You can hit her now..."

"Thanks Slick, just don't fall asleep and send us towards her face!" Quentin orders.

With another sigh, Slick lifts the hunters into the air while Beta activates his rocket booster towards the angry ghost girl's face. Seeing the hunters heading towards her, Hisako uses her free hand to grab them but they were too fast for her and felt a small but painful blast across her face thanks to Beta's missile launcher. The ghost girl grunts in anger and uses her nagitana again to swipe them away, the hunters dodges the large weapon again and counterattack with another barrage of missiles in the face again.

"This will be a good opportunity to attack her on the shoulders." said Beta.

"No way! We might wound up inside that freak's mouth! I don't wanna know what's inside her mouth!" Petire protest.

"Do not worry, I shall distract Hisako while three of you go in."

"I'll go." Viz volunteers along with Atomic and surprisingly, Danny.

With that, Beta resume firing at Hisako's face, mostly her eyes while the three hunters moves in, Hisako yells out in pain and annoyance, swinging her weapon barely hitting the three hunters. As the three hunters moves in closer...
1253322222222222221211.title: Calming the Gigantic Ghost Girl: The Hard Way

12533222222222222212112.content:
As another of Beta's shots hits her in...a bad spot, Hisako gasps in pain, unknowingly inhaling Viz, Atomic, and Danny into her dark, slimy mouth. Surprisingly, it's not hot - it's actually a bit chilly!

"Crap." curses Atomic to himself, before...

125332222222222222222212.title: Hunting monsters...

1253322222222222222222121.content:
The hunters emerges from the bright portal, landed on a dark, murky floor. They immediately survey their new location...and it's appear to be deserted: They appear to be in a office with large furniture on the wall which is old and torn, a large desk in front of them also old and wither, dimmed lights flickering in the near dark area ...The hunters aren't sure where they are, but it does gives Sharer the creeps and Zeke felt something wrong about this place...

"G-Guys...Where are we?" The shaken Sharper said.

"I don't know...But something's...Wrong in this area...Something evil..." Zeke said with a calm voice.

"...Yep, this place is haunted. I can feel it." Slick said while yawning. "It's teeming with evil spirits, undead creeps, blah blah blah..."

"...For a slacker who has psychic powers sure is calm and unafraid when in this creepy situation.." Petire rolls his eyes before being spooked by the device as it beeps until a hologram of Dr. Micro appears before them, laughing at them.

"Mwhahaha! Welcome to Alchemilla Hospital! Where ghouls and fools end up here...dead and roaming...Hope you got a good nerve of steel cause you hunters are getting...A bunch of nurses!" The doctor laughs with joy.

"Nurses? Here?" said Danny.

"Not just any nurses, Master Danny. I was able scan one of them not too far from here...It is quite disturbing. The physical description of the nurse appears to be wearing a very skimpy clothing which made out of skin, showing off its legs and quite large breasts, white pointed high heels and out of all of its appearance is it's featureless face...Meaning there's no face, just a deformed head." Beta explains.

"H-Holy shit...Doc...Are we really targeting those...Things?" Sharper asked him.

"Of course! But not without a little tip. The nurses are only attracted to light and loud noises...So just stay quiet and kill the nurses without any lights on. Good luck hunters!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

As the hunters begins their search, they heard a soft grunting noise coming from another door far left from the hunters spot...The door begins opening slowly, the hunters gets their weapons ready as the door opens fully, revealing a nurse that Beta describes. The sight of the faceless nurse made Sharper scream in fear and to make it worst: The nurse reacts to the tiny scream by walking towards in a twitchy like movement.

"Sh-Sharper!" Petire slaps the terrified hunter on the head.

"S-Sorry, but that thing scares the shit out of me!"

"Now's not the time! She's coming for us!" The hunters begins backing away, but the gigantic creature kept coming towards them and almost upon them.

"What's your order, Q-man!? That thing is getting closer and do not want to be step on by that she-thing!" Petire yells.

"I know, I know...I got it!"
1253322222222222222222121.title: Targeting the Nurses from Hell

12533222222222222222221211.content: "We have to stay still..." instructs Quentin, and the team does as they're told, despite the giantess nurse's fearsome appearance. Not another sound comes from their mouths as the nurse continues its twitching walk toward the tiny hunters...
12533222222222222222221211.title: Hold still, this won't hurt...I think.

choices: The bullet hits the nurse's breast, causing it to enrage
125332222222222222222212111.content:
The gigantic nurse's foot stomps right next to the miniature hunters, causing the hunters to jump off the ground, but still stand firm in order not to move...Petire even try to hold Sharper from running away in terror which seems to be working...They watch the nurse twitches some more before she stops moving, standing completely still...

"Huh...She stop moving..." Viz spoke softly.

"Remember the doctor's words, the nurses attractive to loud noises and light...and speaking of light..." Zeke points up at the flickering light above them. "We're gonna have to put it out..."

"Wh-What!?" Sharper nearly yells, but keeping his tone down. "Are we gonna to fight the thing in the dark?"

"We have to, Sharp. It's the only way to bring this thing down...However, there is another way to attack it..." said Quentin. "We need one of us as bait...Equipped with a very bright while the light is out, that way the nurse will only go after the bait and then we will attack her."

"Sounds suicide if capture by that thing...I'm not doing that shit." Ralph said with his arms folded.

"I'll do it. I'll use my cloaking while using a light."

"Alright Viz, we leave this to you. Zeke, do your stuff."

Zeke nodded and brings out his sniper rifle, aiming at the light...With the nurse's large breasts somewhat blocking some path, Zeke may have a 50/50 chance of hitting the light or hitting the nurse and will be detected...Zeke pulls the trigger and fires at the light.
125332222222222222222212111.title: Harmless Nurse...For Now

1253322222222222222222121111.content:
CRACK! Zeke's bullet successfully hits the giant nurse's light, causing her to slowly collapse, apparently losing power.

"Bull's eye," says Zeke to himself.

Before the tiny hunters can even think to celebrate their triumph, the gigantic, faceless nurse suddenly stops collapsing and rises back up! Apparently, shooting her lights out doesn't do the job...

"Of course," mutters Petire.

"Now what?!" panicks Danny.

Quentin, meanwhile, is thinking on the best course of action at this time...

"Mwahahaha!" the hunters hear from apparently nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I, Dr. Van Micro, have heard of your many adventures, and I have a mission for you. You are to locate and assassinate Mithra, the daughter of Asura, from the Asura's Wrath universe. And to ensure total stealth...you'll all have to be shrunk."

...

"Shrunk?" wonders Petire. "How is that even possible for -- "

Before any further questioning can be done, the team is blinded by a bright light, and all goes blank.

12533222222222222222222212.title: Olga

choices: Olga freeze them in their tracks except Quentin and Atomic.
125332222222222222222222121.content:
Before the hunters arrive at the target's location in a different world...Inside a large battleship called the Septentrion Alioth, there sitting on a throne like chair is a beautiful young woman who is quite an eye candy to men, but she is no ordinary human...in fact, she is a demigoddess and high ranking member of The Seven Deities that views regular humans as nothing more than a common beings that are under their control..

Her name is Olga, the only female in the Deities and absolute loyalty to another demigod and leader of the Deities: Deus. She has long white hair and a curvaceous hour-glass figure. She wears an ornate dress of golden armor acting as a chest plate with a revealing midriff, matching gauntlets and a skirt that extends a little portion past her knees, and golden leg guards connected to her high heeled shoes. The Lust Mantra user was given order to hunt down the traitor, Asura once they heard he was once again come back from the dead and resume his vengeance on the Deities.

"Asura... That foolish baboon!" The demigoddess snarls in her thoughts. "He shall not interfere with Lord Deus' plans any further!" Before Olga orders all ships for purification, something caught her attention in the corner of her eye...A very small glint of light appears below the stand and tiny like figures emerges from the portal which surprises the demigoddess...Curious, Olga slowly approaches the spot...could be an intruders who aided Asura or the vile Gohma creatures who somehow enter the ship without detected, either way, she must deal with this quickly before destroying Asura.

The hunters, meanwhile, landed on unfamiliar area and scans the new location....Beta informs the hunters that they are on the ship and the target's nearby. Before they could proceed, a beeping noise appears from the device and a hologram of the mad doctor, laughing before them.

"Mwhahaha! Welcome hunters...To whatever this dimension this is." The doctor said.

"Wait. You don't know where we are...Besides we are on the ship?" Quentin said.

"Unfortunately, I don't have any info on this...But let just say there are a lot of demigods around here and they are extremely powerful! Especially the target you are all after."

"Demigods? We are targeting a fucking demigod!? Oooh we are finish..." Sharper complains.

"Calm down, Sharp. What's the target name?"

"The target's name is Olga: One of the Seven Deities in this world. Originally, it was The Eight Guardian Generals, but one of the generals was betrayed and banish him into the plant, stripping his god like powers."

"Geez...Of course, we have to ignore whoever he is, but what's her powers?" Petire asked.

"Beside being a powerful demigod, Olga possess ice powers and carries a sword...That's it. This may be the toughest one to fight due to your small size, too bad though...If the big guy was normal size, he will stomp her in the ground for good."

"Gihaha, thanks for the compliment, doc!" the silver monster laughs.

"Good luck hunters! Bring me proof that you kill her! Mwhahahaha!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"Okay...Anyone fought a demigod before...?" Quentin jokingly said to the hunters. As the hunters planning their attack on their target, a loud booming noise appears behind them and getting louder. They quickly turn around, only to face a massive figure of a woman with a hand on her hip, staring down at the hunters...

"...How interesting...You low lifeforms able to enter the Septentrion Alioth without being notice..." The demigoddess's voice thundered down upon the tiny hunters' ears. "And more interesting is you are here to kill me...This can not go unpunished! I will not let a small group of little bugs take me down!" Olga stomps her foot near the hunters, causing them to move back few feet away with their weapons ready.

"I guess talking to her ain't gonna help. Get ready for a big fight, hunter!" Quentin orders the group to do battle.

"Good. She talks all high and mighty...I hate that kind of people..." Viz smirks.

"This IS a demigod, Viz! I would not take her lightly if I were you!" Danny said. "Plus...She's damn beautiful!"

"Oh brother...Focus Danny!" the hunters ready themselves for a really tough battle that could go down in their records...
125332222222222222222222121.title: Targeting the Cold Demigoddess

choices: ...tries to crush them in her grip.
1253322222222222222222221212.content:
Focusing her supernatural ice powers, Olga manages to fire a super-cold blast that freezes the hunters in their tracks...

...except for Quentin and Atomic, who manage to evade the arctic blast.

"Ah, crud..." mutters Atomic before he and Quentin are snatched up and brought to Olga's face.

"You two are not about to get away with this..." threatens Olga before she...
1253322222222222222222221212.title: Freeze!!

choices: Olga refuse and fights them again
Olga grudgingly stands down and hears them out
12533222222222222222222212122.content:
Olga tightens her grip, crushing the two hunters. Quentin grunts a little as the fleshy walls crushing his body, he quickly sprouts scale like armor from his skin, giving him a good boost of protection and defense. Atomic on the other hand....He just simply yawns and waits for the giant angry demigoddess to finish their torture.

"What the...Why aren't you screaming in pain!?" Olga snarls at Quentin and Atomic, putting more pressure to crush them...But it doesn't seems to be working on the two, especially the large silver creature..."What is going on...? I am one of the Seven Deities and yet...These two beings..."

"Can we get this over with, Quentin? I'm getting bored..." The silver monster laughs, nudging the leader while Olga is completely of what the monster just said.

"Well we gotta rescue our friends, so yeah. Do your thing."

Atomic smiles widely while cracking his knuckles before delivering a powerful punch against the demigoddess's finger, causing her to yell out in pain, releasing the two from her grip. Quentin hitch a ride on Atomic's back before both hunters landed on the floor near the foot of the demigoddess. Olga holds her injure hand, backing away in shocked....There is no way the two beings can have this much power, it almost like they are demigods themselves! Enrage, Olga attempt to crush the hunters again by lifting her golden high heel above them.

"How dare you injury me! I'll make you two suffer for this!" Olga lowers her foot while smiling evilly. "Die like insects you are!"

"Good grief...Atomic?"

Atomic grins once more and gets in front of the leader with his arms upwards. As the giant foot gets closer to them, the large hunter felt the sole of the shoe and pushes upwards, firmly stand his ground even causing cracks beneath his feet.

Olga was once again surprise of the monster's massive strength, she can't even stomp on him which angers her even more. She tries putting pressure on the monster but still won't budge...However, she didn't know the other hunter was on top of the shoe, moving across the filed of gold with his sword out. He jumps in the air as he got close to the expose skin and cuts it deeply. Olga felt a stinging pain on her foot, lifting her foot off of Atomic and backs away once more.

"This cannot be...They are not one of the Gohma...And doesn't seem to be allies of Asura...Who are you, tiny creatures!?" Olga shouted, demeaning some answers.

"That was not nice...But since I'm a nice guy: I'm Quentin Andross, leader of the NanoCorps and we are on a mission to ...'kill' anyone who is been targeted and you, Olga, are the lucky lady to be the target." Quentin grins a little. "And this big guy here is Atomic Vile, the strongest hunter in the Corp that no one ever challenge him nor defeating him...So if I were you, I would stand down and...let's try to talk this out unless you want to fight us again?"

Olga growls at them, threatening her despite they are the size of an ant....

1253322222222222222222222212.content: The sniper rifle beauty? And of course, dem hips...
1253322222222222222222222212.title: Widowmaker

12533222222222222222222222121.content:
On the top of the building's roof under a starry night, the portal that the NanoCorps uses emerges out of thin air and the hunters appear out of it with no strange differences of their bodies, except their sizes.

"Well that crazy doc's device works. We are small and in a different world....Uhh where are we exactly?" Quentin asked the robot.

"I'm still collecting data, Master Quentin. It shouldn't take long before-Wait." Beta detects a massive figure on his radar and its heading this way. "A figure is heading this direction. We must proceed to a hidden spot before the figure spotted us"

"Can you tell who it is?" Danny said.

"Again I'm still collecting data and now the figure's info. Follow me to the hidden location."

"Pfft! Fuck that. Let's just kill that bastard already." Alanna brought out her sword, ready to take on this figure, but she was pick up by Atomic. "H-Hey! Let me go!"

"Sorry, Alanna! No time for getting your ass whopped!

"The hell that supposed to mean!?"

"Knock it off and follow Beta!"

Quentin and the hunters follow their robot hunter to the other side of the roof, covering in shadow which should be a good place to stay hidden. Soon they heard a loud booming footstep and its getting closer. The young Drangua checks to see everyone is here, only to sigh as he watches Alanna flailing her arms around to get out of Atomic's hand. It seems everyone is here...Except a certain hunter who is not with them...

"Oh shit...Where's Slick?" Quentin groans.

"Over there!" Danny pointed at Slick laying down sleeping as usual unaware he right in the path of this mysterious person and the footsteps are getting louder and louder. "I'll get him!"

Before Quentin could say anything, Danny activate his Exo-Suit's enhanced speed and dashes across the ground with great speed, leaving a trail of gold light lines. As the womanizer reaches his fellow sleeping hunter, a massive shadow appears before him and Slick, covering their entire spot. Danny looks up and spotted a foot shape object heading towards them and its getting pretty close, so close that he can see the footwear trends...Danny manage to grab Slick before being pushed by a powerful shockwave as the foot stomp to the ground, nearly crush the two hunters. Danny and Slick tumble across the ground until they skid to a stop...and surprisingly awaken the heavy sleeper.

"Huh...?" Slick yawns, noticing Danny was on the ground near him. "...You asleep too?"

"As if..." Danny pushes the sloth away as he gets up, wiping the sweat from his forehead. "Get your lazy ass up and follow me!"

"Do I have to...?"

"Seriously, Slick! This isn't the time for-"

"Hmm...Seems I miss you and your friend...A shame really..."

Both Danny and Slick heard a loud voice from above, it sounds quite feminine and has a hint of french accent. Their eyes trail the long legs of the attacker, wearing a purple suit which shows a bit of skin which is strangely bluish. The attacker appears to be a female with long blue hair tied up into a ponytail and seems to be carrying a sniper rifle in her hand. Danny, as usual, can't stop staring at the blue beauty, especially...her hips.

"Whoa...Dem hips!"

"Ugh...What do Petire said every time Danny said something stupid...Oh yes." Slick raises his hand and gently slap Danny on the head. "Now's not the time for that, idiot..."

"...Huh. That wasn't bad...You should do this more often." Danny chuckles before hearing a loud click. The two look up again but instead of looking at the beauty, they are now staring at the giant barrel of a rifle.

"Wh-Whoa there, cutie! Can't we talk over this on a date?" Danny tries to flirt the gun carrying woman, but she simply smiles and was inches away of pulling the trigger.

"Ugh...At least tell us your name before killing us..." Slick said while he swirls his finger around behind his back, creating an invisible shield

"...Widowmaker...and goodbye." The woman said slowly pulling the trigger.

"Oh this is gonna hurt..."

"...Eh, maybe...If only someone will help us poor tiny people..." Slick sarcastically pleads.
12533222222222222222222222121.title: Targeting the Widow...?

125332222222222222222222221212.content:
Before the Widowmaker can blast Danny and Slick's brains out, she hears several shots nearby and is forced to dodge several more, thankfully distracting her from the tiny hunters.

Who fired the shots?
125332222222222222222222221212.title: Help from Nowhere

1253322222222222222222222212121.content:
"Leave those tiny creatures alone," says an unfamiliar female voice, the source of the earlier shots. Brown hair, yellow outfit...

"Could it be..?" wonders Danny.

"Tracer?!" reacts the Widowmaker with shock.

"You'd better get away from those bug-sized people..."
1253322222222222222222222212121.title: Help or Harm?

12533222222222222222222222121211.content:
Before the Widowmaker can argue with Tracer, she hears several shots from afar, forcing her to attend to the attackers. Tracer, meanwhile, crouches down to get a better look at the hunters.

"You guys alright?" Tracer asks.

"We're fine," Danny replies. Slick, of course, is asleep again.

"I'd better keep you with me for the time being..."

Where does Tracer put the tiny pair?
12533222222222222222222222121211.title: Safe with Tracer

125332222222222222222222221212113.content:
Before Tracer could grab and place the two hunters in a safe place, Danny remembers about the others and quickly tells her about them.

"Wait, my beautiful savoir! We gotta meet up with the others." Danny said.

"Oh? Are they tiny like you, love?"

"...'Love'....?" Danny couldn't help but blush at Tracer's words, but quickly discard his pervy moments...for now. "Uhh yes! They might be over there before me and Slick was under attack. Think you can swing by and get them as well?"

"Sure! It'll be much easier for me to carry tiny people like you-" Tracer heard another gunfire abrupt and it's getting closer. "Right then, love. We better get out of here before more trouble coming!"

Danny nodded in agreement before being pick up by his giantess savoir, she gently picks the sleeping hunter and place them in the palm of her gloved hand, gently nudging Slick.

"Is he always like this?" Tracer asked Danny.

"Sadly, yes...But he's a very powerful ESP. He help us a lot on different missions, but this slacker loves to sleep...Not that I'm complaining." Danny grins. "Alright, the others are over there. Let's roll, cutie~!"

Tracer couldn't help but giggle at Danny's flirty words and closes her fist around before blink. The hunters, meanwhile, was quite stunned to see another giant interfere and aid Danny and Slick before the woman runs away. Now the giant woman has Danny and Slcik with her and disappears from their sight. The young leader orders Beta to location the two and the giant woman but as Beta begins scanning, they heard a booming noise behind and quickly turn around to see the same giant woman that has Danny and Slick, smiling down with a wave.

"Hi, loves!"

"Good gravy!" Petire shouted in surprise.

"No time for a little talk! We are getting out of here!"

Before Quentin could ask her, the giantess quickly scoops all the hunters up and placing them where Danny and Slick is. Danny greeted the female hunters by swooning over them, but was stopped by Alanna's fist and cause the womanizer to fell back.

"Nice to see you too, perv...Next time you do that, you'll have a very warm greeting from my sword who's dying to meet you!"

"N-Noted..."

Tracer grins at Danny's little act before closing her hands around them and blinks across the rooftops, away from the battleground.
125332222222222222222222221212113.title: Regrouping and Escaping

1253322222222222222222222212121131.content:
Now in an area free of violent battling, Tracer opens her hands to give the hunters a little breathing room.

"You tiny things alright?" Tracer asks.

"Y-yeah..." Danny blushes.

"So...what brought you all here?"

Oh boy...the million-dollar question. Should the Nanocorps tell Tracer that they were hired to assassinate the Widowmaker?
1253322222222222222222222212121131.title: Safety and Decisions

12533222222222222222222222121211311.content:
"We were sent here to assassinate the Widowmaker," Petire bluntly says.

Tracer is not sure how to react. "Kill...the Widowmaker?"

"Some madman named Dr. Van Micro hired us for this job," says Quentin, "but maybe we can fool the crazed doctor with a sample of the Widowmaker's blood! Whaddaya say? Will you help us out?"

How does Tracer respond?
12533222222222222222222222121211311.title: The Truth Will Set You...Up For Trouble?

12533222222222222222222222122.title: D.Va

choices: Steel ya nerves, we're going in

125332222222222222222222222.title: Dark Souls

1253322222222222222222222221.content: And the first target for them is...The creepy yet beautiful Dancer of the Boreal Valley. Will the hunters survive this monster?
1253322222222222222222222221.title: The Dancer of the Boreal Valley

choices: The hunters gain the upper hand.
The Dancer summons another sword, gaining the upper hand...
12533222222222222222222222211.content:
The NanoCorps emerges from the portal, viewing their new location. It’s quite dark and gloomy with little light from the large window from above and candles flicker on the stand, giving a more ominous feeling in the atmosphere. The team turns to notice three giant stone like pillars with one statue of a figure holding a sword right near the neck.

“Okay…This place gives me a creep. Let’s just find the target and get out of here!” said Sharper.

“Calm down, ya chubby one. We don’t have the info on our target yet.” said Petire.

“Well that crazy doc better hurry! I’m getting a feeling we’re being watched…”

“Hmm…You know…I believe Sharper might be right. It does feel like we are being watched….Beta, what’s this location?” Quentin asked the robot.

“High Wall of Lothric. I am still gather data of this world.”

“Alright then, guess we will wait for the doc to appear and gives us the information on our target. In the meantime, keep your guard up. Something about this place doesn’t feel right…”

The hunters nodded in agreement until Danny and Sharper both calling out their names, startling them.

“Guys! Guys! Look! The door!” Shaper jumps up and down, pointing at the opened doors as it beings to closing itself slowly with gust of winds flowing in, blowing the candles out in progress.

“Holy hell! This place is haunted!” said Danny.

“Tch. It’s probably just the wind, you crybabies.” Viz smirks.

“Uhh…How do you explain the doors closing by itself from the inside with no strong winds a brewing?” Danny pokes on Viz’s forehead. “Hell, I ain’t no expert on winds or supernatural crap, but that right there is a good sign of a ghost reside here!”

“Hmph. Well if is a ghost, why don’t it show itself instead of hidden itself, scarring people like a coward?” Viz chuckles and pokes Danny’s forehead with a harder push causing him to stumble a bit.

As the two hunter arguing, they then heard a dripping sound near the now closed doors and see more of the black like water substance dropping down from above. The team looks up and spotted a massive figure emerges from a black foggy portal, dropping towards the ground. The figure lets out a breathing noise and slowly rising up, turning towards the statues where the hunters are located with a sword cloaked in flames in its hand. This creature appears to be a female-looking humanoid with impossibly long, slender limbs clad in silver plated armor running up and down her body, with a veil trailing from the head. She has a twisted crown that holds the veil up and a metal grille that covers her face.

“Guys…What the hell…is that!?” Sharper screams in terror.

“G-Good gravy…B-Beta??” Petire asked Beta.

“She was one of the daughters in a royal family, but was ordered by a man to become a dancer first, and then legionnaire, which is equal to exile. He also gifted her dual blades, infused with darkness and fire, similar to his own weapons…I do believe she became a beast by fate and is now known the Dancer of the Boreal Valley.”

“Dancer, huh? But it’s kinda sad she was exile. I wonder-“ Quentin notice the Dancer is slowly making her way towards their location, each step she took made a loud clicking sound like woman’s heeled shoe. “She’s heading this way…”

“M-Maybe she didn’t see us and thought she was hearing things…and hopefully she’ll go away.” Shaper stutters.

While the hunters watches the Dancer’s movement, she quickly lunges her flaming sword towards the NanoCorps without warning! The hunters didn’t have enough time to get out of the way nor was preparing to teleport away, but one hunter is prepare for this situation. Atomic quickly gets in front of the rest and punches the giant flaming sword’s tip, creating a powerful shockwave. The shockwave pushes the hunters behind Atomic back against the stone statue and surprisingly push the Dancer back and falls down on her back, despite being gigantic compare to the hunter’s largest member.

“Gihaha! How do ya like my punch, ya giant bitch!?” Atomic grins while cracking his knuckles.

“Whoo!! Atomic, you rule!” Sharper jumps on the big brute’s shoulder, cuddling him.

“Uhh I wouldn’t celebrate just yet…” Quentin watches the Dancer gets up again, breathing heavily…it seems she is quite angry them.

Sharper quickly gets down and goes to Slick who was about to fall asleep.

“Slick! Do NOT fall asleep until we defeat her, understand!?” Sharper grabs Slick’s suit, shaking him violently.

“O-Okay…I-I won’t s-s-sleep. L-Let me g-go…”

“Then teleport us behind her now!” Quentin orders the lazy hunter as he sees the Dancer is about to grab the hunters. Slick surrounded his teammates in purple aura before disappearing right before the Dancer slams her hand down, only that her preys got away safely. The NanoCorps reappear behind the Dancer with no one being hurt…only to face the Dancer’s large booty…to Danny’s delight.

“Hot Damn! Creepy or not, that girl got some ass!” Danny shouted, only to be slapped by Petire.

“Oh brother…” Quentin sighs.

The Dancer slowly turns around to find the hunters behind her and moves slowly and vaguely towards them.

“What now, Q-man? I hope you got some kind of plan to stop this monster? Petire asked him.

“Well, we can’t hide from her. Seems she knows our presence very quickly….The only thing we can do is fight her head on. She may got some weakness in her…”
“Sounds good to me.” said Viz.

“I’ll tried attacking her from the distance.” Zeke pulls out his favorite sniper rifle.

“And I’ll give her a nice and painful punch to the leg!” Atomic roared.

“Guess I’ll take her other leg.” Alanna smiles. “Glenys, use your magic to find her weakness.”

“On it~!”

“And we will distract her!” said Petire.

“How!?” Sharper said who is still shaken in fear

“Easy, my dumb hungry fool. We get on her body and attack her. Very simple.”

“Easy for you to say…” Ralph rolls his eyes.

“Plus! We are bringing Danny and Slick along!”

“Oh joy…” Danny and Slick groan.

“Alright, hunters. You got your orders. Let’s take her down!” With the order from their leader, Quentin and the NanoCorp begins their battle against the giant Dancer which could go down in NanoCorps’ history…if they survive that is.
12533222222222222222222222211.title: Targeting the Dancer

125332222222222222222222222111.content:
The hunters, minus Zeke and Beta, goes separate ways to confuse the Dancer, but it seems the creature isn't that dumb enough to fall for their trick. With another loud breathing noise she make, the Dancer stands up slowly, showing her towering height, ready to strike down the hunters. Zeke, using a scope and one of the special bullets, fires his rifle at high speed and hits the Dancer's grille, causing the creature to be stunned and fall back to her knees with one hand touching the grill. With her down to her knees, Atomic begins to strike her from behind, punching her left leg with massive force.

The Dancer grunts in pain and tries to grab the silver monster from behind, but was once again stunned by Zeke's bullet as it hits the side of her head. Petire's group was already teleported onto the Dancer's back, taking cover under the ghostly like veils so they can wait for Quentin's orders. Danny and the Recons equipped themselves with hooks to cling on the creature's armor with Ralph holding Slick and Sharper holding Sasha, much to Danny's disappointment.

Quentin, Ryx, Alanna, and Glenys begin their assault on the Dancer's leg, causing little to great amount of pain to the creature. The Dancer, growls in annoyance, quickly swings her sword towards the four attackers, but was blocked by Atomic's hand and grabs a hold of it.

"Beta!" Atomic said, giving the signal to attack.

"Confirm. Commencing Hellstorm." Beta summons two heavy missile launchers by his side, firing numerous missiles in the air and heading straight towards its target. The Dancer spotted the missiles and tries to attack Atomic before evading, but she felt the familiar stunning attack from Zeke's bullet, rending her paralyzed. The missiles took a direct hit on the Dancer's sword hand, causing her to bellow in pain, dropping her flame sword.

"I got her weapon!"

"Nice, Atomic! Let's finish her off!" Quentin said, giving a command to defeat the monster.
125332222222222222222222222111.title: Defeating the Behemoth Dancer

12533222222222222222222222212.content: Half woman, half dragon and boy, she is tall...Target her?
12533222222222222222222222212.title: Crossbreed Priscilla

choices: Just don't look at her eyes
125332222222222222222222222122.content: The once beautiful princess now a decapitated naga queen, will this target do?
125332222222222222222222222122.title: Mytha, the Baneful Queen

1253322222222222222222222221222.content: The beautiful princess of sun and she's...a big one too. So, target her?
1253322222222222222222222221222.title: Gwynevere, Princess of Sunlight

12533222222222222222222222212222.content: How about this interesting female creature? Her redish body is creeeeepy....
12533222222222222222222222212222.title: Elana, the Squalid Queen

125332222222222222222222222122221.content:
The hunters emerges from the portal into a dark area with a little light from the candles on the wall. The team heard the wind blowing through the area, making an ominous noise. Luckily, most of the hunters have nerves of steel...except for one hunter...

"Wh-Why on earth did we have to warp here of all creepy places...?" Sharper hides behind Atomic, shaken with fear.

"I guess this is where the target is...Unless the doc miscalculated it." Quentin sighs.

"Master Quentin. I detected something from the other side...it's a strange one." Beta said.

"What do you mean?"

"It appears to be a humanoid creature...but it's classified as a fragment of Magus. A fragment of wrath according to the recent data."

"Sounds like Viz and Alanna." Petire and Ralph laughs for a bit before they were clunk on the head by the annoyed hunters

"Ugh...Continue, Beta."

"Her name is Elana, once a wife to the Sunken King. One day, a man name Sir Yorgh and a group of knights besieged Shulva and defeating the Sunken King. He then release a powerful dragon that wipe out the city using a deadly toxic cloud...Only Elana survives the raging dragon and she was enraged by this, swearing vengeance for those who destroy her city and her beloved husband."

"Whoa...So, Elana might be our target then, but what do you mean by 'humanoid creature'?" said Danny.

"I think it'll be best for us to wait for her to come. Elana is coming to this location now..."

Just like Beta said, they heard a loud footsteps coming from the other side and a massive figure appears, walking slowly towards the candles that is near the walls. The candles' light shows some of the figure's appearance...Her body is reddish like a walking corpse and her dress appears to be made out of mass of red-colored dead branches, look very similar to her body and carrying a large battleaxe on her right hand with same appearance of her body. The hunters watches the creature carefully with all silent, even covering Sharper's mouth from screaming. Elana walks over the stone wall, placing the axe against it and spoke out in a demonic voice that ,of course, scarring the pants out of Sharper.

"...You were not deserving of the mire..." The red woman clasp her hands together as if she was praying. "You... forever you shall rot..."

Hearing those words from the red woman actually made Quentin feel a bit sorry for her...She must be talking to her fallen city and can actually feel her anger...Maybe trying talking to her could help...if not, then they have no choice but to kill her. With a deep sigh, Quentin walks over to Elana, surprising the other hunters.

"Quentin!? What are you doing!?" Viz said.

"You are not going to attack her alone, are you!?" said Danny, attempting to go with him. Zeke grabs him by the shoulder preventing him to join the leader.

"Hang on kid...I think he's gonna talk to her...If things go bad, we will attack her..." Zeke said with his rifle already out.

Quentin, meanwhile, was close enough to the towering red woman, the stench from the dress is pretty foul. The brave Drangua take a deep breathe and begins talking to her.

"Elana!"

The red woman heard a small voice from behind and quickly turns around while grabbing her greataxe, but not one was there...She heard another voice and it's coming from the ground, Elana looks down and spotted the tiny hunter waving his arms.

How does the Squalid Queen reacts to the tiny hunter?
125332222222222222222222222122221.title: Targeting the Red Queen

choices: Defeat the final boss? I'm game!

125332222222222222222222222221.content: Alright let's start with the main protagonist, Reimu Hakurei.
125332222222222222222222222221.title: Reimu

choices: Reimu is right in this very room right now
Reimu is somewhere on the shrine
1253322222222222222222222222211.content:
"Well I guess we're here!" Quentin said as he and the others have finally ended up in their destination. "Um...can you please tell me what's 'here' is?" asked Ralph in his usual sarcastic tone. Everyone took a good look of their surroundings, but something seemed a little off; everything around them is huge! "Why's everything so freaking big?!" yelled Viz "That crazy old man probably have something to do with this!" "Calm down Viz! Let's just forget him and get this job done already." said Alanna. "Don't be so hasty Alanna, first we have to get more information on our mission." said Zeke "We also need to look around a bit to find out more about this area."

The hunters looked around the area to see that they're on the middle of a giant room with some items, furnitures, and even the whole structure having a traditional Japanese feel to them. "It seemed that we're inside some kind of old Japanese-style building. My biggest guess is that this building is some kind of Shinto temple." said Zeke. "Correct! I managed to scam this room and we are indeed inside an old Shinto temple." said Beta.

"I see everyone have already made it!" a familiar voice emerged from the device. "Doctor! What the hell is this? Is this some kind of joke? Well I'm not laughing!" yelled Viz before Quentin came up to him and tries to calm him down. "Temper temper boy, now I'm here to tell you all about your mission right now." said the Doctor "You see, your plan is to find the target known as Reimu Hakurei. She's the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in which you're all in right now. Now find her and hunt her down!" The mad scientist laughs before disappearing. "I'm starting to agree with Viz here! He IS a crazy old guy!" said Petire. "Well now that we know what to do, it's time to find that girl named Reimu and 'kill' her." said Quentin as he turn his attention to Beta "Alright Beta, where is she right now?"

Beta began to scam for Reimu's location and soon he got the answer to where she is right now.
1253322222222222222222222222211.title: Targeting the shrine maiden of Gensokyo

12533222222222222222222222222111.content:
"I believe our target is in the room where we are." said Beta.

Just as Beta tell them where their target is, a loud humming noise appear out of nowhere follow by a loud booming sound. The hunters quickly turn to the loud source, only to be facing a very large shoe shaped object heading towards them. They quickly dive out of the way before the shoe crashes down at the spot they were, blowing the hunters few feet.

"Good gravy! That was close!" Petire said while he and the other two recons got up. Viz got up while holding Esmeralda, protecting her from any debris, the ghost girl blushes as she looks up to her savior before looks away before he notice her blushing face. Atomic, with Slick, Beta, and Glenys on board, walk towards the others with Ryx and Zeke follow behind. Sasha, the last person to follow, was able to get a description of the target who almost step on them: Reimu, the target's name, has brown-black hair with red ribbon. a traditional miko uniform that Sasha remembers the outfit with a red hakama over a white kimono, white tabi socks and red shoes. She seems to be heading to her bed for a little relaxation for today.

"Everyone alright?"

"Yeah....Ya rust bucket! Warn us when the target's upon us!" Petire shouted at the robot.

"My apologies, Master Petire. Is everyone here?"

"...Quentin and Alanna are missing." said Ryx,

"Hmm...He's right. They are missing. How do you know, Ryx? You are blind as a bat- no offense." said Sharper.

"None taken. I just recognize their scent...also, this." Ryx turns around, pointing at Beta's enhanced sensor on his neck. "But enough of that. We gotta find the leader and Alanna before we can make a-"

"What the hell!?" Danny shouted in shock.

The hunters walk over to where Danny was looking and was also surprise to see what they looking at: Quentin was laying on Alanna, face buried on the elf's large bust and the elf herself was blushing. The young Drangua groans, notice something soft around his head and reach out to grab whatever it is, much to everyone shock and Alanna lets out a yelp sound that cause Quentin to quickly pull his head out, facing Alanna's blushing face...Realizing he actually landed on Alanna by accident and grabbing her large breast, Quentin quickly gets up and moves away from her in a panic.

"A-A-Alanna! I-I-I am so sorry! I-I didn't mean to grab your...I am sorry!" Quentin bowing down repeatedly, even gets on the ground with his head down.

"It's alright, boss. It was an accident..." Alanna got up and walks over to him before petting him on the head. "Besides, I wouldn't mind let you touch me...unlike someone I know." The elf glares coldly at Danny.

"Wh-What!? That's messed up! Why can't I touch you!?" Danny shouted.

"Oh that's simple and everyone knows it, including Slick: You are a pervert." said Zeke.

"...That's cold..."

"Enough! L-Let's drop this subject for now and focus on Reimu! A-Any other information we should know?"

"As Micro said before: Reimu is a Shrine Maiden, they are generally virgins and take various rites of purity and chastity, and undergo various forms of physical and mental training. They also practice sealing and purification rituals, which are highly form-based and symbolic, and are used to bless, purify, or exorcise vengeful spirits" Beta explains.

"Virgins? Well that's a damn shame...and she's kinda cute." Danny sighs while looking at Reimu.

"...and I rest my case."

"Shut up Zeke!"

Quentin sighs before ordering Slick to teleport them on Reimu's body, the sloth groans in annoyance and begins surrounding the hunters in glowing purple light before disappearing into thin air, but where would they in up?
12533222222222222222222222222111.title: That's One Gigantic Shrine Maidan

12533222222222222222222222222121.content:
After a long trip from the portal, the hunters soon find themselves on top of a large tree branch that seemed to be the most largest one they seen so far. The tree itself also stretched pretty far below as it they were on top of a skyscraper. "I never knew a tree could be this huge and tall." said Danny "Probably quite old too." added Petrie. The hunters slowly move forward until they reached a large pile of leafs. "Something tells me that this must of leads to the outside." said Alanna as Quentin decided to take a peak before the others followed.

The outside appeared to be a vast forest that stretched on for miles. Below their current location, there appears to be a slight clearing that formed a trail which leaded to a large old-fashioned house that was covered in vines. "This place looks amazing, can we explore this forest?" asked Glenys "We're here to get the job done not to come here and skip around." said Sasha "So Quentin, do have any idea who's our target?" "I'm not quite sure we just have to..."

"Upcoming message from Dr. Van!"

"...wait until Dr. Van gives us more info." Quentin sighed as Beta already have gotten Dr. Van's message. Beta soon open up a screen revealing the mad scientist himself. "Ah greeting fellow hunters." he said as everyone except Viz greeted him back. "Whatever, who's our main target and don't give us any funny business." said Viz as his arm turned into a sword and used it to point at his face as it threating him. "Alight everyone I will explain" said Dr. Van, completely ignoring Viz "You are in a large, mystical, forest called the Forest Of Magic in a realm known as Gensokyo. Here you'll find your target that is known as Marisa Kirisame. She's a powerful witch that lives somewhere in this very forest and it's your job to find her and hunt her down." "Sounds kind of tricky since this forest looks huge and we could get easily lost in here." said Esmeralda. "Oh it gets even more difficult." he laughed "What the hell are you talking? Speak!" yelled Viz "You'll find out.." said the scientist as the screen turns off. Everyone all stood wondering what he's talking about before Quentin broke the silence. "Well we can't be standing here can't we? Alright Beta, try to scam this girl named "Marisa"." "Yes Master Quentin." said Beta used his scanners to pinpoint the target's location.

For about three minutes, Beta finally got the results. "Well where is she?" asked Petire. "Marisa appears to be close, but still far off." said Beta "Explanation please?" "There's no need to explain, Master Petire." Beta pointed to the left, high above the sky. The hunters soon saw what looked like....
12533222222222222222222222222121.title: Targeting the black and white witch

125332222222222222222222222222211.content:
"Mwahahaha!" the hunters hear from seemingly nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I, Dr. Van Micro, know of your many adventures and have a request for you. I need you to find and assassinate Shantae, a half-genie heroine from the video game franchise of the same name. Oh, and you'll all need to be shrunk to remain undetected."

"A half-genie?" Petire responds, skeptical. "That's the silliest thing I've ever -- "

The hunters are then consumed in a bright light, and all goes blank.

The hunters slowly and groggily reawaken in what appears to be a home in the Arabian-like community known as Scuttle Town. All the furniture and rooms are huge...

Or...are the Nanocorps just shrunken?

Before the team can wonder what's going on, they hear footsteps from someone coming into the room. From their viewpoint, this person is a giantess - purple hair, red pants, bare midriff...

"It's Shantae!" Danny realizes, before becoming lost in a dreamy gaze at the beautiful half-genie.

Having heard a tiny noise, Shantae looks down and spots the downsized hunters! But how does she react to having little intruders in her house?

"Um...hello..." Quentin says. "My name is Quentin...and you are..?"

"Oh...I'm Shantae! Nice to meet you all!"

As the Nanocorps continue their idle chatting with the giantess...

The conversation between Shantae and the Nanocorps is abruptly cut short by a low, loud rumble. Embarrassed, the giantess puts her free hand to her belly.

"Sorry if that was loud, little ones," Shantae blushes, "I'm starving!"

Suddenly, the tiny hunters see Shantae lick her lips very slowly...are they about to be her lunch?
125332222222222222222222222222211121.title: Hungry Half-Genie

choices: Shantae eats the hunters by accident!

"Let me get us some lunch," says Shantae to her new tiny friends before carrying them to her kitchen. The giantess sets the hunters down on the table and begins cooking up some lunch.

"Should we tell her why we're here?" Petire whispers.

"Not yet," Zeke advises, "we should gain her trust first..."

Once she's done cooking, Shantae sets the finished steak, salads, potatoes, and other delicious food on the table, taking extra care not to crush the Nanocorps.

Next...
1253322222222222222222222222222111213.title: Lunch with Shantae

12533222222222222222222222222221112132.content:
The tiny hunters on the table make their way to the potatoes and begin to chow down. Unfortunately, Shantae, in her haste to fill her hungry gut, scoops them up with a forkful of potatoes and deposits it all in her mouth before beginning to chew.

Within the dark, wet cave, the Nanocorps proceed to beat at the tongue in hopes of being spat out. Does their plan work?
12533222222222222222222222222221112132.title: Accidentally Devoured

125332222222222222222222222222211121321.content:
Feeling unusual movement within her mouth, Shantae considers swallowing whatever is squirming in there...but then she remembers those tiny people she'd just recently met! She spits the Nanocorps out onto the table, away from the potato bowl.

"Sorry about that..." Shantae says, embarrassed. "I guess I should be more careful!"

I, Dr. Van Micro, have a mission for you -- I've heard of your many adventures, and I need you to find and assassinate Risky Boots, the evil pirate nemesis of video game heroine Shantae. Oh, and you'll all have to be shrunk to avoid being noticed!"

12533222222222222222222222222221211.content:
The hunters eventually awaken on what looks to be a pirate ship. A massive pirate ship.

Or...are they just shrunken?

Giant barrels of ammunition line the deck, and a monolithic figure walks around, apparently ensuring that her cannons are loaded. She looks a lot like Risky Boots, the Nanocorps' assigned target.

Because she IS Risky Boots.

"So, what's the plan, boss?" Petire asks Quentin.

Well, what IS the plan?
12533222222222222222222222222221211.title: Arrrrr!

choices: Risky Boots tries to stomp the hunters
125332222222222222222222222222212111.content:
"Charge!!" Quentin yells, against his better judgement. On his orders, the hunters follow him in a ramming attack toward Risky Boots' feet. The giantess pirate feels a sharp pain in her right ankle, then her left. Annoyed, she turns around and looks down to see tiny...people...attacking her feet!

"Grr..." Risky Boots growls, furious at the intruders aboard her ship. "Ye better stop that, or you'll be walking the plank!"

Next...

1253322222222222222222222222222122221.content:
"Mwahahahaha!" The hunters hear a voice coming from nowhere. "Greetings, Nanocorps! I am Dr. Van Micro. I've heard of your many adventures and exploits, and I have a mission for you, if you choose to accept it...or if you don't. You are to enter the game "Shantae: Half-Genie Hero", then find and assassinate the Giga Mermaid, a boss in said game. You'll know her by her green skin, forehead jewel, and massive height. Oh, and you'll need to be shrunk."

"Get a load of this moron," Petire says, "as if it's even possible for us to get shrunk down to -- "

Then a bright light engulfs the hunters, and everything goes blank.

1253322222222222222222222222222212.title: Selene

choices: Selene drops a spoon and notice a group of 'bugs'
12533222222222222222222222222222121.content:
The hunters emerges from the portal onto the wooden floor, they take notice of their new surroundings and what it appears to be someone's home...A giant fireplace on left flickers a bit giving them a little light. wood like table with different herbs and bowls, different flowers and herbs hanging in the ceiling, and another set of herbs by the window and it seems to be nighttime as the sky is dark with stars appearing. The device begins to beep suddenly, scaring some hunters in progress and a hologram of the laughing doctor appears before them.

"Mwhahahaha! Sorry if I scare you hunters, but good to see you guys in one piece!" the doctor said with a laugh,

"Yeah. Nice to see you too, a-hole." Petire grumble. "Anyway, what's this place? It seems like someone running a herb store or something..."

"Oh yes...Welcome to Gransys, not the prettiest region I ever seen, but it is good for adventures and such...and teeming with dangerous monsters, including the ones at night."

"And it's nighttime..." Sharper gulps.

"Don't worry! You are not after monsters here...Today's target is an easy one, unless you avoid her footstep. Her name is Selene and uhh...That's it." Dr.Micro said rubbing his chin.

"Wait. What do you mean 'that's it'?" Viz asked him.

"Truth be told...I don't have enough info on her. Seems my technology can't reach Gransys...Weird. But your robot friend here may able to give you some information about her...With that done, I'm out! Good luck hunters!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"Okay....Beta?" Quentin asked the robot.

"Scanning now. But we must proceed under the table."

"Why?"

"The one called Selene is coming."

"Why didn't ya say so, rust bucket! Let's roll!" Petire said before he and the two recon head other the table while the others follow pursuit. As soon the hunters hid themselves under the table, they heard the booming footsteps coming from outside the doorway and it's getting louder with each step. The hunters saw a foot emerging from the doorway follow by the rest of the target's body, getting a good view of their target.

The target appears to be a young girl with brunette colored pigtails hair, wearing a dark green tunic with different accessories that resembles plants and ankle strap flats. The girl carries a basket of herbs and walks over to the table where the hunters are, placing them on the table. The girl stares at the herbs for a minute before sighing in sadness and proceed making a set of herb ale.

The hunters watches the girl's movement as she making herb ale, especially her huge feet that is inches away from them. Beta was able to get information about the girl but it seems not even the highly advance machine can't get enough info about her.

"Hmm...It seems I can't acquire anymore data about her....But she is not a human, rather a Pawn." said Beta.

"Pawn?" Quentin said.

"Pawns are denizens of the Rift who swear their alliance to the one called the Arisen and follow him or her to fight a dragon. Selene's owner has pass away in certain generations ago and by estimating the numbers...Selene's age is 2 to 300 years old."

"Whoa...Talk about extended life style..." Ralph said while nudging against Petire.

"And a pretty lonely life if ya ask me...Poor kid." said Danny. "Maybe we shouldn't hurt her."

"Wasn't attending to, but we gotta find a way to fool the doctor....." said Quentin. "...Perhaps taking her blood could work, but we better get her attention first. Just to get her trust."

"That won't be easy, kid. 300 years of being alone and away from civilization...Yeah, she won't be able to trust us, let alone seeing us as a very tiny beings." said Zeke.

"We have to try, Zeke and the best way to do it is to climb her."

"What!? Climbing this mile high girl!? What about-Oh..." Petire notice Slick was sleeping on Atomic's shoulder.

"Yep, so let's get going!"

With the leader's order are clear, the hunters begins their mission to get the giant Pawn's attention, starting by ascending her very large foot...
