125332222222222222222222222222222221222.title: Lenus

choices: The female Wingly landed in a nearby forest for a quick rest and healing
The NanoCorps and the Wingly get to know each other while flying
1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.content:
The bounty hunters emerges from the portal safely with no body has any changes or ill effects and ended in someone's royalty like room....except the hunters are now the size of a little flea. While looking around the wide room, Viz notice a large portrait of young beautiful woman posing for the image, he couldn't help but stare at the picture...something about this photo seems a bit off, he wonders...almost as if it was alive?

Just then, a loud beeping sound from the device interrupts Viz's thoughts and a hologram of Dr.Micro appears before them.

"Mwhahaha! Glad you hunters made it safely! This one's...gonna be different to eliminate the target, so play along until the time has come..."

"Okay...? So is this target's tough or...?" Quentin asked.

"Well you could say that...She's a Wingly so she can fly around and such, she posses a very powerful weapon called Moon Dagger, not much I know of...and that pretty much it. Oh and you better make sure she finds you..."

"Huh..?" Quentin and the hunters look at each other, confuse of what the crazy doc is saying.

"Trust me. I'll uhh...explain it later once she's contact me."

"W-Wait a minute! What do you mean 'once she's contact you'!? What's going on here, doc!?" Petire shouted.

"L-Like I said, just play along I beg of you...It's the only way to get close to that female Wingly."

Quentin frowned at Dr.Micro, not sure to trust him or not...The leader looks at the co-leader for any advice to this strange situation, the only response from the wise gunman is a simple nod, meaning to go along with the plan.

"...Alright doc, we'll do it. But if this plan screws up, I'll send some hunters who hates you a lot and I think it won't end so well..."

"Eep...Noted...Let see...Right now she's escaping from her pursuers after she reveal herself, she's heading to your location as we speak, so get ready to be notice! See you later, hunters! Mwhahaha!" The doctor laughs before signing off.

"...I wish his plan would screw up...I wanna punch the shit out of Micro..." Viz growls.

"Save some for me, Viz." Alanna grins, cracking her knuckles.

"Enough. We'll deal with him later. Where's this Wingly at, Beta?"

"She is now flying towards the opening of the window/ledge behind the massive structure of the couch. I suggest we make haste." said Beta.

"Why? Can't she just use the door behind us?" Ralph pointed at the large door behind them.

"Negative. I detected a large group of soldiers marching throughout the castle and they are getting close to this room. Again, I suggest we make haste."

"And unfortunately, Slick is sleeping...Activate your exo-suit speed, rocket boost, etc. We gotta move!" Quentin orders the hunters while jumping up in the air, sprouting a pair of dragon wings and takes off to the Wingly's pick up spot. Danny, Viz, and the Recons turn their speed boosters before dashing across the room, leaving a trail of the suit's colors.With Slick on his shoulder, Atomic grabs Ryx, Alanna, Glenys, and Sasha with tentacles sprouting from his back before making a huge jump that covers half way the whole room. Zeke and Beta activate their rocket boosters from their feet, blasting off into the air and flying over the couch with the ghostly rookie Esmeralda following them.

One by one, the hunters made it to the edge of the opening ledge and not a moment too soon: The castle's soldiers burst through the door, heading towards the ledge where the hunters are.

"Damn, I didn't except them soldiers to move so quick!" Petire said while the hunters look for the Wingly. "Where the hell is that woman!? If she isn't here by the time the soldiers stomp on our butts, I'ma gonna kill that son of the bitch when I'm-"

"Jump! Now!"

A loud feminine voice appears from the edge, startle some hunters. Quentin looks over and see's a silver haired woman dressed rather revealing clothing and a bandanna on her head, and a pair of light blueish wings on her back,,,and seems to be cover in cuts and bruises. The woman holding her hands for the tiny hunters to land on it safely. With the soldiers getting closer to them, the hunters jumps off the ledge, avoiding the stomping guards and landed on the soft surface of the Wingly's palms.

With the tiny passengers in her hands, the Wingly quickly flies away from the castle, avoiding the arrows from the guards and disappears from their sight.
1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.title: Targeting...or Working with the Wingly Thief?

1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.content:
The mysterious Wingly and the tiny NanoCorps escape the archers' range with no arrows hitting her, but it seems she's already taken quite a damage on her and breathing quite heavily. Her wind like breath blasts against the hunters, but they manage to hang on b clinging onto her land like palm. Glenys was about to heal the poor Wingly, but Zeke place his hand on her shoulder, telling her not to heal her until she reveals herself and how did she know about Micro...It does seems pretty fishy for the hunters, but they have no choice but to go along with Micro's plan...for now.

Their thoughts on Micro's plan were interrupt when they felt a slight tremble(earthquake to them) from the woman's body and starts sweating a bit, slowing down her flight speed in progress. If this keep up, this woman would passed out and will take a plunge into the earth, possibly injure the Wingly more or worst. Sighing, Quentin decided to speak to her, hoping to listen to him.

"Uhh miss? Maybe it's a good idea to take a rest somewhere."

The woman looks down at Quentin with a frown at first, but then her mouth slowly forms a smirk.

"Heh. I forgot you're not little toys. Alright then, little man...Guess I'll..land here and figure what to do with this...strange situation." The Wingly notice she is flying over a forest, a good resting spot as long there are no wild vicious monsters or soldiers interrupt her.

"Oh I agree. That son of the bitch Micro own us a explanation..." Viz grumbles.

"Hehe...Feisty little one, aren't you?" The woman teases Viz by gently petting him on the head, causing the irritated hunter to fend off the finger, blushing. The recons laughs at Viz for blushing...until he slap the three on the heads.

The Wingly descend into the brush green forest, grunting in pain. She spotted a small river streaming down and a nice shaded spot nearby, perfect for her to rest. As the Wingly landed safely, she lets the tiny hunters off her palm before collapsing against the tree, out of breath and sore from her latest fight. This is where the NanoCorps should either heal the mysterious Wingly and get information about her or leave her be and tried contacting Micro so he can explain the situation...
1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.title: To Aid or Not to Aid the Giant Wingly...?

choices: The hunters continue with the plan and hop on
Viz, Beta, and Zeke pulls Quentin away to have a little meeting...
1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.content:
In order to gain trust from each other, Quentin and the hunters moves up closer to the giant mysterious woman while the Wingly watches their movement with her hand near her weapon in case these strange tiny people tried to attack her. Zeke's sharp eyes spotted her movement and behavior pattern, thinking them as a threat, he was about to summon his rifle but Quentin raise his hand, giving their orders to not attack the Wingly and looks at Glenys with a nod to go heal her.

The cheery mage smiles and lifts her staff, encasing the giant woman in green aura, surprising the Wingly as her wounds begin to heal in a fast rate and regaining her energy. The woman looks down at them with her lips forming into a smile, seeing them as not a threat.

"Well, that's two in a row you'd surprise me! No wonder Micro said you bounty hunters are worthy for my attention."

"Worthy huh...? That smile ball..." Alanna growls.

"Easy, Alanna...Good thing we heal you up cause you do own us an explanation on how did you know about Micro." said Quentin.

"And you better tell us the truth or we'll have to make those injuries come back again..." Viz threatens the Wingly, though she simply laughs at his words.

"I'm starting to like this feisty little man...Alright, where to start...My name is Lenus. Member of the Gehrich Gang and one of the 'superior' race in this world: The Winglies" Lenus gets up, standing at full height before revealing them her wings, giving the hunters an entire and beautiful view of the Wingly. Danny couldn't control his 'desire' and leaps onto Lenus's shoe and stars rubbing his face against the armor like surface.

"Again, Danny!?" Petire shouted at the womanizer.

"I can't help it! She's an angel~! I do dig woman with beautiful appearances and wings~! " Danny said while kissing her foot while the hunters looks on, shook their hands and face palming. Even Lenus is also shock to see this tiny man practically worshiping her like she's some kind of goddess.

"...You do have such interesting friends, little fella."

"Forgive Danny...He has a bad habit of 'clinging' on to women. Anywho, I'm Quentin Andross: Leader of the NanoCorps who was hired by Dr.Micro to kill the target he given us...though he haven't gave us enough information on who it is." Quentin said without revealing that Lenus is their target, but with enough trust from her, he could tell her the truth and may able to help them fool the doc.

"Heh, how interesting...the doctor promise to give me some power to reclaim the glory of what Winglies has lost. But I didn't believe that weirdo." Lenus huffs. "But he was right about one thing: Look for the tiny beings from the top of the castle and here you all are...Itty bitty and fragile enough to be crushed by just about everyone." The Wingly smirks before slowly raising her foot, with Danny still clinging on, above the hunters, playfully dangle her foot as she was about to stomp on them. "Hehe, don't worry, I'm won't kill you guys. I taken a liken on you, maybe keeping you all as pets..."

"Pets...? Lady, you got some nerves to call us pets.." Viz said while shifting his mechanical arms into guns. Quentin pats him on the back as he get in front of him.

"Ugh...Sorry. Viz is not a very happy camper at the moment. He's still pissed about taking this mission, along with a few angry hunters...Anyway, what was you doing back in the castle? Those guards were everywhere when we came out of the portal?" Quentin asked.

"Hmm...I'n not sure I should tell you...But you guys seem nice-minus one-and you did heal me..." Lenus pulls out a dagger, lowers it down to let the hunter view the strange yet beautiful weapon.

"Wow, I never seen this weapon before...What is it?" Sasha asked.

"This is the Moon Dagger. One of the Divine Moon Objects that my beloved Lloyd is looking for...Ooh, I wish my darling could of see me in action..." The Wingly sighs in romantic thoughts on this person name Lloyd.

"Beloved!? Oh damn..." Danny stops doing his pervy actions as he heard she was already in love with someone, slumping his head down in heartbreak

"A damn shame indeed, Danny. Better luck next time..." The Recons mock and laugh at Danny, causing him to curse at the three.

"Oh brother...So why is this Lloyd person want to collect these Divine Moon Objects?"

"That I cannot tell you, but I could take you all with me to him and he'll be gladly to inform you...despite you all are a bunch of little beings." Lenus lowers her hand, offering a lift. "Hop on aboard."

The hunters still aren't sure she can be trusted, but in order to 'kill' her, they have to go along with the plan..Some of the hunters, however, has had quite enough of this little charade and ready to strike her in a second.
1253322222222222222222222222222222212221.title: Helping the Wingly

125332222222222222222222222222222222.content: This somewhat similar Dark Soul game?
125332222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bloodborne

1253322222222222222222222222222222221.content: A mysterious female hunter in the clock tower who seemingly looks dead...but isn't?
1253322222222222222222222222222222221.title: Lady Maria of the Astral Clock Tower

choices: Maria brings her weapons out, ready to fight the hunters
Maria starts talking in a rather...friendly way
12533222222222222222222222222222222211.content:
The NanoCorps arrives at the target's location with no changes on their bodies...except for the shrinking part. It appears they are in a dark room with candles lit up to gain some light, a gigantic circular shape clock like object in the back with long and short hands, thinking this might actually be a clock tower or something...But one peculiar object that stands out the rest: Right near the giant clock stairway...a seated woman dressed like a hunter in the old days, sitting motionless with legs crossed with one hand on it while the other dangle off the chair arm and to make it even more interesting...blood stains near the chair and some on her clothes, presumed dead...

The tiny hunters, with Sharper being carried due to being scared, slowly make their to the woman's lifeless body, making sure it wasn't a trap set up just for them. As the hunters reach to the giant long boots of the woman, Beta spoke up about the data he just receive, nearly scaring the hunters.

"B-Beta! Next time warn us if ya gonna say something!" Petire said while slapping the robot on the head.

"Forgive me. I have acquire data from the deceased woman, her name is Lady Maria or Maria. She was once a hunter who followed the first hunter of Cainhurst, Gehrman and she is related to the queen of Cainhurst, Annalise....That's all I can tell you, not much what happen to her, but I found it quite...strange."

"Strange...?" Zeke said.

"Can you smell the corpses' stench?"

"Eww! You want us to smell the dead woman's body!? That's...hold on..." Alanna takes a big whiff to see the corpse gives off the stench...but it seems she can't detect any foul smell. "Whoa...No foul stench?"

"And the blood stains over here looks pretty old..." Viz crouch down, touching the blood cover floor. "Yet, no foul stench...Something's not right here, boss."

"I know. Keep your guard up, hunters. Who know what kind of traps and tricks that'll sprung up...Pete? Why don't you and the Recon scout up the body?" Quentin asked him.

"Whoa now. You're asking me to climb up a dead woman's body? I don't know...We might disturb the dead. Outta respect the dead, ya know?"

"Again with that crap? Just do it, Petire." said Viz.

"Ugh...Fine...Let's go ya dumbbells." Petire drags the scared Sharper with Ralph follow behind.

"I'll follow you guys." Danny spoke up before following the recons.

"That's fine, Danny...Just...don't do anything nasty to her body..."

"Huh...? Oh...Oh! Hell no! What's wrong with you guys!? I'm not gonna fondle with a dead woman, geez!"

Quentin simply shrug his shoulders while watching the four hunters hop onto the boot, activating their exo-suits speed boost. They zip upwards at high speed, dodging and past through the hill size cloth and giant buckle and eventually made it to to the woman's knee, also covered in blood. They look up to see what she looks like and Danny instantly fell in love with Maria. She appears to be quite young with blonde hair, her eyes are closed so there's no telling what her eye color is, her skin is somewhat pale and doesn't appear to be a buxon type which disappoint the womanizer, but her beauty alone takes the prize...

"Hot Damn! What a cutie! Too bad she's dead...I would've asked her on a date if she's alive."

"Uh-huh..." Petire and Ralph roll their eyes while looking around.

Meanwhile, the hunters on the floor continue to investigate this weird situation and waiting for Dr.Micro to call them. Beta then detects a life force coming from the woman's body and it's slowly rising...

"...Master Quentin."

"Yeah?"

"Retrieve Danny and the recons. Now."

"Huh?"

"I detected a life force from the corpse. I suggest make haste and retrieve Danny and the recons."

"Whoa...Call me crazy, but I felt this woman's life force as well..." Slick confirms with Beta...and this is quite rare for the sloth to pick up a life force from a dead body

Quentin orders the hunters except for Slick to get away from the supposedly dead Maria while the two go find the four hunters and escape from the trap, but it seems a bit too late. The woman's hand quickly scoops the four hunters off her leg, lifting them up close to her face and her quick reaction cause Quentin and Slick to back away from Maria. The woman opens her gloved hand, staring down with her cold eyes at the ones who disturb her slumber, the recons was startle by the sudden movement of her. Danny, however....

"Hot Damn, she's alive! Hey, cutie! How about you and me go on a date and get to know each other?" Danny flirts with the woman before being slapped on the head by Petire.

"... A corpse...should be left well alone." Lady Maria's soft voice, though thunderous to the tiny hunters, spoken. Her surprisingly minty breath blows down upon them, barely hanging on to the cloth of her glove.

"In-Indeed...W-We have learn our lesson...right fellas?" Petire said with the other two nodded quickly except for Danny, dazed at the woman's cute face.

The woman slowly gets off of the chair, now towering over the hunters on the floor. Her boots alone can wipe them out in an instant, only if Atomic wasn't around. The hunters gets their weapons out, ready to fight the giant woman and try to rescue the other hunters from her clutches...Maria crouches down into front of the hunters and lowers her hand so the four hunters can regroup with the others, Petire and the others look at each before getting off her hand quickly, regrouping with their teammates while the giant woman stands back up. Quentin is glad that the woman let's them go without any harm, but they are not out of the woods yet...The NanoCorps and Lady Maria stare at each other down to see who's gonna make a move...
12533222222222222222222222222222222211.title: The Giantess of the Astral Clock Tower

choices: Maria somehow got her weapons back
125332222222222222222222222222222222111.content:
"Oh..I know very well..." The giantess spoke softly. "How the secrets beckon so sweetly..."

"Huh...? Secrets beckon so sweetly? What she's blabbing about?" said Viz.

"Don't know..." said Quentin.

"Only an honest death will cure you now..." Lady Maria brought her dual bladed weapon out before breaking both in two. " Liberate you...From your wild curiosity."

Right when she brought her weapons, Quentin orders the hunters to get a good distance from her and it was a wise choice when the giantess slash against the wooden floor, barely missing Quentin by an inch. The ghostly Esmeralda summons her chains, wrapping around the giant weapon while Atomic jumps into the air, ready to attack Maria's face. Maria saw the tiny silver hunter and about to cut him with her other sword, but didn't notice the chains wrapping around it, pinned on the ground. The confuse hunteress looks at her weapons being chain up and tries to break it free, but the chains are pretty durable despite being small.

"Hey, Lady! You forgot someone!"

Maria quickly turn her focus on Atomic but the silver brute is upon on her and punches against her right cheek of her face, causing her to yell out in pain and pushes away the hunters a few feet, losing her swords as well.

"Nice one, Atomic!" Petire cheering fro the brute.

"Gihaha! Not so tough without your weapons, huh!?" Atomic landed beside the hunters, laughing at Maria.

Lady Maria spits out a little blood before staring at the tiny hunters in a rather...curious look, not even quite angry at them.

"Interesting...You tiny creatures...have peek my interest..." Maira said before slowly walking up to them.

"Well...That's sorta good, I guess. Hunters, try to keep her away from the weapons and watch out for any tricks she go." Quentin orders the hunters, getting into their positions: Atomic, Alanna, Ryx, and Viz take the front as the Block, Zeke, Beta, Glenys and Slick moves to the back as the Rear Guard, The Three Recons take the left side while Sasha and Danny take the right side, know as the Intrusions, and Quentin gets in front of Esmeralda know as the Knight's Guard. With the hunters in positions, they are ready to take on Lady Maria.
125332222222222222222222222222222222111.title: Fighting Lady Maria

choices: Maria takes action and tries to catch her.
Crystal goes to check on her friend.
125332222222222222222222222222222222112.content:
"You... you all are no hunters..." She said, working past the muddle that filled her head. This place was a dream, after all, even if a bad one filled with horrible memories of the past. Though just as soon as she was clearing her head.. she caught sight of ylva, and her eyes narrowed at her. She felt that pull again.... how tantalizing the blood was, how it called for her. It made her sick... the very reason she had cast her rakuyo away... the very same that she held now, thanks to the dream she resided in.

Ylva, seeing the woman glaring at her, raised her ears to attention. "We are... mercenaries. Not hunters. But... how did you know?" She asked, lowering her ears instinctively, trying to be submissive so as not to invoke the woman's wrath.

"None of you smell like blood... every hunter I see is drenched in the scent of blood... beast blood." She said, before her eyes flicked to athanasia, just out of happen-stance. She saw that familiar look in her face, how long had she been staring at the spilt blood in her goblet? "Your friend... " She said, placing her hand on the pommel of her blade just out of habbit.

Athanasia had been staring at the blood on the floor. Though it was old... it smelt more intoxicating than any that had crossed her senses before. It was intoxicating to her. More than any alchohol or wine she had tasted. She had the intensity on her face of when she was in battle, her red eyes seeming to be entirely focused on what looked like a lake of the sweet stuff to her.
125332222222222222222222222222222222112.title: Maria starts talking in a rather...friendly way

1253322222222222222222222222222222221121.content:

Athanasia responded. "No!! Let me go!! I'm fine! Rrrr...!" That blood was too sweet. She -had- to get to it. And that's when she activated her shadow powers. She blended herself with the nearest shadow, fusing with it. But the nearest shadow.... was the darkness under Marias clothes. She was spread across all of Marias body, able to feel every inch of Marias body. She was formless as the darkness under her clothes, but she could still feel things. Things like the heat from being so close to her skin, and the heat trapped under her clothes. She could feel... -everything-. She looked left, right, even turning her body to scan the room, which just ended up forcing athanasia to feel Marias nude body pushing against her and shaping the darkness she had become... and Maria had no idea. "What? Where did she go?" She said, looking back down to them.

Danny was just staring with his mouth open. "L-....lucky...." was all he could whisper under his breath.

" Shut up, Danny! Anyway, never thought I see the wise old man hanging out with a beautiful assassin!" Petire teases the wise gun man. "Did you two go out on a date?"

"...Actually, yes. We did." Zeke's words cause Petire to shut his mouth. "Despite not able to talk, she's a charming women with a beautiful smile on her face and uhh..A lovely body to die for...Ahem...Anyway, we go out a few times...I must admit, it feels quite awkward for a bounty hunter and an assassin to date in public, so we decided to stay as friends for a few years until I join the NanoCorps. I haven't contact her ever since...Probably too busy killing people with a hit on their head...And being rich and famous."

"Can you tell us what she looks like?"

"She's a dark skinned elf with long black hair, beautiful body like I said, wearing a rather tight leotard, long gloves and high heel boots. She wears a mask for the fun of it...She carries two daggers and a pouch full of many devices and traps for her targets."

"Heh...If she really is our target, then she gotta be worthy enough to kill...No offense, Zeke." said Viz.

"None taken...That is...IF we can kill her. She is well known for her agile and no one was able to capture her, even the slightest sound coming from 10 miles will make her escape, never to be seen again...But I wonder how the doc was able to find her?" Before Zeke can figure it out, the device begins beeping and projects a hologram of Dr.Micro before them.

"Mwhahaha! Hello again, NanoCorps! Today's your very lucky because-"

"We are targeting The Whisperer." Quentin said before the doc can give the hunters the name of their target.

"Oh...Y-You know?"

"Actually, Zeke was the one who told us about Whisperer...And uhh, they were dating a few years ago."

"WH-WHAT!?! You mean he and that assassin..."

"We are shock as you are, doc..." Ralph roll his eyes.

"Well then...You know her info and skills correct?"

"Yes, but I want to know how did you track her?" Zeke asked him.

"It's not that easy I'll tell you that, but once I able to trace her usual place and spotted her, I was able to plant her a bug before it was discover. Now with that done, good luck hunters, this silent lady is gonna be pretty tough for you...Mwhahaha!" The doctor laughs before he signs off, leaving Zeke in annoyance.

"...We don't have to kill your sweetheart, Zeke. Maybe she'll understand when we find her or find us." Quentin grins while patting on Zeke's back.

"Heh, thanks kid. We can fool the doc by sending her blood to him and a piece of cloth or something from her...Right now we need to find her." The hunters begin looking for any traces of the silent assassin until Beta alerted them that Whisperer is...

choices: She scoops them up into her hand
She lifts her foot, preparing a stomp!

But what happens next?
1311211.title: Meeting the Assassin?

choices: Tell the Whisperer about their mission
Try to gain her trust before revealing the truth
1311212.content:
As Beta warns his fellow teammates that the Whisperer is right behind them, a dagger which is quite gigantic to the hunters plunge into the bed,almost hitting the hunters. The Three Stooges jump away from the blade with shock and fear, backing against Zeke.

"Wh-What the hell!? Where did that dagger come from!?" said Sharper

"Why don't you ask her..." Zeke, along with the trio, turn around to face his old partner, friend, and lover: The Whisperer. Haven't seen each other for years, the Whisperer still looks lovely as ever...Her well toned and curvaceous body still striking as always, along with her large assets, wide hips, beautiful red eyes, long flowing hair...Just the sight of her makes the old wise gunman fall in love with her again...His little sightseeing was interrupted when Whisperer lowers her head to get a closer look of the hunters...she doesn't most hunters and notice her old partner among them, letting out a soft gasp. Whisperer pulls down her mask, reveling her full face as she smiles sweetly at Zeke.

"Heh...Nice to see you too, Whisperer. Still look beautiful as always." said Zeke.

"W-Wait...She's not gonna to attack us?" said Sharper. "Then why the hell she use that dagger which nearly kill us!?"

"...It's a way of saying she's here. Old habit of hers...she got me a few times until I got use to it."

"Ahem! Aren't ya gonna introduce us to your beautiful friend, hmmm?" Danny spoke up, still upset about Zeke and Whisperer's relationship. Zeke chuckles a bit before he introduce his friends to Whisperer, she responded by waving at the hunters, removing her glove revealing her long slender arm and extend her finger in front of Quentin for a handshake or 'fingershake' for that matter. Quentin touches her finger, giving a friendly handshake.

"Wow, despite being an assassin, she's really nice."

"She is indeed...Well, to me. She usually be unfriendly and cold around others." Zeke said while placing his hand on Whisperer's finger.

"Would it be wise to inform her our mission?" Beta asked.

"Hmm..." Zeke really don't want to tell her they were sent here to kill her...

choices: She holds her arm out. She's cooperating!

"We were sent here to kill you," blurts Petire, much to the Whisperer's confusion.

How does the giantess react to all this?

...

13411.content:
In a starry night, outside of a snowy cavern on top of the mountains...

A tall woman dressed in a rather exposing clothes walk slowly towards the cliff, viewing the land from below...Fire blazes across the old town with smoke covering the view, people screaming in terror, livestocks scurry around in panic and buildings crashing down in flames, killing half of the townsfolk...all done by one woman who view the humans as worthless trash and that woman name is Prosperine Vaulder, the human/demon woman who wants nothing more than destruction to the humans, all because of someone murder her human mother.

"...Vile humans." The demoness hissed. "They don't deserve to live...No one does, not what they did to my mother...I'll kill every one of them!" Prosperine lets out a bloody demonic scream that can be heard from the town, sending fear to the surviving people. The demoness smiled coldly when hearing the townsfolk scream once more, enjoying every scream she heard.

Before the demoness returns to her cavern home for the night, she catches something sparkle across her eye, stopping right on the tracks. She watches the tiny bright light begins to grow a little larger and spotted what appears to be little figures coming out of the light. The demoness moves behind a large snow covered boulder, stil viewing the tiny people and thanks to her enhanced hearing, she able to hear what the tiny people were saying....

"Snow...I hate snow...Too cold to sleep on..." The lazy hunter Slick yawns.

"No one cares, dumbbell...So what's the info about this target?" Petire said.

"Not much of what Dr.Micro said and still collecting data in this new location...But we must be cautious of finding the target. " said Beta.

"Yeah, she's a demon and demons do have a very nasty attitude." said Quentin.

"Kinda sound like-"

"Not another word, Petire..." Viz glares at the recon, shutting him up.

"And a lovely sexy body! Even Micro said it!" Danny jumps with joy. "I can't wait to see this lovely beauty!"

"Sure...Go ahead if you want die so badly...Which I love to see you being rip by pieces." Alanna grins.

"I kinda agree with Alanna. This Prosperine is no pushover...She is the one who caused the 'Crimson Massacre' all thanks to the humans who loathe her and killed her mother..." Quentin sighs. "..Guess we got to put her down, somehow."

"It could be difficult due to our size, but we do have some advantage." Zeke said. "Right now let's find the demoness before she find us..."

Before the hunters could spread out to search for their target, they heard a soft growl behind the massive boulder and a figure jumps up from there, heading towards them. The hunters quickly move out of the way before the demoness landed upon them. Chuck of snow spread as she landed, heading directly towards the tiny hunters and they quickly dispose the falling debris. The hunters looks up at the towering figure that tries to crush them...and they were awe at the sight of the woman, mainly Danny.

Just like Dr.Micro said about her, she really is downright beautiful and wearing a revealing clothing is enough for Danny to go crazy in love.

"Hot Damn! Hey darling, how about you and me go on a date?" Danny tries to flirt with her.

"Oh Danny..." Petire shake his head

Ignoring the tiny hunter's flirts, Prosperine morphs her hand into a demonic claws and quickly slash the snow covered ground where the hunters, but was stopped by the NanoCorps' brute hunter Atomic as he grab the finger of the claw, skidding to a stop, inches away of cutting the hunters. Zeke quickly throes out a flash bang at her exposing red eye, bursting with light and blinding the raging she-demon, grunting in pain and stumbling backwards.

"She's blinded! What's the plan, Q-man!?" Alanna shouted.

"Take her down and hopefully she'll calm down!" Quentin said while ordering Atomic and Alanna to bring the giantess to her knees.

The Chief jumps on the counter with the hunters follow pursuit, as the hunters waiting for this agent, they heard a loud noises outside the building.

This person appears to be a humanoid female cat with wide lime green eyes and tan fur. She has mid-length, wavy black hair and wears a black suit and belt while her headband, sweater, gloves, and boots are white.

"Agent Kitty Katswell! Just in time for-Wait...Where's Agent Puppy?" The Chief asked her.

"Ugh...Unfortunately, Dudley press the wrong button and cause the car to explode...Again. Keswick is out searching for him, who know where he wound up." Kitty explains.

"As usual for Agent Puppy...Anyway, we got new recruits! Come over here and introduce yourself."

Kitty wipes off all the smoke and dust off her clothes while heading to the chief and the hunters location. As Kitty saw the new recruits, she was quite surprise to see very small people who is barely the same size as the chief except the silver person...who is quite imitating. 155331.title: Catty Carlisle

1553311.content:
Before the NanoCorps arrive at their new location, on top of a mountain, there is a fortress with an over-sized golden statue of a large man doing his pose with his arm raising forward. The person who lives there is a sinister and sadistic man, who enjoys the pain and suffering of the planet Mobius, along with three of his henchmen. That man name is Dr. Ivo Robotnik, an evil genius who bent on taking over Mobius, but thanks to a certain teenage hero, his plans has been foiled. Today was much like other days: Failing to destroy his nemesis and yelling at the three henchmen.

"You nincombots! What happen to my brrrilliant traps!?" Robotnik yelling at his henchmen.

"Well uhh...You see, Your Rottenness...We did set it up just like you said but..." The tall chicken robot Scratch said.

"But uhh...Sonic was able to avoid them, so we start chasing them..." The short tank like robot Grounder said.

"And the two idiots ended up caught on your traps...With me included!" The monkey robot Coconuts said.

"It wasn't my fault! It was Scratch that got us into the trap!"

"No way! It was yours and Coconuts fault!"

"Hold up! I didn't even help you with those traps!" The three robots bickering each other who's fault is it until Robotnik stops them.

"SHUT UP!!!" The three quickly shuts their mouth up, knowing they are in deep trouble...

"I should of dump you three dumbbots into a melting pot ages ago! But luckily for you, I just got an idea to destroy that pesky blue rrrat once and for all! So pay attention, you brrainless crretins!" As the evil genius begins telling the three bots his next plan, a mysterious laughter appears on Robotnik's computer, scaring the three and Robotnik.

"Wh-What was that!?" Scratch said.

"It's coming from the computer..." Grounder said as the four moves closer to the computer before the computer turns on, revealing a man wearing a long white lab coat, black gloves and shoes. He wears a hood and appears to have bandage around his face, unable to view his face and a black goggles and appears to be laughing at the four.

"Mwahahaha! Hello, Dr. Ivo Robotnik! So glad to see you..." The mysterious man said while laughing evilly.

"Who are you and how did you hack into my computer!?" Robotnik said, demanding an answer.

"I am Dr. Van Micro, the great genius in my world...I was hoping you could me and my hired hunters on a mission."

"You expect me to help you, another evil genius!? Forget it! I already have enough geniuses for one day."

"Perhaps we can strike a deal...If you can help the hunters, they might give you some very advanced techs that could help you defeat Sonic the Hedgehog...A VERY powerful advanced techs."

"Hmmm....Sounds promising but I need a little more info on those hunters."

"Well, one of the hunters is a really big monster with incredible strength and another one is a robot with powerful weapons...Much advance than your three robots." The doctor laughs at them.

"That was mean..." Grounder said.

"Now I'm interested...Very well, but you better be telling the truth or I will find you and strangling you!"

"Mwhahaha! Excellent choice...Enter here and you'll meet the hunters...In a different view.They will explain once you meet them." The doctor summons a bright portal besides the computer before the doctor laughs and signs off.

"Amazing...Perhaps the doctor could be a worthy ally..."

"Until you betray them, your evilness" said Scratch

"That's true...But for now we better get into the portal."

"Uhh how do you know if its working or not?" said Grounder.

"Why we need a test dummy...And I know the perfect one!" Robotnik grabs Grounder's drill nose, bringing him in front of him. He then kicks the tank robot into the portal while Scratch and Coconuts laughs at him.

"Quit laughing and get in there, nincombots!" The doctor grabs Scratch's beak and Coconuts's tail before throwing them into the portal and follow them.

---------------

Back to the NanoCorps, the hunters are being informed by Micro in a building filled with equipment for music. Apparently they are targeting a country singer name Catty Carlisle...and Viz doesn't like it at all.

"Hunting a singer...That's a load of bullshit..." Viz said.

"Now, now...To make this more interesting, I asked four people to join you on this mission...I kinda promise you'll be helping them." The doctor laughs

"What kind of promise...?" Quentin said, knowing it's not a good one.

"Oh you'll see! Now good luck hunters and tell Robotnik 'good luck' as well!" Micro laughs before signing off.

"Robotnik...? Who is-" Petire was cut off when a similar portal appears before them and a robot came flying out of the portal, hitting Sharper into the ground follow by two other robots. The hunters checks the robots out, along with Sharper who is still pinned under the green tank robot.

"Where are you idiots at!?" A loud voice coming from the portal. A large man steps out of the portal, already fuming at his henchmen. "There you are, you rust buckets! Now where is that-Oh?" Robotnik spotted the hunters who is quite confuse of what's going on here.

"You must be the hunters and he is telling the truth." Robot said while eyeing on Atomic and Beta. "Greetings, my friends. I am Dr. Ivo Rrrobotnik, I am here to help you on this mission you are on, but I must ask: Why are we small!?"

"Err...We are small thanks to Dr. Micro's device, it giving us a challenge since we complete our mission with no failures." said Quentin.

"No failures...? Hmmm...Then perhaps you should help me once this is over...I have a 'pest' problems that I can't get rid off, but I'll explain it later. Now what is this mission you are doing?"

"We are hunting our target by the name of Catty Carlisle, know her?"

"Know her? I hate that country singer! She been playing Sonic's Song all the time! I even tried to capture her and force her to make my song, but that pesky teenage hedgehog rescue her!" Robotnik growls in anger.

"I see..."

Quentin frowns up a bit, seeing that Robotnik might not be a good helper...He looks over at Zeke to give a secret command to watch Robotnik and his henchmen to which he nodded. As the others get to know the three robots, they heard the doorknob rattle before the door opens the door, revealing a feminine figure, but who is it?
1553311.title: Targeting the Country Cat Singer

15533222221.content: The queen with powers of ice and snow?
15533222221.title: Elsa?

155332222211.content:
"Mwahahaha!" the hunters hear. "Greetings, Nanocorps. I, Dr. Van Micro, have learned of your many adventures and decided a new taak for you all. I need you to enter the world of a movie called "Frozen", and assassinate Queen Elsa, the ruler of Arandelle. Of course, you'll all have to be shrunk to the size of bugs to ensure total stealth."

"Shrunk?!" reacts Petire. "That is the stupidest thing I've ever - "

Then a bright flash engulfs the hunters, and everything goes blank.

Eventually, the team awakens...
155332222211.title: Targeting the Queen of Ice Magic

choices: Beta finishes collecting data, locating Elsa
They heard a loud noise from behind, along with booming stepping sound.
1553322222112.content:
The hunters slowly gets up after their strange encounter of Dr. Micro and realize they are in a different location. The hunters notice that they are in a castle...made of ice. In front of them is a massive yet beautiful frozen fountain and two curving staircases along the sides which join together on a platform above and across from the entrance of where they are. Sharper points upward, spotting a small crystal hanging in the center of roof. Most of the hunters are quite amaze of the structure that is made of ice...except for one certain hunter who doesn't like ice and cold weather...

"C-Can we move it? I-I'm...Freezing here." Sharper said shivering in this cold.

"Oh right, you loathe cold weather, especially snow. The sooner we find Else, the better." Quentin said with a grin. "Though he didn't said much info about the queen...Maybe she has ice powers?"

"It's possible, kid." said Zeke. "Beta. Any info?"

"Still collecting data, Master Zeke. In a meantime, why don't we explore the palace?" Beta suggested.

"Explore this god blasted coldness place!? F-Forget it!"

"Well you can asked Quentin or our newly recruit member, Ryx, to warm ya up." said Petire.

"That ain't going to happen." said the young Drangua and blind swordsman

"J-Jerks..."

"Enough clowning around...We got a job to do." Viz said as he wonder off towards the fountain.

The hunters decided to follow Viz while Beta finish collecting the data and finding Queen Elsa...Who ever made this castle sure do have great taste, but who could build this beautiful palace on top of a mountain with no citizens or residents nearby...
1553322222112.title: Inside the Ice Castle

choices: Sneak to Elsa very quietly and drain some blood
15533222221121.content:
After a while of searching the bitterly cold palace, the hunters finally notice their target, gazing out a window at the night snowfall.

"Elsa is this way, Master Quentin," confirms Beta, "what is our plan of action?"

So, what is Quentin's plan?
15533222221121.title: Found Elsa!

choices: It pokes into the skin, knocking Elsa out cold.
155332222211211.content:
"Danny, I need you to distract our target," orders Quentin.

"You're letting DANNY distract Elsa?!" argues Petire. "Are you nuts?"

"Well, maybe, but what's that have to do with anything?"

As Elsa watches the snow twinkle down, Danny sneaks up to the gigantic queen and tickles her right foot. Feeling this, Elsa looks down and is shocked by what she sees...

"What...a tiny person?!" reacts Elsa before scooping up the tiny hunter into her palm. "How is this..?"

"It's a funny story, hehe..." starts Danny before creating a wacky scenario to explain the circumstances of his size.

Meanwhile, the other hunters sneak their way behind Elsa's left foot, Beta morphing an arm into a syringe to send Elsa snoozing. But can he poke it into their target undetected?
155332222211211.title: Worst Plan Ever?

info.brief_description: Famous group of bounty hunters are about to face a whole new challenge and survival...
info.description:
Plot



The infamous NanoCorps: A group of powerful bounty hunters that few of the members are inhuman and led by a young Drangua name Quentin Andross. Saving lives from dangerous criminals, capturing most wanted people alive or dead if force to in just minutes. It's no wonder why everyone selected them as the most popular bounty hunters. One day, the hunters receive a letter and a strange device by a mysterious person name Dr.Van Micro. What happen next will be their most difficult and strangest challenge they ever done...

.

The Main NanoCorp Hunters


The Young Drangua Leader
Name: Quentin Andross

Age: 18

Height: 5'10"

Gender: Male

Appearance: an average height slim, yet muscular young Drangua (Dragon/Human race). Has short spiky yellow hair (SSJ style), red eyes, sharp teeth, and a scar on his left eye. Wearing a traditional red and black bounty hunter outfit and a red scarf around his neck.

Personality: Laid back and easygoing, he is also cool headed and calm even when in danger. Due to his friendly nature, he makes a lot of friends and allies.

Powers: Quentin has superhuman abilities and able to harden his skin like the dragon's scales. He can produce magma from his scaled arms, sprouts wings from his back, breathes fire or magma, and very keen eyesight.



The Wise Co-Leader Marksman
Name: Zeke

Age: Unknown

Gender: Male

Height: 8'12"

Appearance: Although most of his body is cover in his old poncho, Zeke is very tall and powerfully built with large mechanical arms that most of the hunters believe he is a robot like Beta. He also wears an old hat and goggles with red lens

Personality: Despite his rugged and shady appearance, Zeke is calm and silent bounty hunter that only spoken when needed. Most of the hunters came to him for his knowledge.

Powers: Zeke can magically summon his choice of weapons (mainly chooses sniper rifle) or tactical equipments. As an ace marksman, he can lock on his targets and snipe them without any misses.



The Invincible Monster
Name: Atomic Vile
Age: 1

Gender: Male

Height: 30'12

Appearance: Enormous, muscular bio weapon monster with his skin all silver and dons a short spiky hair. He has always shows his sharp teeth whenever he smiles or not and doesn't have pupils and iris in his eyes, making him more menacing. His appearance is very close to Venom from Spider-Man series except he's silver colored without the spider symbol, bigger and muscular.

Personality: Despite his ferocious figure, Atomic is actually a laid back and friendly monster, but gets a little rowdy and loud when fighting.

Powers: Due to being the Ultimate Bio-weapon, Atomic is the strongest and most dangerous hunter that no one dares to challenges him. His monstrous strength and other abilities alone can get the job done easily...As long it's not a stealth type mission. His body is indestructible, meaning nothing will kill him and even if he's injury, he has nanobots inside him to regenerate his wounds.



The Cold Hearted Stealth
Name: Viz 'X' Archer

Age: 19

Gender: Male

Height: 5'11

Appearance: Lean built, muscular young man with a large X shaped scar on his face, giving him the nickname âX'. He lost both his arms during his last mission and Beta, along with Zeke, built and gave him a pair of powerful robotic arms.

Personality: Viz usually shows his strict, serious, and cold personality,determined to get the job done. However, he is very loyalty to his fellow hunters. He has an ongoing rivalry between himself and Quentin, but in a more friendly term and has a soft spot for Emeralda, unaware she has a crush on him.

Powers: Thanks to the newly implanted robotic arms, Viz is another dangerous force to be reckon with. The arms giving him super strength, tactical cloaking, changing into weapons like swords and miniguns, smoke screen, and other hidden weapons.



The Robotic Brain
Name: Beta

Age: Ageless

Gender: Genderless (has a male voice)

Height: 6'9"

Appearance: Beta's tall metallic body is colored in jet black and has a glowing red lines on his knight like body,

Personality: Beta does not have any emotions and feelings like most robots do, following the leader's command.

Powers: Like Zeke, Beta also can summon weapons and tactical equipment and has a unique ability that he can go through solid object by becoming molecules. He has superhuman abilities though not as strong as Atomic, but still can throw a powerful punch.




The Cool Womanizer
Name: Danny Von Vantage

Age: 34

Gender: Male

Height: 6'3"

Appearance: Tall, toned and muscular. Danny has Mohawk hairstyle that sticks up due to the amount of hair jell, wearing a blacj bounty hunter exo-suit.

Personality:Danny is easy going and sometimes lazy, he does joke around with his comrades. However he does get serious when they are on the mission. He is also a womanizer as he tends to flirt with every women he can find.

Powers: Thanks to Beta's exo-suits, Danny's abilities has improved his abilities and the black exo-suit gives him numerous of tactical equipment, jet pack, grappling hook and electrical shocks from the hands.



The Flame Swordsman
Name: Ryx

Age: 45

Gender: Male

Height: 6'9"

Appearance: Ryx is a tall blind muscular man carrying a sword with him which is located on the hip. He has numerous scars on his chest and three scars on his face. Has stubby hair on his chin.He wears a black samurai gi with intricate design, gray pants with same design and boots. He has bandages around his eyes and wearing a straw hat.

Personality: Ryx is a silent yet strict warrior who carries himself with grace and dignity, maintaining many subtle mannerisms of a traditional samurai. He is the strong silent type, speaking when he feels it's necessary.

Powers: Ryx is a powerful swordsman, possibly the strongest swordsman of the group, who cut just about anything with amazing speed, strength, and precision. His sword, the Enkou, is a long sword that release intense heat and powerful fire projectiles, even sharpen its blade to gain more strength.



The Telekinesis Sloth
Name: Slick

Age: 15

Gender: Male

Height: 4â8"

Appearance: Slick is a short lean muscular build with his skin being pale. Slick has short spiky black hair with white tips, red eyes and a tattoo that said 'Sloth' on his back. He is currently the youngest and shortest of the hunters.

Personality: Slick is very lazy and tends to sleep during the mission. However, like Danny, he can get the job doneâ¦if he wants to.

Powers: Despite being lazy, Slick is a very powerful ESP as he can lift objects with his mind, teleport, creating shields to block any attacks, and attacks his targets with Pyrokinesis and Cryokinesis.



The Three Recon Stooges
Name: Petire

Age: 40

Gender: Male

Height: 6'2"

Appearance: Petire is tall, well built with fair skin color, he is also bald headed
.
Personality:.Petire is more strict than the other two, arguing with them...in a goofy way. However, he enjoys goofing off , along with Ralph and Sharper.

Powers: The three wears exo suits like Danny does, giving them enhanced abilities and equipments. His suit is color blue.


Name: Ralph

Age: 39

Gender: Male

Height: 6'1

Appearance: Ralph is lean built with peach skin and has green undercut hair

Personality: Ralph is the lazy of the three and speaks in sarcasm most of the time.

Powers: The three wears exo suits like Danny does, giving them enhanced abilities and equipments. His suit is color green


Name Sharper

Age: 20

Gender: Male

Height: 5'8

Appearance: Sharper is quite short among the three with slim body and has short spiky red hair

Personality: Sharper loves to eat more than the missions, but he does do his job well...Until he gets hungry.

Powers: The three wears exo suits like Danny does, giving them enhanced abilities and equipments. His suit is color red



The Deadly Shadow Assassin
Name: Sasha

Age: 25

Gender: Female

Height: 6'3"

Appearance: Sasha is a tall, curvy, athletic woman with long flowing black hair with red highlights pass down her waist. wears a jet black skintight spy suit that comes with a hood and mask, a belt around her waist filled with tactical equipment, gloves with sharp hard nails, long black scarf around her neck and high heel boots.

Personality: Sasha is a soft spoken, kind hearted and very loyalty woman who cares quite deeply for her comrades. On a mission, Sasha is very focus and serious to get the mission done, even killing anyone who gets in their way without hesitation.

Powers: Sasha has a unique power to merge into any shadows she set sight on and reemerges to strike down her target without noticing her. Sasha also uses dark like powers to stop her targets by using their shadows and summons shadow like tendrils.



The Fearless Gladiator
Name: Alanna Florence

Age: 30

Gender: Female

Height: 8'10"

Appearance: Alanna is a very tall, curvaceous, large breasted Great Horned Elf with long flowing bluish green hair that past her waist with two long braided locks in the front, azure eyes and two curve horns on her head She wears a revealing light blue and silver gladiator armor and skirt, fingerless gauntlets, and thigh high gladiator sandal boots. Alanna carries a large two handed sword on her back and tower shield.

Personality: Alanna is a very strict, impatient, headstrong, and fearless elf who loves to hunt down dangerous wanted criminals without second thought. She respects Quentin's leadership, Zeke's wise knowledge, Atomic's monstrous strength, Viz's stealth skills and Slick's powerful psychic. To Danny and the Three Recons however, she doesn't seem fond of them, especially to Danny when he flirts with her, only ended up in a tall tree somewhere. Unaware of Quentin, Alanna develops a big crush on her leader but doesn't show it.

Powers: Alanna possess super human abilities and strong swordsmanship as she can swing her large weapon with ease.



The Cheery Mage
Name: Glenys Florence

Age: 28

Gender: Female

Height: 8'8"

Appearance: Like her older sister, Glenys is a very tall, curvaceous, large breasted Great Horned Elf with long green hair that tied up into a pony tail, gold color eyes and long horns on her head. She wears a long white evening dress with large golden belt around her waist, golden arm bracelets and low heeled sandals. She carries a staff with a floating gem on the tip.

Personality: Unlike her strict sister, Glenys is a cheerful, kind and upbeat elf who cheers on her fellow hunters from the sideline while they do the most work. Like Alanna,she too has a big crush on Quentin and often flirts with him, even pressing her large breasts against his face, much to his annoyance. Glenys can be very protected and won't hesitate to harm anyone who hurts her friends and her sister.

Powers: While she posses superhuman abilities, Glenys uses powerful element magic that rivals Slick's psychic ability.



The Ghostly Huntress
Name: Esmeralda Valda

Age: Ageless (appears to be 18)

Gender: Female

Height: 5'8"

Appearance: Esmeralda is a young female ghost. She has a slim, curvy and voluptuous body with large breasts, long pale lavender hair with a strand in between her white eyes, and due to the fact Esmeralda is a ghost, she has ghostly like pale skin and then fades to transparent at the beginning of her hands and feet. She wears a black Gothic lolita dress decorated with ghostly chains and some wrap around her waist, arms and neck, and black knee high boots.

Personality: Esmeralda is shy and a bit reclusive, often hanging out alone. But willingly help out her fellow hunters if they are in a pickle and has a secret crush on Viz

Powers: As a ghost, Esmeralda is immune to all physical attacks, phase through solid objects and possessing people. She uses chains as weapons and can summon more chains from 'beyond the graves'.



The Giant Timid Healer
Name: Slyphy

Age: 1

Gender: Female

Height: 30'7"

Appearance: Sylphy has an appearance of a giant young light blue skinned beautiful woman with a slender and curvaceous body, very long light blue hair She possess a set of wings on her back, giving the ability to fly. Sylphy wears a light blue long revealing dress (showing her bare stomach and back) with numerous silver ornaments to accommodate it. Large feathery laurel crown with silver arm brackets, and silver heeled pumps.

Personality: Sylphy is very shy and timid, despite her large size. She doesnât like to fight, often hang back and let the other hunters do it, but when her friends is in trouble, she develops her courage and takes on any challenge it throws at her. Slyphy looks up to Quentin (no pun intended) as her hero and cares quite deeply to him.

Powers: Although she doesn't possess powerful strength like her friend Atomic, Slyphy has superhuman abilities and carries a long blue wand with a floating crystal on top, has ability to heal her friends when in danger, and surprisingly knows martial arts.



The Vampiric Swordmage
Name: Athanasia Shirina

Age: Ageless (20s)

Gender: Female

Height: 6'1"

Appearance: Athanasia is a tall, slender and curvaceous woman with long flowing black hair appearance of a vampire. She has pointed ears, pale skin and vampiric red eyes with a beauty mark under her right eye and fangs. She wears a red scarf draped over her shoulders while her upper torso, shoulders, and arms are clad with spiked armor that shows her ample bosom with NanoCorps symbol on the front, black mini skirt with stockings, dark red cloak tied around her waist and armored heeled closed toe sandals.

Personality: Bloodthirsty and remorseless with a hint of sadistic, Athanasia is a dangerous bounty hunters that even Danny, a womanizer, won't flirt to. However, she's more of a kind nature vampire when not on a mission and very loyal to her boss, though she tried to seduce him and suck his blood, but the Drangua is immune to her spell.

Powers: As a vampire, Athanasia can use powerful blood magic and a strong swordswoman, wielding a black and red life stealing sword to fuel her powers.



The Primal Wolfess
Name: Ylva Lupe

Age: 27

Height: 8'2"

Gender: Female

Appearance: Ylva is a tall half human-wolf woman with a curvy yet athletic body, long soft white hair with bangs covering her left yellow eye, long fluffy white tail and wolf ears, sharp nails and canine fangs. She wears a revealing white wrapped crop top, wrapped skirt with wolf shaped buckle, brass arm cuff bracelets and brown low heeled sandals

Personality: Ylva has a calm, laid-back, and quiet personality, get along with her partners very well, and never shows fear when facing dangerous operations. She has a habit of howling at night when there is a full moon.

Powers: Ylva has superhuman abilities and run really fast, able to catch up powerup exo suitors like Danny and the recons. Has very keen eyesight and catching scent about miles away, and calls in wolves to aid her by howling.







New NanoCorps Members(optional)




The Wacky Doctor
Name: Dr. Bling Coon
Age: 40
Gender: Male
Height: 6'1"
Appearance: Bling is a tall, slender bald headed man, wearing a black scientist outfit with matching gloves and boots. He wears glasses and mask around his mouth and carrying his large sword on his back
Personality: Dr. Coon is a brilliant doctor that has split personalities: One side is a soft spoken, genius and intelligence doctor that rivals Beta's intelligence. The other side is crazy and possibly dangerous mad scientist who loves to torture his poor victims but had enough sense to not harm his fellow hunters.
Powers: As a doctor, Coon's role is to heal his partners and boost their strengths up. While on his crazy side, he attack his target with a large sword with a large circular hilt to spin around with and surprisingly has super strength.

The Silent Sentinel Knight
Name: Crimson
Age: Unknown
Gender: Male
Height: 10'5"
Appearance: Crimson is an extremely tall, muscular knight who is the second tallest member of the Corps. He wears a black heavy armor set with red cap. The hunters don't know if he's human or not as he wears the armor all the time and not taking it off.
Personality: Crimson is a loyal and brave knight who doesn't talk, but will follow orders from his fellow hunters.
Powers: Crimson carries a large claymore and shield and moves quite fast that surprises anyone who thinks he's slow. He too has superhuman strength and can be very hard to dent his armor.

The Sharp Shooter Buxon
Name: Vivian Deuce
Gender: Female
Nationality: Spanish
Character archetype Ruffian (change if necessary)
Appearance: Long red wavy hair, tanned skin,
Personality: Rough, serious and flippant
Special Skill: Sharp-shooting (laser tracking gun)

The Crystallized Ice Demoness
Name: Crystal Aura
Age: Unknown
Gender: Female
Height: 9'12"
Appearance: Crystal is a very tall crystal ice demon with feminine and curvaceous humanoid light blue body with long wavy light blue hair. Her back is cover in large crystals in three rows, along with her long tail though smaller. She has sharp crystallized claws and horns on her head, heeled feet, sharp teeth and demonic blue eyes.
Personality: Like Viz, Crystal can be quite cold and ruthless but sometimes be sweet and kind, depending on her mood. She likes to flirt with Quentin and, sometimes, Danny.
Powers: Crystal has superhuman strength that matches Crimson and durability of Atomic. She can fire crystals or ice spear from her hands, freezes her targets with a cold blow from her mouth and regeneration if one of her body parts severed.

The Chaos Hedgehog
Name: Z
Age: Unknown
Gender: Male
Height: 3'4
Appearance: Z is an anthropomorphic hedgehog with red and black fur that covers most of his body, peach skin that covers his arms, muzzle and torso. He has six quails sticking up from the back of his head, two pillar like crystals sprouting on his shoulders and four on the back that emits glowing orange 'veins', short tail, and a large Z like scar on his stomach area that also glows in orange color
Personality: Z is a silent warrior but can be ruthlessness, aggression, arrogant, brash, and stubborn. However, he still follow orders from Quentin, no matter what kind of mission it be and won't complain about it. The Recon Stooges jokes about him and Viz are twins dun to their tough personalities.
Powers: Z can use Chaos Control to stop time, teleport to different location and opening a powerful rift know as Chaos Rifts. Like the other superpower hunters, Z has super strength, durability and speed.




Main Antagonist


The Mad and Genius Scientist
Name Dr. Van Micro:
Age: Unknown
Gender: Male
